\qu (2) What words describe the manner of killing someone?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan yang menjelaskan cara membunuh seseorang?
\ex shoot, gun down, blow someone away, stab, stab someone to death, butcher, behead, decapitate, beat someone to death, asphyxiate, choke, garrote, strangle, suffocate, throttle, smother, stifle, crucify, drown, electrocute, hang, hanging, poison, stone, starve
\exn (melakukan) pembunuhan, membunuh (orang ternama atas sebab politik), menjalani hukum mati, menggantung, disalipkan, pancung (kepala), tembak, bunuh dengan kejam, sembelih, bunuh ramai-ramai
\qu (3) What words refer to the act of killing someone?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada perbuatan membunuh seseorang?
\ex murder (n), homicide, killing, assassination, foul play, capital crime, beheading, bloodshed, butchery, crucifixion, decapitation, electrocution, fratricide, immolation, infanticide, liquidation, manslaughter, martyrdom, matricide, patricide, regicide, shooting, slaying, strangulation, smothering, suffocation, terrorism
\exn Membunuh, homisid, bunuh,membunuh orang ternama, perbuatan khianat, hukum bunuh, memancung, pertumpahan darah, sembelih, penyaliban, memenggal kepala, kayau, membunuh dengan kejutan elektrik, membunuh saudara, pengorbanan, membunuh anak, membubarkan, kesyahidan, membunuh ibu sendiri, membunuh bapa sendiri, membunuh raja, menembak, membunuh dengan mencekik, membunuh dengan menghalang pernafasan seseorang sehingga mati, mati lemas, pengganas, melemaskan orang
\qu (4) What words refer to the government killing someone because they committed a crime?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada kerajaan membunuh seseorang kerana ia melakukan jenayah?
\ex execute, put someone to death, sentence someone to death, capital punishment, the death penalty, capital offence, capital crime, punishable by death, execution, condemned, be on death row
\exn Menjalankan hukuman mati terhadap seseorang, menyeksa seseorang hingga mati, hukuman bunuh, hukuman mati, kesalahan hukum bunuh, menghukum sehingga mati, kematian bergilir-gilir
\qu (5) What words refer to killing many people?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada membunuh ramai orang?
\ex massacre, slaughter, exterminate, annihilate, wipe out, bloody
\exn Pembunuhan yang mengakibatkan ramai orang terkorban, penghapusan, memusnah habis, membunuh semua, peristiwa berdarah
\qu (6) What words refer to the killing of many people?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada membunuh ramai orang?
\ex massacre (n), slaughter, carnage, genocide, mass murder, ethnic cleansing, annihilation, blood-bath, extermination, holocaust, pogrom
\exn Pembunuhan yang mengakibatkan ramai orang terkorban, pembunuhan, penghapusan, memusnah habis, membunuh semua, peristiwa berdarah, pembunuhan kaum
\qu (7) What words refer to killing yourself?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada bunuh diri sendiri?
\ex kill yourself, commit suicide, take your own life, end it all, suicide, suicidal, be a suicide, do away with yourself
\exn Bunuh diri
\qu (8) What words refer to trying to kill someone?
\qun (8) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada cuba membunuh seseorang?
\ex attempted murder, attempt on someone's life
\exn Percubaan membunuh, percubaan untuk membunuh seseorang
\qu (9) What words refer to someone who kills another person?
\qun (9) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang membunuh orang lain?
\ex murderer, killer, assassin, hitman, slayer, executioner, hangman, liquidator, murderess, slaughterer, slayer, terrorist, strangler
\exn Pembunuh, pemenggal, tukang gantung, pengganas, pencekik
\qu (10) What words describe someone who wants to kill someone?
\qun (10) Apakah perkataan yang menerangkan seseorang yang ingin membunuh seseorang?
\ex homicidal, murderous
\exn Cenderung untuk membunuh, membunuh tanpa berfikir
\qu (11) What words refer to the person who was killed?
\qun (11) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang yang telah dibunuh?
\ex martyr, murdered man/woman, victim, fatality
\exn Martir, mangsa, lelaki/wanita yang dibunuh, orang yang dibunuh
\qu (12) What words refer to a person killed in war?
\qun (12) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang yang terbunuh dalam peperangan?
\ex killed in action, casualty, casualty of war, civilian casualty, collateral damage
\exn Terbunuh dalam peperangan, korban perang, orang yang terbunuh dalam perang, orang awam yang terbunuh
\qu (13) What words refer to something used to kill someone?
\qun (13) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada benda yang digunakan untuk membunuh orang?
\ex murder weapon
\exn Senjata untuk membunuh
\qu (14) What words describe something that can kill someone?
\qun (14) Apakah perkataan yang menerangkan sesuatu yang boleh membunuh seseorang?
\ex fatal, killer, mortal, lethal, deadly, poisonous, toxic
\exn Pembunuh, membawa maut, beracun, bertoksik
\qu (15) What words refer to something such as an accident or disease killing someone?
\qun (15) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu misalnya kemalangan atau penyakit yang membunuh orang?
\ex kill, kill off, cause death, be a killer, destroy, decimate, wipe out
\exn Membunuh, mengorbankan, membawa maut, menjadi pembunuh, memusnahkan, membinasakan, menghapuskan
\qu (16) What words refer to doing something that might result in your death?
\qun (16) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada membuat sesuatu yang mungkin akan mengakibatkan kematian?
\ex risk your life
\exn membahayakan nyawa anda
\qu (17) What words refer to doing something that results in your death?
\qun (17) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada melakukan sesuatu yang menyebabkan kematian?
\ex cost you your life
\exn mengorbankan nyawa anda
\qu (18) What words refer to killing an animal?
\qun (18) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada membunuh haiwan?
\ex slaughter, destroy, put down, put away, put something out of it misery
\exn Menyembelih, memotong leher (ayam, dsbg), menghapuskan

\is 2.6.6.2
\sd Corpse
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words referring to a corpse--the body of a person who has died.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan yang merujuk kepada mayat - badan manusia yang telah mati.
\qu (1) What words refer to a dead body?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada badan yang tidak bernyawa?
\ex body, dead body, corpse, cadaver, stiff, carcass, carrion, mummy
\exn Mayat, badan tidak bernyawa, bangkai, mumia
\qu (2) What words refer to a dead body decaying?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada mayat yang berbau busuk?
\ex decay, decompose, rot, return to dust, eaten by worms, corrupt, putrid, putrefy
\exn Busuk, reput, kembali menjadi tanah, dimakan ulat
\qu (3) What words refer to a body after it has decayed?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada badan setelah reput?
\ex remains, bones, skeleton
\exn Tinggalan, tulang, rangka tulang

\is 2.6.6.3
\sd Funeral
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words related to a funeral and other things that are done after a person dies.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan yang merujuk kepada upacara pengebumian dan hal-hal lain yang dibuat setelah seseorang telah mati.
\qu (1) What words refer to a funeral?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada pengebumian?
\ex funeral, wake, graveside service, burial service, last rites
\exn pengebumian, penjagaan mayat, servis pengkebumian, memberikan penghormatan terakhir
\qu (2) What words refer to holding a funeral?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada menjalankan satu upacara kematian?
\ex perform a funeral, hold a memorial service
\exn menjalankan upacara kematian, menjalankan upacara pengebumian
\qu (3) What words refer to notifying people that someone has died?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada memaklumkan orang bahawa seseorang sudah mati?
\ex death notice, send death notice
\exn Notis/pemberitahuan kematian, membuat pemberitahuan kematian
\qu (4) What words refer to something someone says about a dead person?
\qun (4) Bagaimanakah orang mengetahui yang seseorang telah mati?
\ex obituary, eulogy, epitaph
\exn Berita kematian, menghantar berita kematian, obituari
\qu (5) What are the parts or stages of a funeral?
\qun (5) Apakah bahagian atau peringkat bagi upacara pengebumian?
\ex eulogy, dirge, fire a salute, lower the flag, half mast, play taps, toll the bell
\exn Sembahyang untuk orang mati, kata-kata memuji, tembakan hormat, menurunkan bendera, bendera setengah tiang, mengetuk-ngetuk, membunyikan loceng
\qu (6) What words refer to something that is made or done to remind people of the person who died?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yang dibuat untuk memperingati orang yang sudah mati?
\ex memorial, monument, in memory of
\exn Upacara peringatan, tugu peringatan, mengenang

\is 2.6.6.4
\sd Mourn
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words related to mourning a death--to feel bad because someone died and to show this feeling in various ways. Include whatever cultural practices are used.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to mourning a death?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada berkabung bagi kematian seseorang?
\ex grieve, be in mourning, mourn, lament, bemoan, mourning, lamentation, grief, sorrow
\exn Berkabung, berduka, kepiluan, meratap, sedih
\qu (2) What noises do people make to show they are mourning?
\qun (2) Apakah suara yang dibuat oleh orang untuk menunjukkan mereka sedang berkabung?
\ex bewail, crying, groan, moan, sigh, wail, weep
\exn Meraung, menangis, merintih
\qu (3) What special music is played?
\qun (3) Apakah bunyian/muzik khas yang dimainkan?
\ex death chant, dirge, funeral march
\exn Mengucap sesuatu dengan berlagu, lagu ratapan, perarakan pengebumian
\qu (4) What words refer to someone who is mourning?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang sedang berkabung?
\ex mourner
\exn Orang yang berkabung
\qu (5) What special clothes are worn?
\qun (5) Apakah pakaian khas untuk dipakai pada pengebumian?
\ex dress in black, funeral clothes, black veil
\exn Memakai pakaian serba hitam, pakaian untuk penguburan, tudung hitam
\qu (6) What do people do to show they are mourning?
\qun (6) Apakah tanda-tanda yang dibuat oleh orang untuk menunjukkan mereka sedang berkabung?
\ex beat their breast, tear their clothes, shave their head, put ashes on their head
\exn Memukul dada mereka. Mengoyakkan pakaian mereka, mencukur rambut mereka, menaruh abu di atas kepala mereka

\is 2.6.6.5
\sd Bury
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words related to disposing of a dead body. Different cultures have practices other than burying a body in the ground. Include words for all practices used by the culture.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to burying a dead body?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada mengubur mayat?
\ex bury, burial, inter, interment, lay to rest, entomb
\exn Kubur, pengebumian, meletakkan mayat dalam kubur, bersemadi, tanam mayat
\qu (2) What steps are involved in preparing a body for burial?
\qun (2) Apakah langkah-langkah menyediakan mayat untuk penguburan?
\ex burial arrangements, wash (the body), wrap, anoint
\exn Persiapan penguburan, memandikan (mayat), membalut (mayat), melumur (mayat dengan minyak), mengawet (mayat)
\qu (3) What words refer to a person who prepares a body for burial?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada seorang yang menyiapkan mayat untuk dikubur?
\ex embalmer, undertaker, mortician, gravedigger, funeral director
\exn Mengawet, mengurus penguburan mayat, penggali kubur
\qu (4) Where are bodies prepared for burial?
\qun (4) Di manakah mayat-mayat ditempatkan untuk dikebumikan?
\ex morgue, mortuary, crematorium
\exn Di rumah mayat
\qu (5) What is used to protect a body?
\qun (5) Apakah yang digunakan untuk melindungi maya?
\ex grave clothes, shroud, coffin, casket, sarcophagus, urn
\exn Kain kafan, keranda batu, kendi (tempat menyimpan abu mayat)
\qu (6) What is used to carry a body?
\qun (6) Apakah yang digunakan untuk mengangkat mayat?
\ex pall, bier, hearse
\exn Kain penutup keranda, usungan mayat, kereta mayat
\qu (7) What words refer to burning a body?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada membakar mayat?
\ex cremate, cremation, pyre, ashes
\exn Membakar mayat, unggun membakar mayat
\qu (8) What words refer to leaving a body outside?
\qun (8) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada mendedahkan mayat kepada cuaca?
\ex expose (a body), funeral platform, left to rot
\exn Dedahkan mayat, pentas tempat upacara pengebumian, dibiarkan mereput
\qu (9) What words refer to preserving a dead body?
\qun (9) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada memumiakan mayat?
\ex embalm, mummify, mummy
\exn Memumiakan mayat, mengawet, mengabadikan

\is 2.6.6.6
\sd Grave
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words related to a grave--the place where a dead body is put.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan kuburan -tempat mayat disimpan atau dikebumikan.
\qu (1) What words refer to the place where a body is placed?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada tempat menaruh mayat?
\ex grave, tomb, burial plot, sepulcher, vault, crypt, barrow
\exn Kuburan, makam, petak kuburan, kubur (yang diperbuat daripada batu), bilik bawah tanah tempat mengubur, bilik bawah gereja, kereta usungan
\qu (2) What words refer to a place where many bodies are buried?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada tempat mayat-mayat dikuburkan?
\ex cemetery, churchyard, graveyard, mausoleum, mass grave, burial ground, charnel house
\exn Perkuburan, makam (biasanya untuk keturunan raja atau bangsawan), pusara, tanah perkuburan
\qu (3) What words refer to a marker of a grave?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan merujuk kepada tanda kubur?
\ex grave marker, gravestone, headstone, tombstone, slab, memorial, monument, epitaph
\exn Tanda kubur, batu nisan, kepingan batu, peringatan, tugu peringatan, tulisan pada batu nisan

\is 2.6.6.7
\sd Inherit
\sdn Mewarisi
\dd Use this domain for words related to inheriting something from your parents after they die.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan mewarisi sesuatu daripada ibubapa selepas mereka meninggal dunia.
\qu (1) What words refer to inheriting something?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada mewarisi sesuatu?
\ex inherit, receive an inheritance, succeed to
\exn Mewarisi, menerima pewarisan, mewariskan
\qu (2) What words refer to someone who inherits something?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang mewarisi sesuatu?
\ex heir, heiress, beneficiary
\exn Pewaris lelaki, pewaris perempuan, ahli waris, pewaris
\qu (3) What words refer to something that is inherited?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yang diwarisi?
\ex inheritance, estate, legacy
\exn Warisan, pusaka, wasiat, harta pusaka, harta peninggalan
\qu (4) What words refer to a will?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada surat wasiat?
\ex will, last will and testament, probate
\exn Surat wasiat, wasiat, sijil pengesahan wasiat
\qu (5) What words refer to the process of making a will?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada proses membuat wasiat?
\ex make a will, draw up a will, plan your estate, estate planning, testate, intestate
\exn Membuat wasiat, merancang wasiat, perancangan wasiat, meninggalkan wasiat, tidak berwasiat
\qu (6) What words refer to someone who makes a will?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang membuat wasiat?
\ex testator
\exn Pewasiat
\qu (7) What words refer to giving something to someone in your will?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada memberikan sesuatu kepada seseorang dalam surat wasiat?
\ex leave, bequeath, will (v), hand down
\exn Meninggalkan, mewariskan, mewasiatkan (v), memberi
\qu (8) What words refer to the person who distributes the property?
\qun (8) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang yang mengagih-agihkan harta itu?
\ex executor
\exn Wasi
\qu (9) What words refer to the right to inherit something?
\qun (9) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada hak mewarisi sesuatu?
\ex birthright
\exn Hak kelahiran

\is 2.6.6.8
\sd Life after death
\sdn Kehidupan setelah mati
\dd Use this domain for words related to life after death.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada kehidupan setelah mati.
\cf Heaven, hell; Resurrection
\cfn Syurga, neraka; hidup balik
\qu (1) What words refer to life after death?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada kehidupan setelah mati?
\ex life after death, afterlife, immortality, the life beyond, life beyond the grave
\exn hidup setelah/sesudah/selepas mati, keabadian
\qu (2) What words refer to person after they die?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang setelah mereka meninggal dunia?
\ex ghost, spirit
\exn Hantu, roh, semangat
\qu (3) What words refer to the place where dead people are?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada tempat dimana orang mati berada?
\ex netherworld, heaven, hell
\exn Syurga, neraka, dunia orang mati
\qu (4) What words refer to caring for the spirit of a dead person?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada menjaga tentang roh seseorang yang telah mati?
\ex offer a sacrifice, pray for the dead, keep someone's memory alive
\exn Mempersembahkan korban, berdoa untuk si mati, menghidupkan kenangan
\qu (5) What words refer to not living on after death?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada tidak hidup setelah mati?
\ex oblivion, end of existence, finality of death
\exn Dilupakan, kewujudan yang telah berakhir, keberakhiran sesuatu kematian

\is 3
\sd Language and thought
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for general words referring to mental and verbal activity. This domain is primarily for grouping many related domains. Therefore there may be no general word in a language to cover such a broad area of meaning.
\ddn
\qu (1) What general words refer to mental and verbal activity?
\qun
\ex psychology, life of the soul
\exn
\gd IF4491F9B-3C5E-42AB-AFC0-F22E19D0FFF5

\is 3.1
\sd Soul, spirit
\sdn Jiwa, Roh
\oldis 3.1
\oldsd Soul, spirit
\oldsdn Jiwa, Roh

\dd Use this domain for general words related to the immaterial, non-physical part of a person, as opposed to the body.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal niskala yang tiada unsur jasadiah berbanding dengan jasad seseorang.
\qu (1) What words refer to the immaterial part of a person?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada unsur niskala seseorang?
\ex soul, spirit, spiritual, psyche, psychological, psychology, internal makeup, inside, inward, conscious self, consciousness, ego, essence, humanity, id, self, subconscious, superego, unconscious
\exn Jiwa, roh, mental, batin (berbanding dengan erti lahiriah)
\qu (2) What words refer to the part of a person that thinks and knows?
\qun
\ex mind, intellect, mental faculty, reason, reasoning, sense, thinking, thought, thoughts
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the part of a person that wants and decides?
\qun
\ex will, volition
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the part of a person that feels?
\qun
\ex heart, breast, emotions, emotional makeup, feeling, feelings, sensitivity, gut
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to the part of a person that affects his behavior?
\qun
\ex personality, character, conscience, disposition, nature, tendency
\exn

\oldex mind, intellect
\oldexn Fikiran, akal budi/kecerdasan/intelek
\oldqu (3) What words refer to the part of a person which decides?

\oldex will, volition

\oldexn Jatung hati, perasaan batiniah/nurani (berbanding dengan kesan deria rasa)

\oldex personality, character, conscience
\oldexn Keperibadian, perangai, suara hati/hati nurani

\is 3.1.1
\sd Personality
\sdn Keperibadian
\oldis 3.1.1
\oldsd Personality
\oldsdn Keperibadian

\dd Use this domain for words that describe a person's personality (the way he usually thinks, talks, and how he acts with other people).
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk bidang perkataan yang menjelaskan keperibadian seseorang (bagaimana seseorang berfikir, bertutur dan berinteraksi dengan orang lain)
\qu (1) What general words refer to a person's personality?
\qun (1) Bagaimanakah peribadi seseorang itu dirujuk pada umumnya?
\ex personality, manner, character
\exn Keperibadian
\qu (2) What words describe personality traits?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan sifat keperibadian seseorang?
\ex introvert, extrovert, outgoing, shy, quiet, sociable, talkative, vivacious, intense, easy-going, down-to-earth, homespun, melancholic, phlegmatic, choleric, sanguine, logical, emotional, unemotional, impulsive, cool-headed, even keeled, flamboyant
\exn Pandangan sempit (sentiasa berpusat kepada diri sendiri), suka bergaul, pemalu, pendiam, peramah, suka bercakap/mulut murai, sayu/senang tersinggung, tidak mesra/senang terpengaruh, pemarah, optimis

\sd Mental state
\sdn Keadaan Mental
\oldis 3.1.2
\oldsd Mental state
\oldsdn Keadaan Mental

\dd Use this domain for words referring to a person's mental state.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berdasarkan soalan berikut
\qu (1) What general words refer to a person's mental state?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang biasa digunakan untuk menjelaskan keadaan mental seseorang?
\ex mental state, mental condition, conscious state
\exn Keadaan mental, waras/kewarasan, kecerdasan otak/mental, keadaan sedar diri

\is 3.1.2.1
\sd Alert
\sdn Cergas
\oldis 3.1.2.1
\oldsd Alert
\oldsdn Cergas
\dd Use this domain for words referring to a mental state when the mind is working hard.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk bidang perkataan yang merujuk kepada keadaan mental semasa minda sangat aktif.
\qu (1) What words refer to an alert mental state?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada keadaan mental yang cergas?
\ex be on your guard, beware, take heed, be on the lookout, watch
\exn Perasan, cergas, mampu memberi perhatian, mempunyai pemahaman yang jelas, mampu berfikir secara logik, mampu menumpukan perhatian, mampu memusatkan fikiran
\qu (2) What words describe someone who is alert?
\qun
\ex alert, watchful, vigilant, keep your eyes peeled, aware, clear headed, coherent, wary, mindful, responsive, sensitive
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe someone who is not alert?
\qun
\ex unaware, mindless, unmindful, bored, disregard, flighty, heedless, oblivious
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.1.2.1
\oldqu (2) What words are used to express a slight case of these conditions?
\oldqun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan keadaan kurang cergasnya seseorang itu?
\oldex pay very little attention, attention is divided, mind wanders
\oldexn Memberi sedikit perhatian, perhatian yang berbelah bahagi, fikiran yang melayang/ minda yang mengkhayal
\oldqu (3) What words are used to express an extreme case of these conditions?
\oldqun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan keadaan mental seseorang yang sangat cergas?
\oldex pay close attention, focus one's attention
\oldexn Menumpukan perhatian penuh, memusatkan perhatian/ fikiran
\oldqu (4) What words are used of the opposite condition?
\oldqun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan keadaan sebaliknya (iaitu tidak cergas langsung)?
\oldex be unaware, not pay attention, mind wanders, mind is elsewhere, inattention, bored
\oldexn Tidak perasan, tidak memberi perhatian, fikiran melayang, terpesongnya fikiran, kelekaan, rasa bosan

\is 3.1.2.2
\sd Notice
\sdn Lihat
\oldis 3.2.2.2
\oldsd Notice
\oldsdn Lihat

\dd Use this domain for words related to noticing something.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berdasarkan soalan berikut.
\qu (1) What words refer to noticing something?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal sesuatu yang menjadi jelas di mata kasar atau di mata hati?
\ex notice, spot, become aware, detect, note, perceive, observe, conscious of, catch someone's eye, take note
\exn Lihat (nampak), mengecam, sedar, kesan (mengesan), ambil atau beri perhatian, memperhati, perasan
\qu (2) What words describe someone who is good at noticing things?
\qun
\ex observant, perceptive, eagle-eyed, have eyes like a hawk, have eyes in the back of your head, powers of observation
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to not noticing something?
\qun
\ex not notice, miss, overlook, fail to notice, escape someone's notice, unnoticed, go unnoticed
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe someone who is not good at noticing things?
\qun
\ex unobservant, unperceptive, oblivious, can't see the forest for the trees, got your head in the clouds
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to trying to get someone to notice something?
\qun
\ex call attention to, bring something to someone's attention, point out
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to trying to get someone to not notice something?
\qun
\ex distract
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2.2.2
\gd I267B98AA-E17C-4EBB-A752-ED4210701867

\is 3.1.2.3
\sd Attention
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words referring to a mental state when the mind is working hard.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to paying attention?
\qun
\ex pay attention, keep your mind on, take note, attentive, devote attention to
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to paying a lot of attention to something?
\qun
\ex pay close attention, concentrate, concentration, give something your undivided attention
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to paying attention to something?
\qun
\ex pay attention to, devote attention to, turn your attention to, focus on, concentrate on, give something/someone your undivided attention, attend to
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to paying too much attention to something?
\qun
\ex be engrossed in, be wrapped up in, be absorbed in, be immersed in, immerse yourself in, preoccupied
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to stop paying attention?
\qun
\ex turn off, switch off
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to not paying attention?
\qun
\ex not pay attention, daydream, be miles away, your mind wanders, inattentive, pay very little attention, mind is elsewhere, ignore, take no notice, goes in one ear and out the other
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to making someone pay attention to you?
\qun
\ex get attention, attract attention, draw attention to yourself
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to making someone pay attention to something?
\qun
\ex draw attention to, call attention to, bring something to someone's attention, point out, focus attention on, highlight
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to receiving a lot of attention from people?
\qun
\ex get attention, attract attention, attention, be the center of attention, be the focus of attention
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to trying to stop someone from paying attention to something?
\qun
\ex distract someone's attention, divert attention, distracted, distraction, diversion
\exn
\qu (11) What words refer to trying to prevent people from paying attention to you?
\qun
\ex not want to draw attention to yourself, keep a low profile, low key
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to paying attention to more than one thing?
\qun
\ex attention is divided
\exn
\cf Interested

\gd I5B5BCD42-09BB-4c2f-A2DA-569CFA69B6AC

\is 3.1.2.4
\sd Ignore
\sdn Tidak menghiraukan
\oldis 4.4.2.3.5
\oldsd Ignore
\oldsdn Tidak menghiraukan
\dd Use this domain for words related to ignoring someone--to not look at, listen to, or talk to someone because you think they are not important or you don't like them.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to ignoring someone?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal tidak mempedulikan seseorang?
\ex ignore, not pay any attention to, pay no attention to, not take any notice of, take no notice of, don't mind me/her/them, shrug off, not want to know, take someone for granted, avoid, refuse to acknowledge, don't greet
\exn Tidak meghiraukan, tidak mengendahkan, mengelakkan, enggan mengakui kehadiran seseorang dengan senyuman atau salam hormat, berpura-pura tidak nampak atau sengaja tidak peduli, tidak menyapa
\qu (2) What words refer to ignoring something someone says to you?
\qun
\ex ignore, disregard, not take any notice of, not listen to, fall on deaf ears
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to ignoring something bad that is happening?
\qun
\ex overlook, let it pass, turn a blind eye, shut your eyes to, close your eyes, bury your head in the sand
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to ignoring someone by rudely pretending not to see them?
\qun
\ex pretend not to notice, pretend not to see, look right through, snub, cut someone dead, shut out
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a person in authority ignoring what is good for the people under them?
\qun
\ex trample on, trample underfoot, ride roughshod over
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.4.2.3.5
\oldqu (2) What words refer to leaving someone when they need you?
\oldqun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal meninggalkan seseorang ketika kamu diperlukan?
\oldex desert, forsake
\oldexn Cabut lari (daripada menunaikan tanggungjawap atau janji), meninggalkan

\gd I878A313B-A201-444E-8BDB-67048D60C63E

\is 3.2
\sd Think
\sdn Berfikir
\oldis 3.2.1
\oldsd Think
\oldsdn Berfikir
\dd Use this domain for words related to thinking, thought processes, and kinds of thinking.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal berfikir/ memikirkan sesuatu, peringkat-peringkat dalam pembentukan buah fikiran dan pelbagai cara berfikir
\qu (1) What general words refer to thinking?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada perihal berfikir?
\ex think
\exn Fikir (berfikir, menjana buah fikiran)
\qu (2) What words refer to thinking something?
\qun
\ex think (that), have a thought, come to, come to mind, enter your mind, enter your head, cross your mind, hit on, occur to, present itself, spring to mind, strike, wonder
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a single thought?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada buah fikiran tertentu?
\ex thought, concept, consideration, fact, idea, image, notion, opinion, sentiment, syllogism
\exn Buah/ bentuk fikiran, pendapat, fahamam, kenyataan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2.1
\oldqu (2) What words refer to thinking about something for a period of time?
\oldqun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal tindakan berfikir yang melibatkan suatu jangka masa?
\oldex think about, cogitate, meditate, muse, ponder, mull over, reflect on, consider
\oldexn Sedang memikirkannya, fikir dengan mendalam, merenungkan sesuatu, fikir dalam-dalam/ fikir sehingga berkhayal, mempertimbangkan (pro & kontra sesuatu), berfikir dengan teliti, membuat tinjauan kepada waktu atau kejadian pada masa lampau/lalu, menimbang semula
\oldqu (4) What words refer to the thoughts a person is thinking at a particular time?
\oldqun (4) Bagaimanakah menjelaskan perihal apa yang difikirkan oleh seseorang pada suatu masa tertentu?
\oldex thinking
\oldexn Fikiran
\gd IDF9EE372-E92E-4F73-AAC5-D36908497698

\is 3.2.1
\sd Mind
\sdn MInda
\oldis 3.2
\oldsd Mind
\oldsdn MInda
\dd Use this domain for general words referring to the mind--the part of a person that thinks.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada fakulti (penjana) pemikiran.
\qu (1) What words refer to the mind?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada minda?
\ex mind, intellect, intelligence, reason, understanding, brain, head
\exn Minda, akal fikiran/ intelek/ kecerdasan, pemahaman

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2
\gd I7185BD93-5281-46DE-80AF-767F0EC40FF6

\is 3.2.1.1
\sd Think about
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words related to thinking about something for some time.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to thinking about something for a period of time?
\qun
\ex think about, brood, cogitate, consider, give consideration to, contemplate, meditate, muse, mull over, occupy your mind, ponder, reconsider, reflect, reflection, ruminate, speculate, study, weigh, wonder, go around in your mind, do some thinking, keep your mind on, have something on your mind, deduce, deduction, induction, inductive, logic, apply yourself, pay attention, bethink, conclude, observe, process, reason, theorize
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to thinking carefully?
\qun
\ex attend, attention, beware, careful, caution, cautious, concentrate, concentration, concern, concerned, consider, consideration, foresight, guard, intentional, interest, occupy, precaution, provident, prudent, purposeful, refuse, regard, tend, think thoroughly, give thought, thoughtful, think hard
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to not thinking carefully?
\qun
\ex careless, casual, dismiss, disregard, incautious, neglect, overlook, shrug, wing it
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to thinking about what is good for someone?
\qun
\ex be concerned about, care about
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to thinking before making a decision?
\qun
\ex think about, look at, think over, consider, think something out, think twice, think of, take into consideration, take into account
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to a series of thoughts?
\qun
\ex line of thought, line of thinking, train of thought, reasoning
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to thinking about something again?
\qun
\ex think again, reconsider, change your mind, on second thought, on reflection
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to the thoughts a person is thinking at a particular time?
\qun
\ex thinking
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to thinking about many things?
\qun
\ex mind is full
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to the way a person thinks about something?
\qun
\ex attitude, logic, outlook, perspective, thoughtful, view
\exn
\qu (11) What words describe the way a person thinks?
\qun
\ex clear, cogent, concise, observant
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to trying not to think about something?
\qun
\ex ignore, try to forget, put out of your mind, empty your mind
\exn
\qu (13) What words refer to stopping thinking about something?
\qun
\ex drop (a line of thought), distract, distraction, take your mind off
\exn
\qu (14) What words refer to failing to think about what you are doing?
\qun
\ex unthinking, unintentional, thoughtless, mindless
\exn
\qu (15) What words refer to a person who thinks a lot?
\qun
\ex thinker, brain, intellectual, philosopher
\exn
\gd I2A2AF155-9DB9-41C5-860A-FE0A3A09D6DE

\is 3.2.1.2
\sd Imagine
\sdn Membayangkan
\oldis 3.2.1.4
\oldsd Imagine
\oldsdn Membayangkan

\dd Use this domain for imagining things--to think about something that does not exist, or to think about something happening that has never happened.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal membayangkan dalam fikiran sesuatu yang masih tiada tetapi ada kemungkinan untuk wujud.
\qu (1) What words refer to imagining things?
\qun
\ex imagine, conceive of, dream up, envisage, hypothesize, invent, picture (in your mind), form a picture, make up, see, suppose, think of, think up, visualize
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to imagining something that you would like to do?
\qun
\ex daydream (v), dream about, dream of, fantasize, live in a fantasy world
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to imagining things that do not exist?
\qun
\ex imagine, be in the mind, be in your mind, be seeing things, hallucinate
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the ability to imagine?
\qun
\ex imagination, vivid imagination, fertile imagination, creativity, inventiveness, vision
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a person who imagines?
\qun
\ex creative genius, dreamer, visionary
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe someone who imagines?
\qun
\ex imaginative, creative (person)
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to something that someone imagines?
\qun
\ex image, conception, conceptualization, creation, daydream (n), dream, fancy, flight of fancy, fantasy, fiction, figment of your imagination, hallucination, hypothesis, invention, make believe, picture, unreality, vision, visualization
\exn
\qu (8) What words describe something that someone has imagined?
\qun
\ex imaginary, abstract, conceptual, creative (thought), fanciful, fictional, hypothetical, unreal, nonexistent, doesn't exist
\exn
\qu (9) What words describe someone who does not imagine?
\qun
\ex unimaginative, uncreative
\exn
\qu (10) What words describe something that cannot be imagined?
\qun
\ex unimaginable, inconceivable
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2.1.4

\oldqun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada pemikiran kreatif?
\oldex imagine, dream about/up, visualize, envisage, picture (in one's mind)
\oldexn Membayangkan, memimpikam, melihat dengan mata batin, mengambarkan, merancang dalam fikiran (contoh hasilnya: peta minda)
\oldqu (2) What words refer to thinking about what is not real?
\oldqun (2) Bagaimana menyatakan perihal memikirkan sesuatu yang tidak wujud dalam kenyataan?
\oldex daydream
\oldexn Menghayal, berangan-angan, mengelamun
\oldqu (3) What words refer to a person who thinks creatively?
\oldqun (3) Bagaimanakah seseorang yang berfikiran kreatif dirujuk?
\oldex dreamer, visionary, creative genius
\oldexn Seseorang yang suka bermimpi, seseorang yang mempunyai pandangan jauh/ berwawasan, seseorang yang mempunyai kepintaran daya cipta luarbiasa

\oldqun (4) Bagaimanakah sesuatu pemikiran kreatif dinyatakan?
\oldex creative (thought), imagination, imaginative, vision
\oldexn Buah fikiran yang kreatif, pandangan luar biasa, hasil daya tanggapan yang tinggi, wawasan

\is 3.2.1.3
\sd Intelligent
\sdn Berakal, Cerdik
\oldis 3.2.1.5
\oldsd Intelligent
\oldsdn Berakal, Cerdik
\dd Use this domain for words that describe a person who thinks well.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan seseorang yang mempunyai daya pemikiran yang cemerlang.
\qu (1) What words describe someone who thinks well?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang mempunyai daya pemikiran yang cemerlang?
\ex intelligent, brainy, bright, brilliant, capable, clever, crafty, discerning, educated, ingenious, insightful, keen, knowledgeable, learned, literate, perceptive, philosophical, profound, rational, scholarly, sharp, shrewd, sly, smart, sophisticated, sound, wily, have a lot of sense, have a high IQ
\exn Berakal, mempunyai kepintaran, berkefahaman, cerdik, mempunyai daya intelek yang tinggi, pandangan yang mendalam, berpengetahuan, berwawasan, pandai
\qu (2) What words describe an intelligent child?
\qun
\ex bright, gifted, precocious, prodigy, whiz kid
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe someone who can think quickly?
\qun
\ex quick, sharp, whiz, be quick on the uptake, be on the ball, think on your feet
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe someone who is intelligent, well-educated, and thinks a lot?
\qun
\ex intellectual, academic, learned, brains, intelligentsia
\exn
\qu (5) What words describe someone who makes good decisions?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang berkemampuan membuat keputusan yang baik?
\ex wise, sagacious, prudent, sensible, good sense, sound judgment
\exn Bijak, cendiakawan, mempunyai kebijaksanaan, berpengalaman, berakal-budi, bijaksana, arif, berfikiran waras, penghakiman yang munasabah
\qu (6) What words refer to the ability to think well?
\qun
\ex ability, capacity, circumspection, cleverness, competence, cunning, discernment, discretion, discrimination, insight, intelligence, IQ, judgment, knowledge, philosophy, profundity, prudence, rationality, reasoning, sagacity, sanity, sense, sensibility, shrewdness, smarts, sophistication, understanding, wisdom, wit
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to a person who thinks well?
\qun
\ex academician, genius, highbrow, illuminati, intellectual, literati, magus, philosopher, priest, prodigy, sage, scholar, scholastic, thinker, able thinker, wise man
\exn

\is 3.2.2
\sd Learn
\sdn Belajar
\oldis 3.2.2
\oldsd Learn
\oldsdn Belajar
\oldis 3.6.4
\oldsd Learn, study
\oldsdn Belajar, Mengkaji

\dd Use this domain for words referring to learning something, acquiring information, gaining knowledge (whether done intentionally or unintentionally), or discovering the answer to some question.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada pengalaman menerima pengetahuan.
\qu (1) What words refer to learning something?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada usaha mengetahui sesuatu?
\ex learn, acquaint, acquire, ascertain, conclude, dawn on, deduce, determine, discover, examine, experience, figure out, find, get (the answer), glean, grasp (mentally), gain (knowledge/understanding), look something up, master, obtain, perceive, pick someone's brain, pick up (a subject), question (v), realize, recognize, reflect, study, get an education
\exn Belajar, menemui, mendapati, menanggapi, menerangi, sedar, memahami, merumuskan, mendapat jawapan atau menemui penyelesaian, menyimpulkan, mengenal
\qu (2) What words refer to learning something no one else knows or something that is secret?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mendapat maklumat berkaitan sesuatu yang belum diketahui oleh sesiapapun atau memperolehi pengetahuan sesuatu rahsia?
\ex discover, discovery, find out about
\exn Menemui (telaga minyak), penemuan (sumber minyak), mengetahui secara peribadi atau menerima maklumat mengenai sesuatu
\qu (3) What words refer to someone who is learning?
\qun
\ex amateur, disciple, layman, student
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe someone who is learning?
\qun
\ex ignorant, uneducated, unlearned
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to someone who has learned?
\qun
\ex graduate, teacher, scholar
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe someone who has learned?
\qun
\ex instructed, learned, well-taught
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to what is learned?
\qun (7) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal sesuatu yang diketahui?
\ex learning, answer, solution, information, conclusion, discovery, discipline, education, initiation, instruction, training
\exn Pengetahuan, jawapan, penyelesaian, maklumat/ makluman, kesimpulan, perjumpaan/penemuan

\oldex learn the whereabouts, find, come upon
\oldexn Mempelajari kedudukan sesuatu tempat atau tempat (kediaman/pekerjaan) seseorang, menemui, menjumpai

\oldex learn, gain knowledge
\oldexn Belajar, mempelajari sesuatu (contohnya: menerima pendidikan sains rumah tangga atau kemahiran hidup)

\oldexn Mengkaji semula (tambah maklumat baru), menyemak semula (buang maklumat usang)

\is 3.2.2.1
\sd Study
\sdn
\oldis 3.2.1.1
\oldsd Investigate
\oldsdn Menyiasat
\dd Use this domain for words referring to studying--to try to learn something.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu tindakan yang diambil untuk memperolehi pengetahuan berkaitan dengan sesuatu hal/ perkara
\qu (1) What words refer to studying something?
\qun
\ex study, analyze, check, concern yourself with, consider, determine, examine, experiment (v), follow, inquire into, investigate, learn, look into/for, look something up, probe, prowl, seek, search, research, study, test, trace, track, trail, try to find out about
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to the process of trying to learn something?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada pengalaman (proses) yang dilalui untuk memperolehi pengetahuan berkaitan sesuatu hal/perkara?
\ex evaluation, examination, experiment (n), investigation, inquiry, quest, study, search
\exn Penyiasatan, penyelidikan, kajian/pengajian, operasi mengeledah
\qu (3) What words refer to the subject that is being studied?
\qun
\ex subject, topic, question
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to studying something a second time?
\qun
\ex review, revise (British)
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a person who studies something?
\qun
\ex astronomer, biologist, botanist, detective, investigator, linguist, mathematician, operative, reconnoiterer, scientist, scout, spy, undercover agent, zoologist
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe someone who likes to study?
\qun
\ex studious, inquisitive
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2.1.1

\oldex investigate, look into/for, inquire into, seek, search, examine, try to find out about, consider, inquire (mentally), trace, study, analyze

\is 3.2.2.2

\sdn Memeriksa
\oldis 3.2.1.1.1
\oldsd Check
\oldsdn Memeriksa

\dd Use this domain for words referring to checking something--when you think something is true or correct, but you aren't sure, you do something to find out if it is true or correct.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berdasarkan soalan berikut
\qu (1) What words refer to checking something to make sure it is true or correct?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal tindakan memeriksa sesuatu untuk mengenal pasti sama ada ianya benar ataupun betul?
\ex check, make sure, make certain, double-check, verify, confirm, check out, crosscheck, see for yourself, check up on
\exn Periksa (memeriksa), mengenal pasti

\is 3.2.2.3
\sd Evaluate, test
\sdn Menilai, Menguji
\oldis 3.2.1.3
\oldsd Evaluate, test
\oldsdn Menilai, Menguji

\dd Use this domain for words referring to the process of determining the truth or falsehood of something, or for determining the nature or value of something.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada proses (urutan tindakan) untuk mengenal pastikan antara kebenaran dan kepalsuan ataupun untuk menentukan ciri-ciri/ nilai sesuatu.
\qu (1) What words refer to the process of determining the truth of something?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada prosedur yang terlibat semasa mengenal pastikan kebenaran sesuatu?
\ex adjudge, adjudicate, assay, assess, assessment, calculate, consider, decide, decision, determine, discern, estimate, evaluate, evaluation, examine, gauge, judge, judgment, judicious, question, regard, render, scrupulous, seek (truth), size, taste, test, testing, view
\exn Menguji, memeriksa, mengendalikan soal selidik, menentukan, mencari (unsur-unsur) kebenaran, membezakan, mengenal pasti, membuat/memberi keputusan (penghakiman berdasarkan penilaian/pengujian yang telah dijalankan)
\qu (2) What words refer to the process of determining the value of something?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada prosedur untuk mengenal pastikan nilai sesuatu?
\ex appraisal, appraise, evaluate, weigh (the merits of)
\exn Menilai (penilaian), Mempertimbangkan (merit: kecermerlangan/kebaikan sesuatu atau jasa seseorang)
\qu (3) What words refer to choosing which of two or more things is better?
\qun
\ex differentiate, differentiation, discriminate, distinguish, rank, rate, rating, separate, hold in esteem, hold up
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the thing that is thought better?
\qun
\ex choice
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to thinking something is not as good as something else?
\qun
\ex discount, disregard, devalue, dismiss
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to the difference between two things?
\qun
\ex difference, distinction, distinctions
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to judging wrongly?
\qun
\ex indiscriminate, miscalculate, misjudge, overestimate, uncritical
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to a person who evaluates?
\qun
\ex referee, tester
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to a report of an evaluation?
\qun
\ex report, reputation, reward
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to being evaluated as better than before?
\qun
\ex move up, rise, climb, shoot up
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2.1.3
\gd I167BFBA5-0785-4BB5-A083-3FFBEFA57897

\exn Dugaan, anggaran, jangkaan, anggapan, andaian, perasaan/ kata hati

\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada sikap sedia belajar?
\ex willing to learn, open your mind, open-minded, open to new ideas, teachable
\exn Sedia belajar (diajar), sikap terbuka, berpandangan luas, sedia mempertimbangkan atau menerima pendapat baru
\qu (2) What words refer to being unwilling to learn?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada sikap tidak sedia belajar?
\ex unwilling to learn, close your mind, closed minded, refuse to learn, won't listen to reason, stubborn, hard heart, mind made up
\exn Tidak sedia belajar (diajar), sikap yang tidak terbuka, pandangan sempit, enggan belajar, tidak menerima penjelasan, degil, berkeras hati, keputusan muktamad

\ex curious, interested
\exn Ingin tahu, berminat

\is 3.2.3
\sd Know
\sdn Tahu, Mengetahui
\oldis 3.2.3
\oldsd Know
\oldsdn Tahu, Mengetahui
\dd Use this domain for words referring to the results of thinking.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada penggunaan minda dan kesannya.
\qu (1) What words refer to knowing something?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mengetahui sesuatu?
\ex know, understand, have information
\exn Tahu (mengetahui), memahami, dalam pengetahuan atau dimaklumkan
\qu (2) What words refer to knowing how to do something?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mengetahui bagaimana melakukan sesuatu?
\ex know how to
\exn Tahu bagaimana (mempunyai pengalaman amali)
\qu (3) What words refer to not knowing something?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal tidak berpengetahuan mengenai sesuatu?
\ex not know, be ignorant, be unaware of
\exn Tidak mengetahui, tidak berpengetahuan langsung (jahil), tidak/belum dimaklumkan atau tidak perasan (sedar)
\qu (4) What words refer to knowing something slightly?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal berpengetahuan cetek sahaja?
\ex be aware of, be acquainted with, know a little, know about
\exn Mula sedar, baru diperkenalkan kepada, berpengetahuan cetek atau ada sedikit pengalaman sahaja, serba tahu sahaja
\qu (5) What words refer to knowing something thoroughly?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal menjadi pakar dalam sesuatu bidang pengetahuan?
\ex knowledgeable, know (something) thoroughly, know well, know all about, familiar with
\exn Pakar sesuatu bidang pengetahuan atau perkara, (betul-betul) sungguh mengenali, mempunyai semua maklumat, sudah biasa atau tahu benar
\qu (6) What words refer to what is known about a topic?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada bidang yang dikenali berkenaan sesuatu topik?
\ex information, body of knowledge, (what is) known
\exn Maklumat, bidang pengetahuan, pengetahuan/ makluman/ ilmu
\qu (7) What words refer to what is not known about a topic?
\qun (7) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada bidang sesuatu topik yang di luar pengetahuan?
\ex unknown
\exn Bidang yang di luar pengetahuan
\qu (8) What words refer to all the things a person knows?
\qun (8) Bagaimana merujuk kepada segala sesuatu yang mampu diketahui oleh seseorang?
\ex knowledge
\exn Pengetahuan, ilmu pengetahuan
\qu (9) What words describe something that can be known?
\qun
\ex knowable
\exn
\qu (10) What words describe something that cannot be known?
\qun
\ex unknowable
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2.3

\oldex knowable

\oldqu (10) What words describe something which cannot be known?

\oldex unknowable
\oldexn Di luar pengetahuan - hal yang tidak atau belum mampu diketahui, difahami dan ditanggapi

\is 3.2.3.1

\sdn Dikenali, Tidak dikenali

\dd Use this domain for words that describe whether or not something is known.

\qun
\ex known, noted, familiar, obvious
\exn
\qu (2) What words describe something or someone that is known to many people?
\qun
\ex well-known, famous, infamous, fame, notorious, public knowledge
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe something or someone that is not known by many people?
\qun
\ex little-known, secret, secrecy, obscure, private, mystery, mysterious
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe something or someone that is not known by anyone?
\qun
\ex not known, unknown, undetected, undiscovered, unexposed, unmarked, unseen
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to making something known?
\qun
\ex acquaint, bare, demonstrate, disclose, discover, divulge, exhibit, explain, expose, indicate, present, make public, publicize, reveal, show, uncover, unfold, unmask, unveil
\exn

\qun
\ex apparent, evident, obvious
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe something that is not easily known?
\qun
\ex unapparent
\exn

\is 3.2.4.1

\sdn Salah Faham

\exn Salah faham, pengertian yang salah, di luar maksud/ sasaran, salah tanggapan, salah dengar, tersalah, menunjukkan sikap kurang/tidak faham, kusut, keliru

\exn Mempunyai kefahaman yang berbeza, membentangkan penterjemahan yang berlainan

\is 3.2.5

\sdn
\oldis 3.2.5
\oldsd Hold an opinion
\oldsdn Berpegangan

\dd Use this domain for situations in which a question or issues are being debated, more than one option is possible, and a person chooses to think in one way about the question or issue.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada situasi-situasi di mana apabila suatu atau beberapa persoalan yang sedang dibahas mempunyai lebih daripada satu pilihan pendapat atau pendirian, seseorang itu akan mengambil keputusan untuk berpegangan tertentu.
\qu (1) What words refer to taking a position toward a question or issue?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan semasa merujuk kepada perihal tindakan memutuskan pendirian tertentu terhadap suatu persoalan?
\ex take a position, lean toward, regard
\exn Berpegangan atau berpendapat tertentu (mengambil pendirian tertentu), condong kepada sesuatu pendirian atau cenderung kepada pendapat tertentu (condong/ cenderung memihak kepada)
\qu (2) What words refer to holding an opinion toward a question or issue?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal memilih pendapat tertentu terhadap suatu persoalan?
\ex hold/have an opinion, hold a view, have a perspective
\exn Berpegangan atau berpendapat, mempunyai pandangan, berwawasan
\qu (3) What words refer to the position a person takes toward a question or issue?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal keputusan seseorang berpendirian tertentu terhadap suatu persoalan?
\ex position, view, outlook, perspective, leaning, opinion
\exn Pendirian, pandangan, sikap (prinsip atau pegangan), visi atau perspektif, kecenderungan, pendapat

\is 3.2.5.1
\sd Believe
\sdn Mempercayai
\oldis 3.2.5.1
\oldsd Believe
\oldsdn Mempercayai
\dd Use this domain for words referring to believing that something is true.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mempercayai sesuatu atau pun seseorang itu adalah benar.
\qu (1) What words refer to believing that something is true?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkubgan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mempercayai sesuatu itu benar?
\ex believe, faith, trust, accept, confidence, give credence to, consider, count on, rely on, reliance, depend on, dependence, swear by, take for granted, bet on, bank on, buy, take at face value, store, stock, take someone's word for it, cling to, be convinced, be dogmatic, follow, heed, receive, think something is true
\exn Percaya, berkepercayaan, beriman kepada, mempunyai keyakinan, memberi pengiktirafan, memberi pertimbangan, boleh diambil kira untuk, berharap kepada, boleh mempercayai, bergantung kepada, menanggung harapan terhadap, sumpah atas, boleh diandaikan atau dianggap (mampu) untuk, boleh mempertaruhkan, melabur dalam, bagai barangan yang boleh dibeli, bagai makanan yang boleh ditelan, boleh diterima daripada pandangan mata kasar (sudut lahiriah), menyimpan (di hati), membudayakan (supaya sesuatu kenyataan atau kebenaran itu kekal (diperturunkan)
\qu (2) What words refer to believing that someone is truthful?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mempercayai seseorang itu benar?
\ex believe in, have confidence in, have faith in, put your trust in, take your word for, pin your hopes on, give the benefit of the doubt
\exn Menaruh kepercayaan kepada (mempercayai), beriman kepada, memberi kepercayaan (percaya) kepada, berdasarkan kata-kata seseorang (sebab percaya kata-katanya akan dikotakan), memusatkan pengharapan kepada, mengandaikan sebagai boleh dipercayai
\qu (3) What words describe something or someone that can be believed?
\qun
\ex believable, convincing, indubitable, undeniable, indisputable, incontrovertible, credible, trustworthy, faithful, dependable, to be depended on, probable, persuasive, plausible, authoritative, reliable, have a ring of truth, sounds right, certain, convincing, sure
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to putting too much faith in something?
\qun
\ex presumption, credulous, gullible, superstitious, unquestioning
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to believing something that other people do not believe?
\qun
\ex belief, superstition, old wives' tale
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to believing something that is not true?
\qun
\ex illusion, fallacy, myth, delusion, mistaken belief, misconception, live in a fantasy world, swallow
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to a person who believes?
\qun
\ex believer, follower
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to something that a person believes?
\qun
\ex belief
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to the reason a person believes something?
\qun
\ex evidence, grounds, basis
\exn

\is 3.2.5.1.1
\sd Trust
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words referring to trusting someone--believing that someone is honest and will not do something bad to you.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to trusting someone?
\qun
\ex trust, believe in, put your trust in, have confidence in
\exn

\qun
\ex trust, confidence, faith, blind faith
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe someone that you can trust?
\qun
\ex trustworthy, responsible, trusted
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe someone who usually trusts other people?
\qun
\ex trusting
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to not trusting someone?
\qun
\ex not trust, distrust, be suspicious of, be suspicious of, view someone with suspicion
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to the feeling that you cannot trust someone?
\qun
\ex distrust, mistrust, suspicion
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe someone who cannot be trusted?
\qun
\ex untrustworthy, can't be trusted, not to be trusted
\exn
\qu (8) What words describe someone who usually does not trust other people?
\qun
\ex distrustful, mistrustful

\is 3.2.5.2
\sd Disbelief
\sdn Tidak Mempercayai
\oldis 3.2.5.2
\oldsd Disbelief
\oldsdn Tidak Mempercayai
\dd Use this domain for words referring to not believing something or someone.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal sikap tidak mempercayai sesuatu atau seseorang.
\qu (1) What words refer to not believing something or someone.
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada sikap tidak mempercayai sesuatu atau seseorang?
\ex not believe, disbelief, unbelief, lack faith in, fail to believe, refuse to believe
\exn Tidak mempercayai, tiada kepercayaan terhadap, ketidakpercayaan, tidak dapat beriman kepada, tidak mampu (boleh) mempercayai, enggan mempercayai/ percaya
\qu (2) What words refer to being unsure whether to believe or not?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal ketidakpastian yang dialami sama ada untuk percaya atau tidak?
\ex doubt, waver, undecided
\exn Keraguan, berbelah bagi dalam pendirian, tidak mampu membuat keputusan
\qu (3) What words describe something or someone that is hard to believed?
\qun
\ex hard to believe, unbelievable, doubtful, incredible, unconvincing, disputable, untrustworthy, unfaithful, undependable, improbable, unpersuasive
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2.5.2

\oldex hard to believe, unbelievable, doubtful, incredible, unconvincing, disputable, untrustworthy, unfaithful, undependable, improbable, unpersuasive
\oldexn Sukar dipercayai, tidak boleh dipercayai, berasa sangsi atau ragu-ragu (amat diragui), sukar diiktirafkan, tidak menyakinkan, boleh dipertikaikan, tidak amanah, tidak setia, tidak boleh diharap, tidak kemungkinan, tidak boleh masuk akal.

\is 3.2.5.3
\sd Doubt
\sdn Keraguan
\oldis 3.2.8.1
\oldsd Doubt
\oldsdn Keraguan
\dd Use this domain for words related to doubt--not being sure if something is true or not.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan keraguan - iaitu ketidakpastian sama ada sesuatu itu adalah benar ataupun tidak.
\qu (1) What words are used of being unsure of the truth of something?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal waktu adanya ketidakpastian berkenaan kebenaran sesuatu?
\ex doubt, doubt the truth of, have doubts, debate in your mind, be skeptical, mistrust, suspect, harbor suspicions, take with a grain of salt
\exn Keraguan, meragui kebenaran sesuatu, mempunyai rasa sangsi, perdebatan minda, curiga, waham, kurang percaya, syak wasangka, masih ragu-ragu
\qu (2) What words are used of doubtful thoughts?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal pemikiran yang dilanda keraguan?
\ex doubt, suspicion, skepticism
\exn Keraguan, kecurigaan, kewahaman
\qu (3) What words refer to a person who doubts?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal seseorang yang ragu-ragu?
\ex doubter, skeptic, agnostic
\exn Orang yang ragu-ragu, pewaham, agnostik (tidak mempercayai kewujudan Tuhan)
\qu (4) What words refer to a person that you doubt?
\qun
\ex suspicious character
\exn

\is 3.2.5.4
\sd Agree with someone
\sdn
\oldis 3.2.5.3
\oldsd Agree
\oldsdn Bersetuju
\oldis 3.2.5.3
\oldsd Agree
\oldsdn Bersetuju
\dd Use this domain for when two people agree on something, think the same way about something, or agree on a decision.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal apabila dua pihak bersetuju dalam sesuatu hal atau sefikir terhadap sesuatu perkara.
\qu (1) What words refer to when two people agree?
\qun
\ex agree, agreement, concur, accede, think the same, think alike, hold the same view, be of the same mind, be of like mind, like-minded, be in accord, be of one accord, be united, be in the same place, be together on something, be with someone, coincide in our thinking
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to two people coming to agreement?
\qun
\ex come to an agreement, come together, ratify a treaty
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the act or state of agreeing?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal persetujuan yang dicapai?
\ex agreement, like-mindedness, cooperation, unity, concord, be in congruity
\exn Persetujuan, sewawasan - bersependapat - ada kesatuan minda, kerjasama, kesatuan
\qu (4) What words refer to a written document expressing agreement?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada suatu dokumen bertulis yang menyatakan persetujuan yang dicapai?
\ex written agreement, peace accord, peace treaty
\exn Persetujuan bertulis, persetujuan berdamai, perjanjian damai,
\qu (5) What words refer to a gesture expressing agreement?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal menyatakan suatu persetujuan melalui gerak-geri jasmani?
\ex shake hands, shake on it, kiss, holding hands, bow, nod in agreement
\exn Berjabat tangan, bercium, berpegang tangan, menundukkan kepala
\qu (6) What words refer to changing your thinking so that you agree with someone else?
\qun
\ex accede, accession, accept, acquiesce, acquiescence, give assent, consent, yield, grant a point
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to two people compromising?
\qun
\ex compromise
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 3.2.5.3

\is 3.2.5.4.2
\sd Protest
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words related to protesting--to say publicly that you do not like something.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to protesting?
\qun
\ex protest (v), object to, remonstrate, speak out against
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to many people protesting?
\qun
\ex storm of protest, outcry against, outcry over, public outcry, boycott
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to someone who protests?
\qun
\ex protester, demonstrator, dissident, marcher, objector
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to something someone protests about?
\qun
\ex protest (n), objection, remonstrance
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to many people protesting in a group?
\qun
\ex protest, demonstrate, march, boycott, riot, in protest
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to when many people protest in a group?
\qun
\ex protest (n), demonstration, march, rally, riot, unrest, civil disobedience, peaceful demonstration, placard
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe something done in protest?
\qun
\ex protest (adj)
\exn
\qu (8) What do people do when they are protesting against something?
\qun
\ex boo (v), boo (n), booing
\exn
\qu (9) What do people say when they are protesting against something?
\qun
\ex Down with (someone/something)! No more (something)!
\exn
\cf Complain; Riot

\gd I2855CDA6-A031-46AA-BF3F-718D94374D46

\is 3.2.5.5
\sd Philosophy
\sdn Falsafah
\oldis 3.2.5.4
\oldsd Philosophy
\oldsdn Falsafah

\dd Use this domain for words referring to a set of beliefs about truth.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada selingkungan kepercayaan terhadap kebenaran.
\qu (1) What words refer to a set of beliefs about truth?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada selingkungan kepercayaan terhadap kebenaran?
\ex philosophy, orientation, frame of reference, worldview
\exn Falsafah, pendirian, sistem rujukan, kaca mata dunia atau pandangan global
\qu (2) What words refer to a person who attempts to define a set of beliefs?
\qun (2) Bagaimanakah merujuk kepada seseorang yang terlibat dalam usaha menafsirkan selingkungan kepercayaan?
\ex philosopher, sage
\exn Ahli falsafah, cendekiawan
\qu (3) What words refer to a group of philosophers?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada segolongan ahli-ahli falsafah?
\ex Epicurean, Stoic, school (of thought)
\exn (a) Puak hedonis - mempunyai fahaman yang mementingkan keseronokan hidup. (b) Puak petapa (aseptik) yang bersikap pelik (eksentrik) - mempunyai fahaman yang mengutamakan penafian diri terhadap keseronokan dan kemewahan hidup. (c) Mazhab-mazhab (puak-puak) fahaman atau falsafah hidup

\oldsdn Memperkenankan

\exn

\exn

\ex admirable, creditable, estimable, honorable, meritorious
\exn

\exn

\exn

\is 3.2.6
\sd Remember
\sdn Mengingati
\oldis 3.2.6

\oldsdn Mengingati
\dd Use this domain for words referring to remembering something you know.

\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mengingati sesuatu?
\ex remember, recall, remind oneself, call to mind, bring to mind, think of, recognize, recognition, recollect, review, come (back) to, mindful, heed, think, in retrospect
\exn Ingat, mengingatkan diri sendiri, memperingati, mengingat kembali, mengenang (budi), mengenal, imbas kembali yang dalam peringatan
\qu (2) What words refer to memorizing something?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal menghafal sesuatu?

\exn

\qun

\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to remembering things that happened in the past?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal memperingati peristiwa-peristiwa pada masa lampau?
\ex reminisce, recall, think back on
\exn Terkenang, teringat kembali, mengingat kembali (semula)
\qu (6) What words refer to the things a person remembers?

\ex memory, recollection
\exn Memori (ingatan)

\is 3.2.6.1
\sd Forget
\sdn Melupakan
\oldis 3.2.6.1
\oldsd Forget
\oldsdn Melupakan
\dd Use this domain for words referring to forgetting something.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal melupakan sesuatu.
\qu (1) What words refer to not remembering something?
\qun (1) Bagaimanakah menyatakan suatu pengalaman di mana sesuatu yang harus diingati itu tidak timbul dalam fikiran langsung?
\ex forget, didn't think of it, overlook, draw a blank, escape me, slip my mind, fly right out of your mind, lose your train of thought, lose track of
\exn Tidak terlintas dalam ingatan, tidak memikirkannya, terlupa
\qu (2) What words refer to failing to remember to do something?
\qun
\ex neglect, omit, let something pass, slip, unmindful, miss
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe someone who has trouble remembering?
\qun (3) Bagaimanakah menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang mempunyai masalah untuk mengingati sesuatu?
\ex forgetful, absentminded
\exn Selalu terlupa, pelupa
\qu (4) What words refer to forgetting many things because of a head injury?
\qun
\ex amnesia
\exn

\exn Berharap, mengharapkan, terkabulnya harapan, hilang harapan, pengharapan berubah menjadi kenyataan, pengharapan yang tidak terkabul, berpuas hati, tidak puas hati, berharap dengan kepastian, berharap tanpa kepastian, berhasrat, mengidamkan atau mengalu-alukan, menunggu dengan penuh harapan
\qu (2) What words refer to something that may happen in the future?
\qun
\ex expectation, prospect, possibility
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to an expectation happening?
\qun
\ex come true, come about, be fulfilled, materialize
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to an expectation not happening?
\qun
\ex not come true, fail to materialize
\exn

\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal adanya rasa mahu atau mengingini sesuatu?
\ex want, desire, wish, long for, yearn, crave, hunger, thirst, be attracted to, fancy, have a fancy for, intent on
\exn Mahu, ada hasrat, ingin, merindukan, mengidamkan, lapar, dahaga, tertarik atau berminat
\qu (2) What words refer to wanting to do something?
\qun
\ex want to, wish you could, aspire to, feel like, hope you can, interested in, raring to, have an urge to
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to something someone wants?
\qun
\ex want (n), desire (n), wish (n), longing, yearning, craving, mania, obsession
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe something that people want?
\qun (4) Bagaimanakah menjelaskan sesuatu yang diingini orang ramai?
\ex desirable
\exn Menarik, sesuai/bersesuaian (dengan tujuan/hasrat)
\qu (5) What words describe something that people don't want?
\qun
\ex unwanted, undesirable
\exn

\is 3.3.1.1
\sd Purpose, goal
\sdn
\oldis 3.3.4.2
\oldsd Goal
\oldsdn Matlamat
\oldis 3.3.4.3
\oldsd Lack goal
\oldsdn Tiada Matlamat
\dd Use this domain for words referring to a goal--something that you want to do or something that you want to happen.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berdasarkan soalan berikut.
\qu (1) What words refer to the purpose of what you are doing?
\qun
\ex purpose, goal, aim (n), design (n), desire (n), destination, end, function, idea, intent, intention, object, objective, plan, the point, proposal, reason, target, use (n)
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to the purpose of something someone says?
\qun
\ex point, implication, mean, be driving at, be trying to say
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the purpose of something like a machine or tool?
\qun
\ex function, use
\exn
\qu (4) What words indicate the purpose of something?
\qun
\ex for, be for, for the sake of, serve to, so, so that, to, toward, with a view to, with the aim of
\exn
\qu (5) What words indicate that something is done or made for a particular purpose?
\qun
\ex be meant to do something, supposed to do something, be intended to do something, be designed to do something
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to trying to reach a goal?
\qun
\ex to strive toward a goal, press on, aim for, endeavor, head for, try to accomplish
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to reaching a goal?
\qun
\ex reach, attain, surpass
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to failing to reach a goal?
\qun
\ex fail to reach, miss, fall short of
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to not having any purpose?
\qun
\ex purposeless, without purpose, lack a goal, aimless, drifting, no direction
\exn

\oldex goal, aim, purpose, desire, intention
\oldexn Matlamat, tujuan, cita-cita, hasrat

\is 3.3.1.2

\sdn Memilih

\oldis 3.3.4.5
\oldsd Choose
\oldsdn Memilih

\dd Use this domain for words related to choosing something--to want one thing (or person) from a group of things, or to choose to do one thing from several possible things you could do.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berdasarkan soalan-soalan berikut.
\qu (1) What words refer to choosing something?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal memilih sesuatu?
\ex choose, select, prefer, decide on, pick, designate, elect, favor, opt for, specify, vote, would rather have
\exn Memilih (membuat pilihan), mengundi untuk, lebih suka atau cenderung memihak (menyokong), membuat keputusan
\qu (2) What words refer to the thing that is chosen?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yang dipilih?
\ex choice, selection, preference, decision
\exn Pilihan, pengundian, kesukaan atau kecenderungan, keputusan
\qu (3) What words refer to the things that could be chosen?
\qun
\ex alternative, option, selection, candidate
\exn

\gd IFED2B7BD-2315-4085-B0A7-2CED988120F3

\is 3.3.1.3
\sd Cast lots
\sdn
\oldis 3.3.1.3
\oldsd Long for, miss
\oldsdn Merindukan, Rindu
\oldis 3.3.4.4
\oldsd Casting lots
\oldsdn Membuang Undi
\dd Use this domain for words referring to casting lots--to make a decision by chance.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal membuat keputusan berdasarkan cara membuang undi (berbanding dengan mengundi).
\qu (1) What is the general term for making a decision by chance?
\qun (1) Bagaimanakan menjelaskan perihal sesuatu keputusan yang diambil berdasarkan peluang atau nasib?
\ex cast lots [in English and many languages there isn't a generic term; 'cast lots' is archaic]
\exn Membuang undi
\qu (2) What methods are used for making a decision by chance?
\qun (2) Apakah cara-cara berdasarkan peluang atau nasib yang digunakan untuk menentukan sesuatu keputusan?
\ex roll a die, flip a coin, draw straws, pick names out of a hat, rock-paper-scissors, pick a card (out of a deck), count off, decide who goes first
\exn Menggunakan dadu pusing atau dadu putar, menjentik (biasanya melambung) duit syiling dan melihat sama ada ia jatuh atas muka depan atau belakang, cabutan jerami (untuk menilik nasib atau meramalkan sesuatu), pilihan (cabutan) nama-nama dari topi secara rawak, batu-kertas-gunting (melalui percubaan antara tiga kemungkinan untuk menentukan pemenang antara dua pihak), pilihan (cabutan) sembarangan daun terup dari susunannya, kira-kira tolak contohnya atas jari-jari pemain (pemenangnya masih ada satu jari yang tinggal selepas tolakan akhir dibuat), siapa terdahulu? - untuk menentukan siapa atau pihak mana yang akan diberi percubaan pertama (atau untuk memulakan suatu pertandingan)
\qu (3) What kind of decisions are made by these methods?
\qun (3) Apakah antara keputusan-keputusan yang diambil berdasarkan cara-cara yang disenaraikan dalam soalan 2?
\ex deciding who goes first in a game, deciding who dies (e.g. who gets the life preserver), deciding who is guilty
\exn Memutuskan pihak mana yang akan memulakan sesuatu permainan atau mendapat percubaan pertama, memutuskan pihak yang harus dikorbankan dan pihak yang hidupnya akan dipelihara, memutuskan pihak yang bersalah
\qu (4) What do people say when a decision has been made?
\qun (4) Apakah antara contoh kata-kata yang biasa menyusuli sesuatu keputusan yang telah dibuat?
\ex X team has won the toss. OK, John goes first. I win. The Lord's will be done. It is the will of the gods. The gods have spoken.
\exn Kumpulan (X) telah menang. Baiklah, Yohanes yang terdahulu. Saya menang. Kehendak Tuhan jadilah. Ini adalah kehendak dewa-dewi (dewa-dewi sudah berbicara).
\qu (5) What is the validating principle behind these methods?
\qun (5) Apakah dasar penerimaan penggunaan cara-cara yang disenaraikan di atas?
\ex fate, chance, God's will, social consensus
\exn Kepercayaan kepada qadar atau untung-nasib, kepercayaan kepada prinsip kemungkinan dan peluang mendapat kejayaan atau keuntungan melalui percubaan dan pertaruhan yang dibuat, kehendak Tuhan, persetujuan masyarakat (budaya masyarakat setempat)

\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal rasa ingin bersama-sama dengan seseorang?
\oldex long for, miss, want to see someone
\oldexn Merindukan, rindu, ingin bersua (berdampingan) dengan seseorang

\oldis 3.3.5.3

\oldsdn Sengaja

\dd Use this domain for words related to doing something deliberately--to intend to do something, as opposed to doing something accidentally.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berdasarkan soalan berikut.
\qu (1) What words refer to doing something deliberately?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal melakukan sesuatu dengan sengaja?
\ex deliberately, on purpose, intentionally, pointedly, make a point of, knowingly, consciously, willfully, mean to do something
\exn Sengaja, dengan sengaja (sesudah kajian dan pertimbangan teliti, berunding dengan pakar dsn), secara terbuka dengan maksud tertentu
\qu (2) What words describe something that is done deliberately?
\qun
\ex deliberate, intentional, conscious, calculated, premeditated
\exn

\qun
\ex accidentally, by accident, by mistake, unintentionally, not mean to do something, inadvertently, unconsciously
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe something that is not done deliberately?
\qun
\ex accidental, unintentional, unconscious, involuntary
\exn

\is 3.3.1.6
\sd Determined
\sdn
\oldis 3.3.5.1
\oldsd Resolve
\oldsdn Berazam
\oldis 6.1.2.3.4
\oldsd Persevere
\oldsdn Tabah
\oldis 7.2.1.6
\oldsd Move purposefully
\oldsdn Tekad bergerak

\dd Use this domain for words related to being determined to do something--deciding to do something and not letting anything stop you.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada bergerak penuh tekad atau bersungguh-sungguh menuju sasaran.
\qu (1) What words refer to being determined to do something?
\qun
\ex determined, aspire, be intent on, be set on, set your mind on, be resolved, mean business, purposefully, tenacious, put yourself into
\exn
\qu (2) What words describe a person who is determined?
\qun
\ex determined, adamant, committed, driven, hard headed, inexorable, inflexible, obdurate, persevering, pertinacious, single-minded, steadfast, strong-willed, stubborn, tenacious, uncompromising
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe a person's behavior that is determined?
\qun
\ex stubborn, steadfast, resolute, dogged, wholehearted
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to being so determined that you are even willing to do something bad?
\qun
\ex go to any lengths, be hell-bent on, whatever the cost, ruthless, stop at nothing
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to the quality of being determined?
\qun
\ex determination, ambition, commitment, drive, endurance, perseverance, pertinacity, resolve, spirit, fighting spirit, steadfastness, stick-to-itiveness, tenacity, will, willpower
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to becoming more determined?
\qun
\ex stiffen your resolve, set your mind on, commit
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to persevering in a task?
\qun (7) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada ketabahan dalam satu tugas?
\ex persevere, give it your best, keep on, hang in there, endure, persist, plod, plug
\exn tabah, memberi yang terbaik, teruskan, tahan, sabar
\qu (8) What words refer to not being determined?
\qun
\ex apathetic, indifference, indifferent, listless, lethargic, neutral, nonchalant, uncaring
\exn
