\is 4.1
\sd Relationships
\sdn Perhubungan
\oldis 4.1
\oldsd Relationships
\oldsdn Perhubungan
\dd Use this domain for words related to relationships between people and groups of people.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to beginning a relationship?
\qun
\ex get acquainted, get to know, start a relationship, develop a relationship, form an association, form a partnership
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to the process of relating to other people?
\qun
\ex relate to, associate with, affiliate with, participate with, partner with, fellowship with, interact with, be acquainted with, work with, collaborate, have a relationship, going together, going out, going steady
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the relationship itself?
\qun
\ex affiliation, alliance, bonding, relationship, relation, association, comradeship, participation, partnership, interaction, fellowship, interpersonal relationship
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to a person in a relationship?
\qun
\ex associate (n), comrade, participant, partner, friend, coworker, colleague, acquaintance, ally, collaborator, fellow (student), age mate, affiliate
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a group of people who have a relationship?
\qun
\ex pair, partnership, association, fellowship
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe a group of people who have a relationship?
\qun
\ex allied, bonded, related, friendly, affiliated, associated
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1
\oldqu (1) What general words refer a relationship between people?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada perihal sesuatu perhubungan yang terjalin sesama manusia?
\oldex relationship, association
\oldexn (Menjalin) Perhubungan, (Menubuhkan) persatuan
\gd I0E79435B-F5FF-4061-81FF-49557BA2AED4

\is 4.1.1
\sd Friend
\sdn
\oldis 4.1.1
\oldsd Friendship
\oldsdn Persahabatan
\dd Use this domain for words related to friendship.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words are used to describe the formation of a friendship?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menerangkan perihal bagaimana terjadinya sesuatu persahabatan?
\ex build a friendship, become friends, befriend, be friendly
\exn Menubuhkan suatu persahabatan, berkawan, menemani, beramah mesra
\qu (2) What words are used to refer to the state of being friends?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal tahap persahabatan?
\ex be friends with, going together, going out, going steady
\exn Berkawan dengan, berteman, bertemu janji, teman lelaki atau teman perempuan yang tetap
\qu (3) What words are used to refer to the friendship itself?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan (-perkataan) yang khususnya merujuk kepada sesuatu persahabatan itu?
\ex friendship
\exn Persahabatan
\qu (4) What words are used to refer to a person who is a friend?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seorang sahabat?
\ex friend, pal, buddy, amigo, soul mate, mate, girlfriend, boyfriend, companion
\exn Sahabat, kenalan, kawan rapat, rakan, teman rohani (teman batiniah), teman, teman perempuan, teman lelaki, teman karib
\qu (5) What are the outward signs of friendship?
\qun (5) Apakah tanda-tanda lahiriah suatu persahabatan?
\ex hold hands, be together, do things together, share, give gifts, show affection
\exn Berganding tangan, berada bersama-sama, bersama-sama melakukan sesuatu, berkongsi-bahagi, beri-memberi, menunjukkan perasaan mesra (bermesra-mesra dengan)
\qu (6) What words describe a friendship?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menerangkan perihal suatu persahabatan?
\ex intimate, intimacy, close, deep, long-standing, old friend, improper
\exn Intim (mesra), kekariban (kemesraan), rapat, dalam, kekal, kawan lama, tidak senonoh (sumbang)
\qu (7) What words describe a friendship that has gone bad?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menerangkan perihal suatu persahabatan yang terjejas?
\ex broken relationship, break up, strained relationship, misunderstanding, co-dependency
\exn Putus hubungan, berpisah, perhubungan yang tegang, salah faham, terjejasnya/ hilang kepercayaan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.1
\gd I646DAB64-5C2F-4F45-8E28-4D13437639D4

\is 4.1.1.1
\sd Girlfriend, boyfriend
\sdn Teman perempuan Teman lelaki
\oldis 4.1.1.1
\oldsd Girlfriend, boyfriend
\oldsdn Teman perempuan Teman lelaki

\dd Use this domain for words referring to a girlfriend or boyfriend.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to a girlfriend or boyfriend?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang teman, lelaki atau perempuan?
\ex girlfriend, boyfriend, partner, lover, mistress, old flame
\exn Teman lelaki, teman perempuan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.1.1
\gd IB40637E5-BE76-4A82-96BB-C55306EE293D

\is 4.1.2
\sd Types of people
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words referring to different types of people.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to male and female people?
\qun
\ex man, woman, boy, girl
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to people of different ages?
\qun
\ex baby, child, youth, adult, elder
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to people of different races?
\qun
\ex yellow, brown, Asian, black, African, white, Caucasian, red, American Indian, Indian
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to a person whose parents are from two different races?
\qun
\ex half-breed
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a person whose parents are from the same race?
\qun
\ex full-blooded
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to a person who belongs to your group?
\qun
\ex one of us, one of our own, one of ours, insider, friend
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to a person who does not belong to your group?
\qun
\ex foreigner, stranger, enemy, foe
\exn
\cf Male, female; Stage of life; Race; Social class
\gd I995751EF-D71B-429C-A4EE-032F5B309BD7

\is 4.1.2.1
\sd Working relationship
\sdn
\oldis 4.1.2
\oldsd Working relationships
\oldsdn Rakan-rakan sekerja

\dd Use this domain for words related to a relationship between people who work together.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal perhubungan yang selain daripada persahabatan. Rakan sekerja, rakan sejabat, perhubungan, hubungan,,persatuan, berurusan dengan, rakan seurusniaga (seurusan, seusaha), setiakawan, kesetiakawanan, peserta, penyertaan, rakan kongsi, perkongsian
\qu (1) What words refer to a relationship between people who work together?
\qun
\ex working relationship, affiliation, association, partnership
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to beginning a working relationship?
\qun
\ex form an association, form a partnership
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the process of relating to other people at work?
\qun
\ex affiliate with, partner with, work with, work together, collaborate
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to a person you work with?
\qun
\ex associate (n), partner, coworker, colleague, collaborator, fellow worker, affiliate
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a group of people who work together?
\qun
\ex partnership, association, office, working group
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.2
\oldqu (1) What words are used to describe the process of beginning a relationship?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang digunakan untuk menerangkan perihal tindakan memulakan sesuatu perhubungan?
\oldex get acquainted, get to know, start a relationship, develop a relationship, form an association, form a partnership
\oldexn Mengenali, mengetahui, mula menjalin suatu perhubungan, mengeratkan (terus menjalin) perhububgan, menubuhkan suatu persekutuan (persatuan), membentuk suatu perkongsian (pakatan)
\oldqu (2) What words are used to refer to the process of relating to other people?
\oldqun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada perihal tindakan berhubung dengan orang lain?
\oldex relate to, associate with, participate with, partner with, fellowship with, interact with, be acquainted with, work with, collaborate, have a relationship, going together, going out, going steady
\oldexn Berhubung dengan, menjalinkan kaitan dengan, bersama-sama menyertai, menemani, bersekutu dengan, berinteraksi dengan, mengenali, berkerja sama dengan, adakan usaha sama, menjalin suatu perhubungan (persaudaraan, pakatan dsbn), berteman dengan, bertemu janji dengan, berteman tetap dengan
\oldqu (3) What words are used to refer to the relationship itself?
\oldqun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu perhubungan itu?
\oldex affiliation, bonding, bonded, relationship, relation, association, comradeship, participation, partnership, interaction, fellowship
\oldexn Sepekerjaan, perjanjian, diikat janji, perkaitan (perhubungan), kaitan (hubungan), usaha sama, setiakawanan, penyertaan, perkongsian (pakatan), interaksi (tindak balas, bertukar-tukar fikiran), bersekutu
\oldqu (4) What words are used to refer to a person in a relationship?
\oldqun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada perihal seseorang yang ada perhubungan dengan pihak yang lain?
\oldex associate, comrade, participant, partner, friend, coworker, colleague, acquaintance, collaborator, fellow (student), agemate
\oldexn Ahli (anggota persatuan - rakan seurusan), setiakawan, peserta, rakan-kongsi (teman), sahabat, rakan sekerja, rakan sejabat, rakan sekenalan, rakan seusaha, rakan sekolah, teman sebaya
\cf Cooperate with
\gd I513771EB-8467-468A-8BC8-E52567E66DF9

\is 4.1.3
\sd Know someone
\sdn
\oldis 4.1.3
\oldsd Acquaintance
\oldsdn Rakan Sekenalan
\dd Use this domain for words referring to knowing someone.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to knowing someone?
\qun
\ex know someone
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to knowing someone, but not knowing him well?
\qun
\ex know someone by sight, be acquainted with, be acquaintances, don't know well, we've met
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to starting to know someone after you have met them?
\qun
\ex get to know, get acquainted
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to someone you know, who is not a friend?
\qun
\ex acquaintance, casual acquaintance
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to knowing about someone, whom you have not met?
\qun
\ex know someone's name, know of someone, have heard the name, have heard of someone, have heard about someone
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.3
\oldqu (1) What words refer to someone you have met but don't know well?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang sudah dikenali tetapi belum menjadi kawan?
\oldex acquaintance, casual aquaintance
\oldexn Rakan sekenalan, kenalan biasa tetapi tidak rapat
\oldqu (2) What words are used of having met someone but not knowing them well?
\oldqun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang menerangkan perihal pengalaman menemui seseorang yang belum kamu benar-benar dikenali?
\oldex be acquainted with, be acquaintances, know (someone), don't know well, we've met
\oldexn Pernah diperkenalkan kepada (berkenalan dengan), rakan sekenalan, mengenal (seseorang), belum benar-benar mengenali (contoh: cuma kenal nama & rupa), kami pernah berkenalan
\oldqu (3) What words are used of knowing about someone but not having met them?
\oldqun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang menerangkan perihal mengenali seseorang yang belum pernah ditemui?
\oldex know someone's name, know of someone, to have heard the name, to have heard of someone, to have heard about someone
\oldexn Kenal namanya, kenal dia, pernah mendengar namanya, pernah dengar fasal dia, pernah dengar perihal dia
\gd I469B0A30-3C26-4CFD-B948-7BB952EEFF41

\is 4.1.3.1
\sd Meet for the first time
\sdn Pertama kali berkenalan
\oldis 4.1.3.1
\oldsd Meet for the first time
\oldsdn Pertama kali berkenalan
\dd Use this domain for words related to meeting someone for the first time.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to meeting someone for the first time?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada perihal pengalaman pertama kali berkenalan dengan seseorang?
\ex meet (for the first time), introduce someone, introduce oneself, introduce each other, be introduced
\exn Pertama kali berkenalan, memperkkenalkan seseorang, memperkenalkan dri, saling memperkenalkan diri, diperkenalkan

\is 4.1.4
\sd Neighbor
\sdn Jiran
\oldis 4.1.4
\oldsd Neighbor
\oldsdn Jiran
\dd Use this domain for words referring to a neighbor--someone who lives nearby.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini bagi lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang-orang yang tinggal di kawaasan yang berdekatan.
\qu (1) What words refer to someone who lives nearby?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang tinggal di kawasan berdekatan?
\ex neighbor, neighbor, next door neighbor
\exn Jiran, jiran tetangga, jiran sebelah
\qu (2) What words describe a good neighbor?
\qun (2) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang jiran yang baik?
\ex good neighbor, neighborly
\exn Jiran (jiran tetangga) yang baik, jiran yang berramah mesra dengan jiran-jiran lain
\qu (3) What words indicate that someone lives nearby?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang memberi erti bahawa seseorang itu yang tinggal di kawasan berdekatan?
\ex be neighbors, live next to each other, live near each other, live in the same neighborhood, live on the same street, live nearby
\exn Berjiran, jiran rumah sebelah, jiran tetangga, jiran sekawasan, jiran sejalanan, jiran
\qu (4) What words refer to the area around your house?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada kawasan sekeliling rumah kamu?
\ex neighborhood, community, our street, our area, subdivision, housing development, compound, apartment complex, district, vicinity, environs
\exn Kawasan sekitar, masyarakat (penghuni) setempat, jalan selaluan, kawasan penduduk setempat, bahagian yang lebih kecil, kawasan pembangunan perumahan, kawasan sekeliling, bangunan tempat kediaman (komplex pangsapuri), daerah, kawasan berhampiran, persekitaran (alam sekitar)

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.4
\cf Location; Area

\gd ID49F2C9D-1B4A-4370-B107-71F9B9FBDC8E

\is 4.1.4.1
\sd Social class
\sdn Lapisan masyarakat
\oldis 4.1.4.1
\oldsd Social class
\oldsdn Lapisan masyarakat

\dd Use this domain for words related to social class.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to social class?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada golongan-golongan yang terdapat dalam suatu masyarakat?
\ex class, caste, background, status, social standing, strata
\exn Lapisan masyarakat, kasta, golongan atasan, golongan bawahan, golongan sebaya
\qu (2) What words refer to a person belonging to a higher class?
\qun
\ex upper class, aristocracy, privileged, elite, titled, posh, your betters, rich
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a person belonging to the middle class?
\qun
\ex middle-class, bourgeois, the bourgeoisie, white-collar
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to a person belonging to a lower class?
\qun
\ex working class, lower class, the masses, blue-collar, humble, popular, underclass, your inferiors, poor
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a person belonging to the same class as you?
\qun
\ex peer
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to moving into a higher social class?
\qun
\ex move up in the world, upwardly mobile, social climber
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe a society that is not divided into classes?
\qun
\ex classless
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.4.1

\is 4.1.5
\sd Unity
\sdn Perpaduan
\oldis 4.1.5
\oldsd Unity
\oldsdn Perpaduan
\dd Use this domain for words related to unity--when a group of people agree with each other and are not fighting.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to the unity of a social group?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal kesatuan sesuatu kelompok masyarakat?
\ex unity, oneness, integration, unification
\exn Perpaduan, kesatuan, integrasi (penyatuan), persatuan
\qu (2) What words refer to unifying a social group or more than one social group?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada usaha menyatupadukan sesuatu lapisan masayarakat tertentu atau semua lapisan dalam suatu masyarakat?
\ex unite, unify, join, merge, blend, fuse, consolidate
\exn Menyatupadukan, mempersatukan, mengabungkan, menyatukan, bercampur gaul, menyepadukan, memperkukuhkan
\qu (3) What words describe a group that is united?
\qun (3) Berikan lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada lapisan masyarakat yang bersatupadu.
\ex united, unified, cohesive, joined, combined, connected, undivided, one in spirit, one in purpose, single-minded
\exn Bersatupadu, bersatu, berikat janji, bergabung (usaha), berhubungan, tidak berbelah bahagi, sejiwa, setujuan, sefikiran
\qu (4) What words describe a person, force, or influence that unifies a group?
\qun
\ex unifying, uniting
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.5
\oldqu (4) What words describe a person, force, or influence which unifies a group?
\oldqun (4) Bagaimana menyatakan perihal seseorang, kuasa atau pengaruh yang boleh menyatukan sesuatu golongan?
\oldex unifying, uniting
\oldexn (Mampu) mempersatukan, (boleh) memyatupadukan
\gd I9AC6DEC6-1B8F-463C-8239-E2ACB93586B1

\is 4.1.6
\sd Disunity
\sdn Ketidaksatuan
\oldis 4.1.6
\oldsd Disunity
\oldsdn Ketidaksatuan
\dd Use this domain for words related to disunity--when a group of people do not agree with each other and are fighting.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to the disunity of a social group?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada ketidaksatuan yang wujud dalam suatu lapisan masyarakat?
\ex disunity, division, discord, dissidence, dissonance, friction, incompatibility, variance, dissension, dissent
\exn Ketidaksatuan, penceraian (contoh: terbelah bahagi dalam tujuan), perbalahan, penentangan, pertelingkahan, perselisihan, ketidaksesuaian, percanggahan, pergaduhan, pembantahan
\qu (2) What words refer to dividing a social group or more than one social group?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal memecah-belahkan suatu atau beberapa lapiasan masyarakat?
\ex divide, sow dissention, set at odds, pit against, part company with, have a falling out, differ, clash, disagree
\exn Memecah-belahkan, menabur benih-benih pergaduhan, menghasut, menjadi batu-api, mengkhianati, berselisih faham, bercanggah, berlawan, menentang
\qu (3) What words describe a group that is disunited?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang digunakan untuk menyatakan perihal suatu golongan yang tidak mempunyai kesatuan?
\ex disunited, divided, divided in spirit, going in different directions, discordant, out of tune, on bad terms, dissenting, factious, at odds, at cross purposes, up in arms, embroiled, torn
\exn Tidak bersatupadu, tiada kesatuan, terbelah bahagi (tidak sefikir), tidak sejiwa sehati, tidak sehaluan, berlaku perbalahan, tidak selaras (selangkah), perhubungan baik yang terjejas (contoh: sebab perasaan dendam, berselisih faham dsbn), sering bergaduh, sukar memperdamaikan (pihak-pihak berkenaan), ada pelbagai pihak pembangkang (mungkin juga ada musuh dalam selimut), tidak sebulat hati bersetuju (tidak sevisi, tidak sewawasan), tidak setujuan, ada puak penentang yang menganas, terbabit kejadian subversif, merabakkan semangat, (kesatuan, kesetiaan, kepercayaan dsbn)
\qu (4) What words describe a person, force, or influence that divides a group?
\qun
\ex divisive, disruptive
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.6
\oldqu (4) What words describe a person, force, or influence which disunifies a group?
\oldqun (4) Bagaimana menyatakan perihal seseorang, kuasa atau pengaruh yang boleh menjejaskan kesatuan sesuatu golongan?
\oldex divisive, disruptive
\oldexn Pengancam perpaduan, pihak subversif (pengganas - mengganggu keamanan)
\gd ID59A84E1-5E12-4CB7-B72B-15C51810AD48

\is 4.1.6.1
\sd Unfriendly
\sdn
\oldis 4.1.6.1
\oldsd Antisocial
\oldsdn Antisosial
\dd Use this domain for words related to being antisocial--when someone does not want to talk to other people or be friends with them.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe someone who is unfriendly?
\qun
\ex unfriendly, cold, inhospitable, hostile, antagonistic, give someone the cold shoulder
\exn
\qu (2) What words describe someone who does not like to be friendly and wants to be alone?
\qun
\ex antisocial, standoffish, distant, aloof, dour, reserved
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe a relationship that is unfriendly?
\qun
\ex unfriendly, cool, strained, frosty, turn sour
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe a place or situation where people are unfriendly?
\qun
\ex unfriendly, unwelcoming, inhospitable, impersonal, forbidding
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.6.1
\oldqu (1) What words refer to being antisocial?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal wujudnya suasana yang bertentangan dengan rukun hidup bermasyarakat?
\oldex be antisocial, unfriendly, standoffish, reserved
\oldexn Antisosial, tidak peramah, tidak suka bergaul, tidak senang (suka) bermesra dengan orang (pihak) lain
\oldqu (2) What words describe a friendship that has gone bad?
\oldqun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menerangkan perihal suatu persahabatan yang terjejas?
\oldex broken relationship, break up, strained relationship, misunderstanding, co-dependency
\oldexn Putus hubungan, berpisah, perhubungan yang tegang, salah faham, terjejasnya/ hilang kepercayaan

\is 4.1.6.2
\sd Set self apart
\sdn Menyendiri
\oldis 4.1.6.2
\oldsd Set self apart
\oldsdn Menyendiri
\dd Use this domain for words related to setting yourself apart from other people and not relating to them.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to setting oneself apart from others and not relating to them?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal tindakan seseorang untuk bersendiri dan tidak bergaul dengan orang lain?
\ex isolate, set self apart, remove, disengage, estrange, reserve, withdraw, quit, resign
\exn Bersendiri, menyendiri, meninggalkan khalayak ramai (beralih ke tempat lain untuk bersendiri), menarik diri daripada suatu penyertaan, merenggankan perhubungan yang wujud, elakkan diri (daripada menjalin kemesraam), mengundur diri, berhenti melibatkan diri, keluar daripada perhatian orang lain (ramai)

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.6.2
\gd IA8B2ABB3-D09F-4FF1-89CE-6AE99F16401C

\is 4.1.6.3
\sd Alone
\sdn Berseorangan
\oldis 4.1.6.3
\oldsd Alone
\oldsdn Berseorangan

\dd Use this domain for words related to being alone.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe a person who is alone?
\qun
\ex alone, on your own, by yourself, unaccompanied, marooned, isolated
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to doing something alone?
\qun
\ex all by yourself, single-handed, solo, in isolation, self-made
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe someone who spends a lot of time alone?
\qun
\ex solitary, loner, recluse, keep to yourself
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the state of being alone?
\qun
\ex solitude, isolation, solitary confinement, privacy
\exn
\qu (5) What words describe someone who is alone and unhappy?
\qun
\ex lonely, lonesome
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to feeling lonely because someone you love is not there?
\qun
\ex miss, want to see someone, feel lonesome, long for someone
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.6.3
\oldqu (1) What words indicate that a person is alone?
\oldqun (1) Bagaimana menyatakan perihal seseorang yang bersendiri?
\oldex alone, by oneself, unaccompanied
\oldexn Berseorangan, bersendirian, tanpa (tidak) berteman - tiada temannya.

\is 4.1.6.4
\sd Independent person
\sdn Seseorang yang berdikari
\oldis 4.1.6.4
\oldsd Independent person
\oldsdn Seseorang yang berdikari

\dd Use this domain for words describing an independent person--someone who does things without other people's help.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe a person who does things without other people's help?
\qun (1) Bagaimanakah merujuk kepada seseorang yang menguruskan hal-hal tanpa bantuan orang lain?
\ex independent, self-reliant, self-sufficient, individualist
\exn Seseorang yang berdikari, tidak bergantung kepada orang lain, tiada kekurangan (seseorang peribadi yang serba lengkap untuk menghadapi sebarang situasi bersendirian), seseorang yang bebas & mampu berfikir & bertindak tanpa dikongkong oleh pendapat pihak lain (mampu berdiri sendiri)

\sd Private, public
\sdn Peribadi, Awam
\oldis 4.1.6.5
\oldsd Private, public
\oldsdn Peribadi, Awam

\dd Use this domain for words describing something that is private--something that only concerns you, and for words describing something that is public--something that concerns many people.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe something that only concerns you?
\qun
\ex private, secret, personal, innermost
\exn

\oldis 4.1.7

\oldsdn Memulakan Suatu Perhubungan

\dd Use this domain for words related to beginning a relationship.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to beginning a relationship?
\qun (1) Bagaimana menyatakan perihal memulakan suatu perhubungan?
\ex begin a relationship, join, affiliate, associate, enlist, enroll, enter, establish, fall in with, sign up, worm your way in, hit it off
\exn Mula menjalin (memulakan) suatu perhubungan, mula melibatkan diri dengan (menyertai) seseorang atau suatu golongan

\ex leave, walk out, desert, break up
\exn Meninggalkan, tidak lagi bertemankan (menemani) seseorang, mengundur diri (daripada janji-janji dsbn), berpisah (putus hubungan)

\qun

\ex show affection, kiss, embrace, hug, hold hands, public display of affection
\exn Menunjukkan kemesraan, mencium, memeluk dengan penuh kemesraan, mendakap, memegang tangan, menyatakan (menunjukkan) rasa kasih sayang di depan orang lain (ramai) - tidak merahsiakan rasa cinta

\is 4.1.9
\sd Kinship
\sdn
\oldis 4.1.9
\oldsd Related by kinship
\oldsdn Perhubungan keluarga
\dd Use this domain for general words for family relationships, not for specific terms.
\ddn Guna domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perhubungan keluarga secara am, bukan secara khusus
\qu (1) What words are used to indicate that two people are related?
\qun (1) Bagaimanakah dua pihak yang mempunyai pertalian keluarga dirujuk?
\ex be related (to someone)
\exn Mempunyai perhubungan (pertalian) keluarga dengan seseorang
\qu (2) What words refer to the relationship among members of a family?
\qun (2) Bagaimanakah perhubungan di antara ahli-ahli keluarga dirujuk?
\ex kinship, relationship, close relation
\exn Kaum kerabat, perhubungan keluarga (tali persudaraan)
\qu (3) What words refer to a member of your family or larger kin group?
\qun (3) Bagaimanakah seseorang ahli keluarga neukleus (kamu sendiri) atau ahli keluarga kamu yang lebih luas dirujuk?
\ex relative, in-law, kinsman, relation, distant relation, distantly related, extended family, folk, house, household, kin, kindred, kinfolk, kinsman, kinswoman
\exn Sanak saudara, kaum kerabat, ipar, mentua, saudara mara
\qu (4) What words refer to groups of people who are related by kinship?
\qun (4) Bagaimana merujuk kepada sekumpulan orang (manusia) yang mempunyai perkaitan keluarga?
\ex family, clan, tribe, nation
\exn Keluarga, puak (suku bangsa), kaum kerabat (suku kaum), bangsa
\qu (5) What words refer to a single generation?
\qun (5) Bagaimana merujuk kepada sesuatu generasi?
\ex generation
\exn Generasi (keturunan)
\qu (6) What words refer to talking to someone in order to discover how you are related to them?
\qun
\ex (none in English)
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.9
\cf Relationships
\gd IE7C58C11-2911-446A-96B0-2113247F3792

\is 4.1.9.1
\sd Related by birth
\sdn Perhubungan baka
\oldis 4.1.9.1
\oldsd Related by birth
\oldsdn Perhubungan baka
\dd Use this domain for words referring to being related by birth--when one of your ancestors and one of someone else's ancestors are the same person.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to being related by birth?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perhubungan baka?
\ex related by blood, be descended from, descent, direct line, lineal descent, consanguine
\exn Perhubungan (pertalian) darah, perkaitan darah (saudara sedarah), keturunan, sezuriat (sebaka)
\qu (2) What words refer to someone who is related to you by birth?
\qun
\ex blood relation
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a listing of your ancestors?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada suatu bentangan senarai nenek moyang kamu?
\ex genealogy, lineage, pedigree, family tree
\exn Keturunan, salasilah, susur-galur, zuriat (asal usul) keluarga
\qu (4) What words refer to inheriting physical traits from your ancestors?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal mewarisi cri-ciri lahiriah secara turun-temurun?
\ex genetics, inherit, heredity, run in the family, pass on, take after, bad blood, genes, breeding
\exn Keturunan baka, mewarisi, sifat turun-temurun, ciri-ciri baka keluarga yang nyata, penyambung warisan, memiliki ciri-ciri seketurunan, keturunan yang jahat, gen (penentu baka), penyambung zuriat

\is 4.1.9.1.1
\sd Grandfather, grandmother
\sdn Datuk, Nenek
\oldis 4.1.9.1.1
\oldsd Grandfather, grandmother
\oldsdn Datuk, Nenek
\dd Use this domain for words referring to grandparents and ancestors.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to the parents of your parents?
\qun (1) Bagaimanakah ibu bapa ibu dan bapa kamu dikenali?
\ex grandparent, grandfather, grandmother
\exn Datuk dan nenek (nenekanda), datuk, nenek (nini)
\qu (2) What words refer to your ancestors?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada atau berkaitan dengan nenek moyang kamu?
\ex ancestor, forefather, forbearer, patriarch, matriarch, progenitor, background, origins
\exn Nenek moyang, datuk nenek, leluhur, ketua (lelaki) kauam kerabat, ketua (perempuan) kaum kerabat, latar belakang, asal usul
\qu (3) What words describe something having to do with your ancestors?
\qun
\ex ancestral, ancestry
\exn

\is 4.1.9.1.2
\sd Father, mother
\sdn Ibu, Bapa
\oldis 4.1.9.1.2
\oldsd Father, mother
\oldsdn Ibu, Bapa
\dd Use this domain for words related to parents.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to your parents?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada ibu bapa kamu?
\ex parent, folks
\exn Ibu bapa, warga (orang, anggota kaum keluarga yang) tua, bapa (ayah, abah), ibu (emak, mak), ayahanda, ibunda
\qu (2) What words refer to your father?
\qun
\ex father, dad, old man, pa, papa, sire
\exn
\qu (3) What words do you use when talking to your father?
\qun
\ex Dad, Father, Daddy, Pop
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to your mother?
\qun
\ex mother, mom, mum, ma, mama
\exn
\qu (5) What words do you use when talking to your mother?
\qun
\ex Mom, Mum, Mother, Mommy, Mummy
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to the state of being a parent?
\qun
\ex fatherhood, motherhood, parenthood
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe something having to do with your parents?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada ibu bapa kamu?
\ex parental, paternal, maternal, fatherly, motherly, parentage
\exn Kedua orang tua (kasih sayang kedua orang tua atau ibu bapa), pihak bapa, pihak ibu, kebapaan, (mempunyai sifat seperti seorang bapa), keibuan (mempunyai sifat seperti seorang ibu), keturunan (baka)
\qu (8) If your father has more than one wife, what do you call his other wives?
\qun (8) Sekiranya bapa kamu mempunyai lebih daripada seorang isteri, bagaimanakah kamu mengelar isteri-isterinya yang lain itu?
\ex father's wife, second wife
\exn Isteri-isteri bapa, isteri (kedua, ketiga, keempat) bapa
\qu (9) If your father dies and your mother remarries, what do you call your mother's second husband?
\qun (9) Sekiranya ibu kamu berkahwin lagi selepas bapa kamu meninggal dunia, bagaimanakah kamu mengelar suami keduanya?
\ex stepfather
\exn Bapa (ayah) tiri, pakcik
\qu (10) If your mother dies and your father remarries, what do you call your father's second wife?
\qun (10) Sekiranya bapa kamu berkahwin lagi selepas ibu kamu meninggal dunia, bagaimanakah kamu mengelar isteri keduanya?
\ex stepmother
\exn Ibu (emak) tiri, makcik

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.1.9.1.2
\gd I44DC42E4-E9C7-4AA9-AC9B-1008385244B1

\is 4.1.9.1.3
\sd Brother, sister
\sdn Abang, Kakak, Adik lelaki, Adik perempuan
\oldis 4.1.9.1.3
\oldsd Brother, sister
\oldsdn Abang, Kakak, Adik lelaki, Adik perempuan
\dd Use this domain for words related to siblings.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to the children of your father and mother?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada anak-anak ibu bapa kamu?
\ex sibling, brother, sister
\exn Saudara kandung (adik-beradik), abang, kakak
\qu (2) What words indicate the order in which your brothers and sisters were born?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada saudara kandung kamu menurut urutan umur?
\ex elder brother, elder sister, younger brother, younger sister
\exn Abang sulong (along), abang, bang ngah (abang yang ledih muda), bang su (abang yang termuda), kakak sulong (kak long), kakak, kak ngah (kakak yang lebih muda), kak su (kakak yang termuda), adik lelaki, adik perempuan (adik bongsu)
\qu (3) What words refer to the children of your father by another mother, or of your mother by another father?
\qun (3) Bagaimanakah anak-anak kepada bapa dan ibu tiri kamu atau anak-anak kepada ibu dan ayah tiri kamu dirujuk?
\ex half-brother, half-sister
\exn (a) Anak-anak bapa dan ibu tiri - Abang, kakak, adik perempuan (lelaki), (b) Anak-anak ibu dan bapa tiri - Abang tiri, kakak tiri, adik tiri, anak-anak pakcik
\qu (4) When your father or mother marries a person who already has children by a previous marriage, what words refer to those children?
\qun (4) Bagaimanakah merujuk kepada anak-anak ibu tiri dan bapa tiri hasil daripada perkahwinan mereka yang lalu?
\ex stepbrother, stepsister
\exn Abang tiri, kakak tiri, adik tiri, anak-anak pakck, anak-anak makcik

\ddn
\qu (1) What words are used to refer to the person you are married to?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang yang telah berkahwin?
\ex spouse, husband, wife, second wife
\exn Pasangan (teman) hidup, suami, isteri, isteri kedua & seterusnya

\oldis 4.1.9.2.2

\oldsdn Mentua
\dd Use this domain for words referring to being related by marriage.
\ddn

\qun (1) Bagaimana menyatakan perihal perhubungan yang dijalin melalui perkahwinan?
\ex be related by marriage
\exn Terjalin suatu perkaitan (perhubungan) keluarga hasil daripada perkahwinan

\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada pihak yang ada kaitan keluarga dengan kamu melalui suatu perkahwinan?
\ex in-law, father-in-law, mother-in-law, brother-in-law, sister-in-law, son-in-law, daughter-in-law

\qu (4) What words describe the relationship between a husband's siblings and his wife's siblings?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perhubungan antara saudara kandung suami dan saudara kandung isteri?

\exn Abang mentua, adik mentua lelaki, kakak mentua, adik mentua perempuan

\is 4.1.9.3
\sd Widow, widower
\sdn Janda, Duda
\oldis 4.1.9.3
\oldsd Widow, widower
\oldsdn Janda, Duda
\dd Use this domain for words referring to widows and widowers. Some languages also have words for a parent who has lost a child, someone who has lost a brother or sister, or a general word for someone who has lost a relative.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words are used to refer to someone whose husband or wife has died?
\qun
\ex widow, widower, dowager
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to the death of a spouse?
\qun (2) Bagaimana menyatakan perihal seseorang yang mengalami kematian teman hidupnya?
\ex be widowed, widowhood, lose your husband/wife
\exn Menjadi janda (balu) - kematian suami, menjadi duda - kematian isteri, kehilangan suami (teman hidup lelaki), kehilangan isteri (teman hidup perempuan)
\qu (3) What words are used when a person marries again?
\qun (3) Bagaimana menyatakan perihal seseorang yang berkahwin sekali lagi?
\ex remarry, second marriage
\exn Berkahwin lagi, melangsungkan perkahwinan keduanya
\qu (4) When a person remarries, what words are used of their first spouse?
\qun (4) Apabila seseorang itu berkahwin lagi, bagaimanakah merujuk kepada pasangan hidup pertama mereka?
\ex first wife, first husband
\exn Isteri pertama, suami pertama
\qu (5) What words refer to someone who has a relative who has died?
\qun
\ex bereaved
\exn

\qu (4) What words refer to a married woman having a child by another man?

\ex (no words in English)
\exn Anak kandung ibu, anak angkat bapa (suami, suami kedua, suami baru) - dengan andaian tunang lelaki, pengantin lelaki atau suami pertama perempuan ini telah mati atau menghilangkan diri tanpa khabar berita sewatu perempuan itu hamil

\is 4.1.9.8
\sd Family, clan
\sdn Kaum keluarga, Puak suku bangsa
\oldis 4.1.9.8
\oldsd Family, clan
\oldsdn Kaum keluarga, Puak suku bangsa
\dd Use this domain for words that refer to social groups composed of related people.

\ex family, nuclear family
\exn Keluarga, kaum keluarga, anggota keluarga
\qu (2) What words refer to the people who live in your house?
\qun (2) Bagaimana dijelaskan perihal kaum keluarga yang tinggal dalam rumah kamu?
\ex household
\exn Rumah tangga, seisi rumah, keluarga serumah

\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada kelompok-kelompok orang yang ada perkaitan keluarga dengan kamu?
\ex tribe, tribal, clan, race
\exn Kaum kerabat, suku bangsa, puak, bangsa
\qu (4) What words describe something about your family?
\qun
\ex family, domestic, run in the family
\exn

\is 4.1.9.9
\sd Race
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words referring to different races of people--the large groups of people in the world that are different in color and appearance.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to a person's race?
\qun
\ex race, color, ethnic group, racial, racially, ethnic, ethnicity
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to a person's race on the basis of their color?
\qun
\ex yellow, brown, black, white, red
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a person's race on the basis of where their ancestors were from?
\qun
\ex Aborigine, African, Arab, Asian, American Indian, Caucasian, Hispanic, Indian, Latin American, Native American
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to mixing the races?
\qun
\ex integration, segregation, multiracial, interracial, cosmopolitan, multicultural, mixed
\exn

\oldis 4.2.1.1
\oldsd Invite
\oldsdn Menjemput
\dd Use this domain for words referring to inviting people to meet together--to say something to someone because you want to meet with them.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words are used of causing people to meet together?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada faktor-faktor yang mempengaruhi seseorang (sejumlah orang) untuk menghadiri suatu pertemuan?
\ex invite, extend an invitation, invite over, ask someone to something, assemble, bring together, call up, call together, call a meeting, collect, convene, gather, mobilize, muster, rally, request someone's presence, round up, summon, bid someone come
\exn (Ada pihak yang) menjemput, (ada pihak yang) memberi (kad) jemputan, dijemput, (ada pihak yang) mengumpul atau mempertemukan, (ingin) menghadiri perhimpunan, diarah berkumpul, diminta (ada yang meminta untuk) berhimpun, (ada pihak yang) menelefon, diarah bertemu, ada panggilan untuk bermesyuarat, penglibatan dalam persidangan, seruan menyertai suatu majlis (contoh: konvokesyen), (ada pihak yang) menghimpun, (ada pihak berkuasa yang) menuntut kehadiran, (ada) perjumpaan besar - perangsang kesatuan, (ada pihak yang) mengundang kehadiran seseorang (contoh: tetamu (khas) kehormat, (ada pihak yang) mendorong kedatangan seseorang
\qu (2) What words refer to what is said or written when inviting someone?
\qun
\ex invitation
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to someone who has been invited?
\qun
\ex invited guest
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.2.1.3

\is 4.2.1.4
\sd Visit
\sdn Melawat
\oldis 4.2.1.8
\oldsd Visit
\oldsdn Melawat
\dd Use this domain for words related to visiting someone.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to going to someone's place to see them?
\qun (1) Bagaimanakah menjelaskan tindakan yang diambil untuk ke tempat seseorang dengan tujuan berjumpa dengannya?
\ex visit, pay a visit, call, call on, drop by, drop in on, go round, make the rounds, look in on, see, spend time with, stop by
\exn Melawat, berkunjung ke, pergi ke pejabat atau rumah (seseorang itu), membuat kunjungan (lawatan) ke, melapangkan masa untuk bersama-sama (seseorang itu)
\qu (2) What words refer to the event of visiting someone?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada peristiwa melawat seseorang?
\ex visit, appointment, interview, stay, time with, visitation
\exn Lawatan, temu janji, temu ramah, menumpang (bercuti di), mengambil cuti (masa) untuk bersama-sama
\qu (3) What words refer to agreeing to visit?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal bersetuju untuk membuat lawatan?
\ex make an appointment, arrange a visit
\exn Berjanji untuk bertemu (menentukan suatu temu janji atau temu ramah), mengatur suatu lawatan (kunjungan)
\qu (4) What words refer to visiting over a night?
\qun (4) Bagaimanakah menjelaskan perihal lawatan lebih daripada sehari?
\ex stay overnight, stay with, have a sleepover
\exn Bermalam (di suatu tempat), bermalam bersama-sama, tinggal (di suatu tempat) sehingga keesokan hari.
\qu (5) What words refer to a visitor?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang melawat?
\ex visitor, guest, houseguest, overnight visitor, caller
\exn Pelawat, para jemputan, tetamu, pengunjung yang tinggal sehingga keesokan hari (pelawat yang akan bemalam di suatu tempat)
\qu (6) What words refer to the person visited?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang yang dilawat?
\ex host, hostess
\exn Tuan rumah (penyambut tetamu lelaki), isteri tuan rumah (penyambut tetamu peremuan)
\qu (7) What words refer to a visitor who stays for a long time but doesn't pay or help with the work?
\qun
\ex freeload, freeloader, sponge, sponger
\exn

\is 4.2.1.6
\sd Participate
\sdn
\oldis 4.2.1.6
\oldsd Stance relative to group
\oldsdn Pendirian seseorang peribadi dalam kumpulan
\oldis 4.2.1.7
\oldsd Bystander
\oldsdn Pemerhati sahaja
\dd Use this domain for words related to participating in a group--to do things with a group.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe a person's participation in a group?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan untuk menjelaskan perihal penglibatan seseorang dalam suatu kumpulan?
\ex full, complete, enthusiastic, whole-hearted, with reservations, half-hearted, hesitant, reserved, doesn't have his heart in it, involved
\exn (Menyokong, memberi perhatian) sepenuhnya, lengkap (contoh: menyertai semua kegiatan dari awal hingga akhir), bersemangat, sepenuh hati, tidak sepenuhnya (menurut apa yang difikir sesuai dan sewajarnya sahaja), tidak sepenuh hati (bagaikan penyapu baru, hangat-hangat tahi ayam atau melepaskan batuk ditangga sahaja), dengan ragu-ragu, tidak ramah, tiada minat
\qu (2) What words describe a person's stance toward a group?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan perihal pendirian seseorang terhadap suatu kumpulan?
\ex for, against, opposed, hold back, be on the fringes
\exn Menyokong, membantah, menentang, menarik diri, meminggir
\qu (3) What words describe a person's role in a group?
\qun (3) Apakah antara perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan peranan seseorang dalam suatu kumpulan?
\ex ringleader, follower, hanger-on, adherent
\exn Pemimpin (ketua), pengikut, oportunis (ikut untuk mencari kesempatan bagi kepentingan dirinya sahaja), penyokong
\qu (4) What words describe a person's relationship with a group?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan perhubungan yang wujud di antara seseorang itu dengan suatu kumpulan?
\ex join with, hesitate to join, stand apart, stand aloof
\exn Ada penglibatan (penyertaan), ragu-ragu melibatkan diri atau menyertai, mengasingkan diri, menjauhkan diri (tiada minat atau tiada rasa mesra - rasa dingin)
\qu (5) What words refer to a person who is not involved in a group or activity?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang tidak melibatkan diri dalam suatu kumpulan atau aktiviti-aktiviti yang dianjurkan?
\ex bystander, onlooker, spectator, wall flower
\exn Pemerhati sahaja tiada sebarang penglibatan, pemberita suatu kejadian atau pengadil suatu permainan, penonton

\is 4.2.1.7
\sd Crowd, group
\sdn Perkumpulan tanpa struktur
\oldis 4.2.1.4
\oldsd Crowd, group
\oldsdn Perkumpulan tanpa struktur
\dd Use this domain for words referring to a crowd or group of people.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to a crowd?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada suatu perkumpulan tanpa struktur?
\ex crowd, group, congregation, bunch of people, horde, mass of people, gang, mob, multitude, host, crush of people, throng, clique, rabble, horde, army, scores, thousands, swarm, body of people, crew, knot, pack, batch, band, party, company, team
\exn Orang ramai, perkumpulan, perhimpunan, sebilangan orang yang terkumpul, segerombolan, rakyat jelata, rombongan (gang), sekumpulan manusia (pemogok) yang marah, jumlah yang tidak terkira, sejumlah yang besar, terlalu ramai orang sehingga terasak-asak, beramai-ramai sehingga penuh sesak, berpuak, sekumpulan perusuh, segembala, seangkatan, sejumlah orang, beribu-ribu, terlampuu ramai jumlahnya (legion), sekelompok manusia, sepasukan, seikatan, sekawanan, segerakan, sebarisan, segolongan
\qu (2) What words describe a crowd?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan untuk mengambarkan suatu perkumpulan (tanpa struktur)?
\ex huge, large, crowded
\exn Sangat besar (jumlahnya), (bilangan) besar, sangat sesak (penuh sesak, ramai)

\is 4.2.2.1
\sd Ceremony
\sdn Upacara
\oldis 4.2.2.1
\oldsd Ceremony
\oldsdn Upacara
\dd Use this domain for words referring to a ceremony.
\ddn
\qu (1) What general words refer to a ceremony?
\qun (1) Bagaimana memberi penjelasan umum berkaitan dengan suatu acara rasmi yang melibatkan segolongan masyarakat?
\ex ceremony
\exn Upacara, istiadat
\qu (2) What types of ceremonies are there?
\qun (2) Beri contoh upacara-upacara yang mungkin dilangsungkan
\ex anniversary, banquet, baptism, birthday party, carousal, celebration, christening, closing ceremony, commemoration, confirmation, consecration, convention, dance, dedication, feast, festivity, fete, funeral, funfest, gala, game night, graduation, homecoming, inauguration, induction, initiation, launching, memorial, naming ceremony, opening, grand opening, parade, party, reception, recognition, reenactment, retirement, toast, trade fair, wake, wedding
\exn Perayaan (Deepavali), pesta (Pesta Kaamatan, Hari Kebangkitan Kristus), temasya, sambutan (hari jadi), perkahwinan, sambutan hari ulang tahun, sambutan pulangnya seseorang (anak, suami, bapa, kawan dsn) atau segolongan orang (perajurit, ahli-ahli sukan, para pelajar dsn) pembaptisan bayi, upacara menamakan seseorang, pembaptisan, upacara pengesahan, perarakan, upacara penabalan, upacara pelancaran rasmi, upacara pembukaan (suatu tempat), upacara pembukaan yang hebat, upacara perasmian (anggota-anggota baru), acara tari-menari, istiadat pengebumian,, istadat pra -pengebumian (berjaga-jaga semalam suntok sebelum pengebumian mayat), ‘Hari Peringatan' (biasanya untuk para perajurit yang terkorban kerana mempertahankan ibu pertiwi), istiadat pentahbisan (penyucian), perlantikan, (hari) pengijazahan, jamuan persaraan, malam perlawanan (pertandingan), majlis makan besar-besaran, jamuan makan (kenduri), pesta hiburan atau jualan (luar bangunan) untuk tujuan amal lazimnya, malam (upacara, acara) penghargaan (contoh: hari bapa, hari ibu, hari guru hari pekerja dsbn), malam (upacara) ucap tanniah (selamat dsbn), hari libur am untuk memperingati jasa-jasa seseorang tokoh atau peristiwa dalam sejarah yang penting (contoh: Hari TYT, Maulidur Rasul, Hari Wesak, Hari Krismas & Hari Kebangsaaan atau Hari Merdeka), upacara merayakan pengubalan kerajaan (baru) yang berdemokrasi atau upacara melakonkan babak-babak suatu perjuangan (contoh: babak-babak perjalanan (kesengsaraan) Yesus Kristus memilul salib (Station Of The Cross)), contoh: upacara penyerahan bayi untuk dinaungi berkat Tuhan atau upacara kebaktian (persembahan diri kepada) - lazimnya suatu perlayanan atau perlantikan khusus, persidangan, pameran (contoh: hari pameran sejarah sesebuah institusi atau tokoh-tokoh sejarah ataupun karya-karya agung tempatan) atau pesta ria sekolah, pameran usahaniaga, pesta ria tempatan, kampung, mukim, daerah: contoh - pesta tamu dsbn), pesta ria peringkat negeri (contoh: pesta gawai, pesta pelancongan dsbn), upacara penutupan
\qu (3) What words describe a ceremony?
\qun
\ex solemn
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to specific holidays?
\qun
\ex Christmas, New Years, Thanksgiving, Easter, Good Friday, Independence Day, Memorial Day, Labor Day, Washington's Birthday, Valentine's Day, Mothers Day
\exn

\is 4.2.3
\sd Music
\sdn Muzik
\oldis 4.2.3
\oldsd Music
\oldsdn Muzik
\dd Use this domain for words related to music.
\ddn
\qu (1) What general words refer to music?
\qun
\ex music, musical
\exn
\qu (2) What styles of music are there?
\qun
\ex style, pop, rock, country western, jazz, folk music, classical, longhair, modern, popular, chamber music, march, symphony, opera, ballet, musical, dance number, canned music
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a piece of music?
\qun
\ex piece of music, music piece, song, number, selection, encore
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to part of a piece of music?
\qun
\ex movement, introduction, bar, finale
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a piece of music meant to be played or sung by one person?
\qun
\ex solo
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to a piece of music meant to be played or sung by two, three, or more people?
\qun
\ex duet, trio, quartet, quintet
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe the sounds of music?
\qun
\ex scale, tune, melody, melodic, harmony, chord, pitch, soft, pianissimo, loud, forte, crescendo, rhythm, rhythmic, beat, time
\exn

\is 4.2.3.2
\sd Play music
\sdn
\oldis 4.2.3.2
\oldsd Playing music
\oldsdn Bermain Muzik
\dd Use this domain for words related to playing music.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words are used of playing music?
\qun (1) Apakan perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal bermain muzik?
\ex play music/a piece, perform, hold a concert, make music, read music, play by ear, improvise
\exn Bermain muzik (memainkan sebuah karya…), mempersembahkan (sebuah karya agung), mengadakan suatu persembahan konsert (pertunjukan muzik)
\qu (2) What is a musical event called?
\qun (2) Bagaimana merujuk kepada suatu peristiwa yang bercorak muzik?
\ex concert, performance, rendition, recital, revue
\exn Konsert, pertunjukan, persembahan
\qu (3) What equipment is used in playing music?
\qun (3) Apakah antara peralatan yang digunakan semasa memberikan suatu persembahan muzik?
\ex musical instrument, music stand, riser, baton
\exn Alat muzik, tripod (kuda-kuda) muzik untuk merujuk kepada nota muzik (tempat letak karangan muzik), penyangga (contoh: piano - tempat meletakan karangan muzik)
\qu (4) Where is music played?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan suatu pertunjukan muzik?
\ex concert hall, opera house, music hall, auditorium, band stand, choir loft, orchestra pit
\exn Dewan pertunjukan (konsert), dewan muzik, auditorium (dewan khas untuk penonton-penonton sesuatu acara termasuk pertunjukan muzik), pentas berbumbung khas (di tempat terbuka) untuk sepasukan pancaragam memberikan persembahan mereka, pentas kumpulan koir, tempat duduk para penonton orkestra dalam panggung
\qu (5) What words refer to adjusting an instrument so that it plays correctly?
\qun
\ex tune, in tune, out of tune, sharp, flat, warm up
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to a machine used to record and play back music?
\qun
\ex phonograph, record player, tape deck, boom box
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe someone who likes to listen to music?
\qun
\ex music lover, critic
\exn
\qu (8) What words describe how a person plays music?
\qun
\ex performance, execution, touch, expression, fingering, keep time
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.2.3.2

\is 4.2.3.3
\sd Sing
\sdn Nyanyi
\oldis 4.2.3.3
\oldsd Sing
\oldsdn Nyanyi
\dd Use this domain for words related to singing.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to singing?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal menyanyi?
\ex sing, serenade, yodel, chant, croon, burst into song, wail, warble
\exn Nyanyi (menyanyi), menyanyikan lagu cinta (lelaki kepada perempuan), bernyanyi (bersiul) dengan suara bergetar, menyanyi (yodel) seperti orang gunung Swis (suara pihak lelaki yang sering berubah daripada nada biasa kepada nada tinggi seperti suara perempuan), berdikir (dengan iringan rentak muzik yang berulang) atau menyanyikan puji-pujian (mazmur) atau lagu agama dengan nada tinggi rendahnya menurut not (muzik) yang sama, meletus dalam nyanyian - tiba-tiba (terberangsang sehingga) bernyanyi
\qu (2) What words refer to singing without using words?
\qun (2) Bagaimana merujuk kepada perihal bernyanyi tanpa bersenikata?
\ex hum, whistle
\exn Berdengung, memdodoi, bersiul
\qu (3) What words refer to a person who sings?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang bernyanyi?
\ex singer, vocalist, soloist, minstrel
\exn Penyanyi, biduan (biduanita), penyanyi solo, penyanyi kembara
\qu (4) What words refer to a group of people singing together?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada sekumpulan orang yang bernyanyi bersama-sama?
\ex choir, chorale, singing group, duet, trio, ensemble
\exn Koir, jemaah (umat) Kristian, kumpulan penyanyi (kugiran), paduan suara (berduet), sekumpulan tiga (3) penyanyi, sepentas atau seluruh rombongan para penghibur (penyanyi)
\qu (5) What words refer to something that is sung?
\qun
\ex song, singing, tune, melody
\exn
\qu (6) What types of songs are there?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada jenis-jenis lagu?
\ex lullaby, hymn, psalm, carol, national anthem, lament, ballad, funeral dirge
\exn Dodoian, lagu him (penyembahan), mazmur, puji-pujian hari Krismas (Natal), lagu kebangsaan atau lagu negeri, lagu ratapan, balada (lagu yang bertemakan suatu cerita)
\qu (7) What words refer to a part of a song?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada bahagian-bahagian dalam sesebuah lagu?
\ex verse, chorus, theme, note, melody, harmony
\exn Sebaris senikata lagu, serangkap senikata (sebuah korus) untuk dinyanyikan bersama, tema (tajuk), not, irama, nada-nada selaras (yang berharmoni)
\qu (8) What words describe how well a person sings?
\qun (8) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan bagaimana merdunya nyanyian seseorang itu?
\ex beautiful singing voice, can't carry a tune in a bucket, sing on/off key
\exn Suara yang merdu (nyanyian yang indah kedengaran), langsung tidak dapat mengikut nada nyanyian (mungkin sebab kecacatan deria pendengaran), tidak mampu menyanyikan irama lagu dengan sempurna - penyampaian lagu & irama yang tidak sempurna.
\qu (9) What words describe how high or low a person sings?
\qun (9) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan tinggi rendahnya nada atau suara seseorang yang bernyanyi?
\ex soprano, alto, baritone, bass
\exn Soprano - nada suara tertinggi bagi perempuan, alto - nada suara yang rendah antara tenor & soprano, nada suara tertinggi lelaki, tenor - nada suara terendah perempuan bariton - nada suara antara tenor & bes, bes - nada suara terendah bagi lelaki
\qu (10) What words describe whether or not people are singing the same thing together?
\qun (10) Bagaimana menjelaskan perihal samada sesebuah nyanyian itu dinyanyikan bersama dengan baik?
\ex sing in unison, sing in harmony, sing the melody/harmony, keep time
\exn Bernyanyi (tidak bernyanyi) dengan satu suara, nyanyian mereka itu kedengaran sangat merdu - berharmoni (tidak merdu, tidak berharmoni), mereka serirama (tidak seirama) mendendangkan lagu itu

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.2.3.3
\oldqu (5) What words refer to something which is sung?
\oldqun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yang dinyanyikan?
\oldex song, singing, tune, melody
\oldexn Lagu, rentak, nada (not muzik), irama
\gd IDE6B15D3-6409-4998-B03D-903133F4AD70

\is 4.2.3.4
\sd Musician
\sdn Ahli muzik
\oldis 4.2.3.4
\oldsd Musician
\oldsdn Ahli muzik
\dd Use this domain for words related to a musician.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to a person who performs music?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang mempersembahkan suatu pertunjukan bercorak muzik?
\ex musician, singer, player, performer, band member, choir member
\exn Ahli muzik, penyanyi, pemain alat muzik, ahli pancaragam, anggota koir
\qu (2) What is a group of musicians called?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada sepasukan ahli muzik?
\ex choir, ensemble, singing group, soloist, duo, trio, quartet, band, dance band, concert band, marching band, brass band, orchestra, full orchestra, string quartet, chamber orchestra
\exn Koir, sepentas (semua) para penghibur (artis), rombongan penyanyi, para penyanyi solo, penyanyi duet, sekumpulan tiga penyanyi, sekumpulan empat orang penyanyi, pancaragan - kugiran yang berserta, sepasukan para penari, sepasukan ahli pancaragam konsert, serombongan pancaragam perbarisan, kumpulam muzik, orkestra penuh, sekumpulan empat (4) pemain alat muzik bertali empat (4)
\qu (3) What words refer to a person who leads a group of musicians?
\qun
\ex director, concertmaster, bandleader
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe a good or bad musician?
\qun
\ex have an ear for music, have a good ear, maestro, tone deaf
\exn

\is 4.2.3.5
\sd Musical instrument
\sdn
\oldis 4.2.3.5
\oldsd Musical instruments
\oldsdn Alat-alat muzik
\dd Use this domain for words referring to musical instruments and people who play a particular instrument.
\ddn
\qu (1) What is the general term for musical instrument?
\qun (1) Bagaimanakah alat-alat muzik dirujuk pada amnya?
\ex musical instrument, band instrument
\exn Alat-alat muzik, peralatan muzik pancaragam
\qu (2) What are the types of instruments that have strings that you pluck?
\qun (2) Apakah antara lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan jenis-jenis alat muzik bertali?
\ex stringed instrument, strings, piano, harp, guitar, banjo, violin, fiddle, viola, cello, bass fiddle
\exn Alat muzik bertali, tali-tali (dawai atau sintetik) alat muzik, piano (dalmnya bertali seperti kecapi), kecapi, gitar, banjo, biola, viola, selo (biola besar)
\qu (3) What are the types of instruments that you hit?
\qun (3) Apakah antara lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan jenis-jenis alat muzik yang dipalu?
\ex percussion instruments, drum, snare drum, bass drum, tympani, cymbal, bell, xylophone, marimba, rattle, castanet, bangle, jingle
\exn Pelbagai (set) peralatan bunyi-bunyian dipalu, gendang (tabuh), gendang samping berserta tali-tali usus, genderang, gendang belanga (timpani) gembereng, loceng, alat muzik bersegi tiga, zailofon, marimba (alat muzik seperti zailofon), alat muzik yang menghasilkan bunyi gemerencang semasa dipalu, kastanat (sepasang kayu berbentuk separuh bulat yang dipasangkan pada jari dan dihantuk untuk mengeluarkan bunyi gemeretak menurut rentak muzik), gong, rebana (bergemerincing waktu dipalu)
\qu (4) What are the types of instruments that you blow into?
\qun (4) Apakah antara jenis-jenis alat-alat muzik yang menghasilkan bunyi-bunyian sewaktu ditiup?
\ex wind instruments, winds, reeds, organ, flute, clarinet, oboe, brass instruments, horn, trumpet, cornet, bugle, trombone, French horn, baritone horn, tuba, harmonica, bagpipes, pipe
\exn Alat-alat muzik yang ditiup, tiupan, organ, seruling, klarinet, sejenis serunai, alat-alat muzik tiupan yang diperbuat daripada loyang (tembaga), hon (tetuang), trompet, kornet (trompet sederhana besar), begol (trompet kecil), trombon (sejenis trompet), hon Perancis, hon bariton, tuba, alat muzik tiupan besar yang menghasilkan bunyi nada yang rendah, harmonika
\qu (5) What words refer to playing a musical instrument?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal memainkan sesuatu alat muzik?
\ex play, pluck, fiddle, blast, beat
\exn Bermain (piano), memetik (gitar), menggesek (biola), meniup (trompet), memalu (gendang)
\qu (6) What words refer to a person who plays a musical instrument?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang memainkan sesuatu alat muzik?
\ex instrumentalist, player, pianist, violinist, drummer, trumpeter, flutist
\exn Pemain alat muzik tanpa iringan penyanyi, peniup trompet (sangkakala), pemalu (pemain) gendang, pemain piano
\qu (7) What words describe the sound made by a musical instrument?
\qun (7) Bagaimana menjelaskan bunyi yang dihasilkan daripada sesuatu alat muzik?
\ex blast (of a trumpet), blare, crash (of a cymbal), timbre
\exn Letusan bunyi (sangkakala) yang bergemuruh, cetusan bunyi yang memekakkan, gemerencang (gembereng)
\qu (8) What words refer to the parts of musical instruments?
\qun
\ex mouthpiece, bell, key, keyboard, drumstick, reed, bow, string, fret, pick, organ pipe
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.2.3.5
\gd I91DDF495-A28B-4A32-90DC-6F997D0CD069

\is 4.2.4
\sd Dance
\sdn Tarian
\oldis 4.2.4
\oldsd Dance
\oldsdn Tarian
\dd Use this domain for words related to dancing.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to dancing?
\qun
\ex dance
\exn
\qu (2) What are the types of dances?
\qun (2) Apakah antara jenis-jenis tarian yang ditarikan?
\ex barn dance, folk dance, square dance, ballet, waltz, tap-dancing
\exn Tarian orang kampung (contoh: waktu pesta menuai), tarian rakyat tempatan (contoh tarian suku bangsa tertentu), sejenis tarian masyarakat barat dalam bulatan atau empat segi besar, tarian balet, tarian waltz
\qu (3) What are the parts of a dance?
\qun (3) Apakah gerakan-gerakan dalam suatu tarian?
\ex dance step, swing, lead, follow
\exn Langkah tarian tertentu, berpusing, langkah yang mendahului, langkah yang menyusuli
\qu (4) What words refer to the people who dance?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal orang-orang yang menari?
\ex dancer, dance partner, chorus line, dance team
\exn Penari atau para penari, teman menari, lagu tarian, kumpulan penari
\qu (5) Where are dances held?
\qun (5) Di manakah tempat berlangsungnya acara-acara tari-menari?
\ex dance hall, dance floor
\exn Dewan tarian, tempat yang dikhaskan untuk menari

\is 4.2.5
\sd Drama
\sdn Drama
\oldis 4.2.5
\oldsd Drama
\oldsdn Drama
\dd Use this domain for words related to drama.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to a type of drama?
\qun
\ex drama, play, skit, comedy, tragedy, musical, melodrama, parody, suspense, film, movie, cinema, show
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to acting in a drama?
\qun
\ex act, enact, reenact, go on stage
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to performing as a particular character?
\qun
\ex play a part, portray, role, part
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the people who act?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal orang-orang yang berlakon?
\ex actor, actress, star, performer, extra, director, stagehand
\exn Pelakon lelaki, pelakon wanita, artis, pelakon tambahan, direktor (pengarah), krew (pasukan pekerja) pementasan
\qu (5) What words refer to the most important actor or actress?
\qun
\ex star, co-star, star in, play the lead
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to all the actors?
\qun
\ex cast
\exn
\qu (7) What words indicate that a drama has a particular actor in it?
\qun
\ex star (v), feature, with, be in, appear in
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to a person who writes plays?
\qun
\ex playwright, play writer, dramatist
\exn
\qu (9) What are the parts of a drama?
\qun (9) Apakah bahagian-bahagian dalam suatu pertunjukan drama?
\ex performance, act, scene, intermission, curtain call
\exn Pertunjukan, lakonan, adegan (episod, babak), jeda, pelakon yang diminta tampil ke depan tirai untuk menerima penghargaan atau penghormatan (tepukan gemuruh) para penonton
\qu (10) What words refer to a place where a drama is performed?
\qun
\ex theater, cinema, stage, set, on location
\exn
\qu (11) What words refer to the things used in a drama?
\qun
\ex prop, scenery, backdrop, curtain
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to acting with too much emotion?
\qun
\ex overact, ham it up
\exn

\oldexn Drama, sandiwara, lakonan pendek dan melucukan, komedi (lawak jenaka), tragedi (sandiwara sedih), persembahan drama bercorak muzik, melodrama (lakonan yang berakhir dengan suasana yang gembira), lakonan yang sangat menarik perhatian (kerana para penonton sentiasa teragak-agak apa yang akan berlaku seterusnya dan pada akhirnya) pertunjukan filem, tayangan bergambar

\is 4.2.6.1
\sd Game
\sdn Permainan
\oldis 4.2.6.1
\oldsd Game
\oldsdn Permainan
\dd Use this domain for words referring to games. Some languages do not make a distinction between "Games" and "Sports."
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan pelbagai permainan. Ada bahasa pengantara yang tidak membedakan antara pelbagai jenis permainan dengan acara-acara sukan.
\qu (1) What words refer to a game?
\qun
\ex game
\exn
\qu (2) What types of games are there?
\qun
\ex card game, gambling game, board game
\exn
\qu (3) What are the names of specific board games?
\qun
\ex bingo, blackjack, bridge, cards, checkers, chess, charades, craps, dice, dominoes, gin, hearts, jacks, lotto, mahjongg, marbles, Monopoly, Parcheesi, poker, roulette, solitaire
\exn
\qu (4) What are the names of specific children's games?
\qun
\ex catch, hide-and-seek, hopscotch, leapfrog, mumblety-peg, tag
\exn
\qu (5) What are the parts of games?
\qun (5) Apakah benda-benda berkaitan yang digunakan dalam suatu permainan?
\ex piece, game piece, playing piece, die, dice, card, pack of cards, board
\exn Peraturan-peratuan permainan, objek-objek permainan (buah catur contohnya), dadu, buah dadu, daun terup, papan kayu, sintetik, logam atau lamam web
\qu (6) What words refer to playing a game?
\qun
\ex play
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to the people who play games?
\qun (7) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang-orang yang terlibat dalam sesuatu permainan?
\ex player, contestant, team members, captain, star
\exn Pemain, petanding, para anggota suatu pasukan, kapten, pemain handalan, bintang atau juara
\qu (8) What words refer to play against someone?
\qun
\ex play against, be against, versus
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to the people you play against?
\qun
\ex opponent, opposition, rival
\exn

\is 4.2.6.1.1
\sd Card game
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words related to a particular game. The example words are from the card games. If you do not play card games in your culture, you can rename this domain and use it for one of your games. Add other domains for each of your games.
\ddn
\qu (1) What is the game called?
\qun
\ex card game, poker
\exn
\qu (2) What is one game called?
\qun
\ex hand
\exn
\qu (3) What is a group of games called?
\qun
\ex game
\exn
\qu (4) What is a player called?
\qun
\ex player
\exn
\qu (5) What is each side called?
\qun
\ex partners
\exn
\qu (6) What events make up the game?
\qun
\ex shuffle cards, deal cards, play, lead, follow suit, trump, call, take a trick
\exn
\qu (7) What equipment is used to play the game?
\qun
\ex card, deck, suit, heart, diamond, club, hand, trick, spade, kitty
\exn
\gd IAC4A936E-6C05-4e73-8D40-DFE4223B47FA

\is 4.2.6.1.2
\sd Chess
\sdn Permainan catur
\oldis 4.2.6.1.2
\oldsd Chess
\oldsdn Permainan catur

\dd Use this domain for words related to a particular game. The example words are from the game of chess. If you do not play chess in your culture, you can rename this domain and use it for one of your games. Add other domains for each of your games.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan yang digunakan untuk suatu permainan tertentu. Contoh yang diberikan adalah permainan catur. Sekiranya catur bukan permainan masyarakat setempat kamu, ubahkan nama domain ini kepada pelbagai jenis permainan yang ada. Jika perlu, gunakan domain tambahan untuk setiap permainan budaya yang penting dalam masyarakat kamu itu.
\qu (1) What is the game called?
\qun (1) Beri nama permainan itu.
\ex chess, chess game
\exn Catur, permainan catur
\qu (2) What is one game called?
\qun (2) Bagaimana merujuk kepada satu acara permainan?
\ex chess match
\exn Perlawanan catur (antara sepasang peserta sahaja)
\qu (3) What is a group of games called?
\qun (3) Sekiranya pertandingan itu melibatkan sejumlah permainan, bagaimana menjelaskannya?
\ex chess tournament
\exn Pertandingan catur (antara beberapa pasangan peserta)
\qu (4) What is a player called?
\qun (4) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang yang bermain catur?
\ex chess player, grand master
\exn Pemain catur, juara pemainan catur
\qu (5) What is each side called?
\qun (5) Bagaimana merujuk kepada sepasang pertanding yang saling berlawan?
\ex white, black
\exn Pihak putih, pihak hitam
\qu (6) What events make up the game?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada gerakan-gerakan yang diambil dalam suatu permainan pada keseluruhannya?
\ex opening move, opening, move, queen to king's knight 4, advance, castle, capture, take, lose a piece, check, checkmate, concede
\exn Gerak permulaan, bermula, menggerakkan buah catur tertentu, menggerakkan buah menteri ke tempat buah catur berkepala kuda, melangkah maju, tir, tawan, menduduki, kehilangan buah catur, kedudukan raja pihsk lawan yang terancam, raja pihak lawan terkepung, menyerah kalah
\qu (7) What equipment is used to play the game?
\qun (7) Apakah bahan-bahan permainan catur?
\ex chess board, square, white square, black square, chess piece, king, queen, rook, knight/horse, bishop, pawn
\exn Papan catur, segi empat, segi empat putih, segi empat hitam, buah catur, raja, menteri, tir, buah berkepala kuda, biskop, buah catur yang paling kecil

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.2.6.1.2

\is 4.2.6.2
\sd Sports
\sdn Olahraga
\oldis 4.2.6.2
\oldsd Sports
\oldsdn Olahraga
\dd Use this domain for words related to sports.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to sports?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yan merujuk kepada perihal bersukan?
\ex sport, sports, organized sports, athletics, pro sports, amateur sports
\exn Sukan, olahraga, acara kesukanan yang dianjurkan, para olahragawan & olahragawati, olahraga kategori (kelas) profesional, olahraga kategori pelatih (amatur)
\qu (2) What words refer to specific sports?
\qun
\ex football, soccer, basketball, tennis, track, track and field, ping pong, badminton, baseball, hockey, ice hockey, boxing, wrestling, running, cricket, golf,  gymnastics, race
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a sports event?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada suatu acara kesukanan?
\ex sports event, sporting event, game, match, bout
\exn Acara kesukanan, acara olahraga, permainan, pertandingan, perlawanan
\qu (4) What words refer to a group of sports events?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada serangkaian acara-acara kesukanan?
\ex series, Olympics, tournament, tourney, meet, double-header, triple-header, season
\exn Siri (rentetan, rangkaian), Sukan Olimpik, pertandingan, perjumpaan para olahragawan & olahlagawati untuk bertanding, acara terjun balik kuang 2 kali dengan kepala mendahului, acara terjun menjungkir balik 3 kali dengan kepala mendahului, musim atau masa berlangsungnya pertandingan-pertandingan tertentu
\qu (5) What are the parts of a sports events?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan penyeleralasan acara-acara sukan?
\ex starting bell/buzzer, first quarter, second quarter, first half, half time, final bell/buzzer
\exn Loceng istarat permulaan sesuatu acara, suku masa pertama, suku masa kedua, separuh masa pertama, separuh masa (waktu rehat pada pertengahan masa suatu pertandingan), loceng isyarat berakhirnya masa pertandingan.
\qu (6) What is a person called who participates in sports?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang peserta acara sukan tertentu?
\ex athlete, player, starting line up, substitute, bench, coach, captain, referee, trainer, professional, amateur
\exn Olahragawan (wati), pemain, barisan para-peserta yang sedia pada permulaan sesuatu acara, pengganti, sebangku para pengadil, jurulatih, kapten, pengadil, profesional (pemain yang mahir), pelatih
\qu (7) What is a group of players called?
\qun (7) Bagaimana merujuk kepada sekumpulan pemain tertentu?
\ex team, club
\exn Pasukan, kelab (persatuan)
\qu (8) What is a group of teams called?
\qun (8) Bagaimana merujujk kepada sekumpulan pasukan-pasukan para olahragawan (wati)?
\ex league, conference, association
\exn Liga, persidangan, persekutuan
\qu (9) What is the leader of a team called?
\qun (9) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan pemimpin sepasukan pemain?
\ex coach, to coach a team, call time out, captain, to captain a team
\exn Jurulatih (penasihat), melatih sepasukan pemain, pengadil-penjaga masa, kapten, menjadi ketua pasukan
\qu (10) What is the staff of a team called?
\qun (10) Selain daripada jurulatih, siapakah yang akan dilantik untuk menjadi sebahagian daripada staf sokongan sepasukan pemain atau olahragawan dan olahragawati?
\ex assistant coach, trainer, recruiter
\exn Pembantu jurulatih, jurulatih (-jurulatih) tambahan, pegawai yang merekrutkan para pelatih
\qu (11) What words describe a player?
\qun
\ex athletic, acrobatic, competitive, star
\exn
\qu (12) What do athletes do?
\qun (12) Apakah yang mungkin dikakukan oleh para olahragawan (wati)?
\ex play, compete, competition, struggle, engage in a sport/contest, participate, exercise, physical exercise, train, training, calisthenics, warm up, workout, break the rules, pull ahead
\exn Bermain, bertanding, bersedia untuk suatu atau beberapa pertandingan, berjuang mendisiplinkan diri waktu berlatih, melibatkan diri dalam sesuatu permainan atau pertandingan, bergiat menyertai, bersenam, membuat senaman jasmani, melatih para amatur, memberi latihan, mematuhi atau tidak mematuhi peraturan, terus memajukan diri (meningkatkan prestasi pencapaian sesuatu kejayaan)
\qu (13) What words refer to the goal of a sport?
\qun
\ex goal, score
\exn
\qu (14) What words are used of the outcome of a game?
\qun (14) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada keputuan sesuatu permainan atau pertandingan?
\ex win, lose, tie, defeat, become champion, win the prize, finish the race, finish well, winner, loser
\exn Menang, kalah, seri, tewas, menjadi juara, memenangi hadiah, tamat perlumbaan, pencapaian yang cemerlang-tamat dengan baik atau pencapaian rekod baru, tampil sebagai pemenang, pihak yang kalah
\qu (15) What are the winners and losers called?
\qun (15) Bagaimana merujuk kepada pihak-pihak yang menang atau kalah dalam sesuatu permainan atau pertandingan?
\ex winner, champion, loser, first place winner, second place, runner up, second runner up
\exn Pemenang, juara, pihak yang ditewaskan, pemenang tempat pertama (johan), pemenang tempat kedua (naib juara atau naib johan), pemenang tempat ketiga
\qu (16) What awards are given to the winner?
\qun (16) Apakah jenis-jenis hadiah yang disediakan untuk seseorang atau pihak pemenang?
\ex prize, cup, trophy, wreath, flowers, medal, gold medal, silver medal, bronze medal, blue ribbon, prize money, champion's belt, applause, cheers, plaudits, kudos, fame
\exn Hadiah, piala, sekalung bunga, sejambak bunga, pingat, pingat emas, pingat perak, pingat gangsa, reben biru, hadiah dalam bentuk kewangan (cek), tali pinggang juara, tepukan para hadirin, sorak-sorai para peminat & penyokong, tepok sorak para hadirin, penghormatan, nama baik (kemasyhuran)
\qu (17) What equipment is used in sports?
\qun (17) Apa yang digunakan semasa bersukan?
\ex uniform, ball, clock, scoreboard
\exn Pakaian seragam, bola, jam randik, layar perak atau skrin elektonik yang menunjukkan skor sesuatu permainan atau pertandingan termasuk juga kedudukan para petanding atau (kumpulan) negara yang bertanding
\qu (18) What is the place called where sports are played?
\qun (18) Di manakah para olahragawan (wati) bersukan?
\ex playing field, track, court, arena, stadium, gym, gymnasium
\exn Padang sukan, kawasan bertanda untuk acara lumba lari, gelanggang sesuatu acara, arena, stadium, gim, gimnasium
\qu (19) What are the parts of the playing field?
\qun (19) Apakah bahagian-bahagian tertentu yang dikaitkan dengan sebuah padang sukan?
\ex court, line, lane, out of bounds, goal, finish line
\exn Gelenggang setiap acara, garisan-garaisan penentu, lorong-lorong untuk para pelumba lari, kawasan larangan - kawasan luar gelanggang, kawasan mencapai gol, garis penamat
\qu (20) What is the person called who enforces the rules?
\qun (20) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan pihak penguatkuasa peraturan-peraturan sesuatu acara permainan atau pertandingan?
\ex referee, to referee, referee's whistle, umpire, to umpire, official, commissioner, timekeeper, to keep time, call time, stop play, to rule
\exn Pengadil suatu acara sukan, mengadili, wisel pengadil, pengadil suatu permainan, pegawai sukan, persuruhjaya, penjaga waktu, pemberitahu waktu - panggilan waktu bermula, panggilan berhenti rehat, panggilan waktu tamat masa, mengarah berhentinya suatu pertandingan atau permainan, menguatkuasakan peraturan untuk mengatasi sebarang masalah pelanggaran dan suasana tidak tenteram (pergaduhan)
\qu (21) What is a person called who watches sports?
\qun (21) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang atau sekumpulan penonton sukan?
\ex fan, crowd, cheerleaders, pep club
\exn Peminat, penonton, para penonton (orang ramai), para penyokong (memberi perangsang dengan tepok sorak mereka), ahli-ahli kelab (penaung) sesuatu pasukan
\qu (22) What do fans do?
\qun (22) Apakah yang dilakukan oleh para peminat?
\ex root, yell, cheer, shout encouragement, support their team, boo the referee
\exn Memberi tepokan, meneriakkan sokongan atau bantahan, bersorak-sorai memberi perangsang, menyorakkan sokongan, memberi dorongan, menaikan semangat pasukan yang disokong, mencemuh - tunjuk rasa tidak setuju atau tidak puas hati terhadap keputusan pengadil dengan sorakan ‘boo'
\qu (23) What is a person called who comments on sports?
\qun (23) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang yang memberi ulasan perihal sukan?
\ex commentator, announcer, sportscaster, reporter
\exn Penulas sesuatu peristiwa kesukanan, juruhebah siaran langsung acara-acara sukan, pemberita dunia sukan, juruwarta hal ehwal kesukanan

\oldqun (2) Apakah jenis-jenis olahraga yang ada?
\oldex football, basketball, soccer, tennis, track, track and field, pingpong, badmitten, baseball, hockey, icehockey, boxing, wrestling, running, cricket
\oldexn Bola sepak, bola keranjang, tenis, acara lumba lari, acara lumba lari & acara padang, permainan ping-pong, badminton, besbol, hoki, hoki ais, bertinju, bergusti, berlari, kriket

\is 4.2.6.2.1
\sd Football, soccer
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words related to a particular sport. The example words are from the sport of football (also called soccer). If you do not play football in your culture, you can rename this domain and use it for one of your sports. Add other domains for each of your sports.
\ddn
\qu (1) What is the sport called?
\qun
\ex football, soccer
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to a game?
\qun
\ex match
\exn
\qu (3) What are the parts of a game?
\qun
\ex half
\exn
\qu (4) What is a person called who participates in the game?
\qun
\ex forward, fullback, goalie, guard, halfback, striker, sweeper, wing
\exn
\qu (5) What is a group of players called?
\qun
\ex team
\exn
\qu (6) What is a group of teams called?
\qun
\ex league
\exn
\qu (7) What is the leader of a team called?
\qun
\ex coach, to coach a team, captain, to captain a team
\exn
\qu (8) What is the staff of a team called?
\qun
\ex coach, referee
\exn
\qu (9) What do the players do?
\qun
\ex pass, score
\exn
\qu (10) What equipment is used in the game?
\qun
\ex net, ball
\exn
\qu (11) What is the place called where the game is played?
\qun
\ex field
\exn
\qu (12) What are the parts of a playing area?
\qun
\ex line, out of bounds
\exn
