\is 4.2.6.2.2
\sd Basketball
\sdn
\oldis 4.2.6.2.1
\oldsd Sport#1
\oldsdn Sukan

\dd Use this domain for words related to a particular sport. The example words are from the sport of basketball. If you do not play basketball in your culture, you can rename this domain and use it for one of your sports. Add other domains for each of your sports.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan sukan tertentu. Contoh yang diberikan dalam domain ini adalah perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan sejenis sukan iaitu, permainan bola keranjang. Sekiranya permainan ini tidak wujud dalam budaya hidup masyarakat setempat kamu, gantikan tajuk domain ini dan tambahkan domain lain untuk acara-acara sukan yang dimainkan dalam masyarakat kamu.
\qu (1) What is the sport called?
\qun (1) Apakah jenis-jenis sukan yang dimain dalam masyarakat kamu?
\ex basketball, b-ball
\exn Bola keranjang
\qu (2) What words refer to a game?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sejenis sukan yang dimain?
\ex basketball game, game
\exn Bola keranjang, permainan bola keranjang
\qu (3) What are the types of games?
\qun (3) Apakah jenis-jenis sukan yang dumainkan?
\ex half-court, full-court, pick up game
\exn Sukan separuh gelenggang, sukan seluruh gelenggang, sukan rekreasi (belajar sambil main bukan untuk bertanding)
\qu (4) What are the parts of a game?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan penyeleralasan suatu permainan?
\ex tip off, first quarter, second quarter, first half, half time, buzzer
\exn Tanda -tanda isyarat (bermula, berhenti, berlaku pelanggaran peraturan) suku masa pertama, suku masa kedua, separuh masa pertama, separuh masa (waktu rehat pada pertengahan masa permainan), bunyi loceng isyarat sebagai tanda tamatnya masa bermain.
\qu (5) What is a person called who participates in the game?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang menyertai suatu permainan sukan?
\ex basketball player, star, center, forward, guard, substitute, bench
\exn Pemain bola keranjang, pemain bintang, pemain di bahagian tengah gelengang, pemain barisan depan, penjaga tiang atau kawasan gol, pengganti, sebangku para pengadil atau pengadil
\qu (6) What is a group of players called?
\qun (6) Bagaimana merujuk kepada sekumpulan pemain sukan tertentu?
\ex basketball team
\exn Pasukan bola keranjang
\qu (7) What is a group of teams called?
\qun (7) Bagaimana merujujk kepada sekumpulan pasukan-pasukan pemain sukan tertentu?
\ex league, conference, association, National Basketball Association
\exn Liga, persidangan, persatuan (persekutuan), Persatuan Nasional Bola Keranjang
\qu (8) What is the leader of a team called?
\qun (8) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan pemimpin sepasukan pemain?
\ex coach, to coach a team, captain, to captain a team
\exn Jurulatih (penasihat), melatih sepasukan pemain, kapten, mengetuai sepasukan pemain
\qu (9) What is the staff of a team called?
\qun (9) Selain daripada jurulatih, siapakah yang akan dilantik untuk menjadi sebahagian daripada staf sokongan pasukan para pemain suatu sukan itu?
\ex assistant coach, trainer, recruiter, referee, timekeeper
\exn Pembantu jurulatih, jurulatih tambahan, pegawai yang merekrutkan pelatih-pelatih baru, pengadil, penjaga masa
\qu (10) What do the players do?
\qun (10) Apakah yang mungkin dikakukan oleh para pemain suatu sukan?
\ex play basketball, shoot, shoot a free throw, score a basket, three point play, assist, block a shot, dribble, pass the ball, catch, screen, set up a play, run a play, jump, rebound, hit the boards, tip in, stuff, double dribble, walk, step out of bounds, throw out of bounds, foul, technical foul, charge, steal the ball, fast break, guard, play defense, play offense, substitute, huddle up, throw the ball in
\exn Bermain bola keranjang, menjaringkan bola, peluang menjaringkan bola kerana pelanggaran pihak lawan, berjaya mendapat mata gol, membantu, menahan jaringan bola, memantul bola, melontar bola kepada anggota sepasukan, sambut bola, menonton permainan pasukan di kaca layar, merancang strategi permainan, berlatih bermain seperti yang dirancangkan, melompat, pantulan bola, lontaran bola yang terkena pada papan bola keranjang, pukulan ringan untuk menjaringkan bola, memastikan bola masuk dalam jaringan sepenuhnya, dua pantulan bola, berjalan, memasuki kawasan larangan atau luar gelanggang, bola terlontar ke luar gelanggang, berlaku pelanggaran waktu bermain, salah teknik, membuat tuduhan, merampas bola, rehat sejenak waktu, menjaga, mempertahankan pihak lawan daripada menjaringkan bola, bermain kasar, menggantikan pemain yang penat, tercedera atau yang tidak dibenarkan bermain lagi, para pemain sepasukan saling mendekati untuk mempertahankan bola supaya terlepas daripada tentangan pihak lawan - sehingga berjaya mendapatkan mata gol, melontar bola masuk ke dalam (jaringan gol)
\qu (11) What equipment is used in the game?
\qun (11) Apa yang digunakan semasa bersukan?
\ex basketball, hoop, net, backboard, uniform, basketball shoes, referee's whistle, clock, scoreboard, bench
\exn Bola keranjang, tiang gol yang bergelung (tempat jaring dipasang untuk memasukkan gol), jaring, papan di belakang jaring gol (papan bola keranjang), pakaian seragam, kasut sukan (khusus untuk main bola jaring atau bola keranjang), wisel pengadil, jam randik, layar perak atau skrin elektonik yang menunjukkan skor sesuatu permainan atau pertandingan termasuk juga kedudukan para petanding atau (kumpulan) negara yang bertanding, bangku pengadil (pemain tambahan, pengganti)
\qu (12) What is the place called where the game is played?
\qun (12) Di manakah suatu acara sukan itu dimainkan?
\ex basketball court, arena, gym, gymnasium
\exn Gelanggang bola keranjang, arena, dewan sukan, dewan masyarakat Nota: gim & gimnasium hanya untuk latihan dan senaman jasmani
\qu (13) What are the parts of a playing area?
\qun (13) Apakah bahagian-bahagian yang dikaitkan dengan kawasan permainan suatu sukan tertentu?
\ex court, line, out of bounds, key, free throw line, jump circle
\exn Gelanggang, garisan-garisan penentu, kawasan luar gelanggang - kawasan larangan, kawasan strategik, garisan gelanggang yang menandakan kawasan di mana pemain bebas menjaringkan bola untuk mendapat mata gol, kawasan bulatan di mana pemain dibenarkan melompat untuk menjaringkan bola

\oldqun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesiri acara sukan atau permainan?
\oldex basketball tournament, basketball season
\oldexn Pertandingan bola keranjang, musim perlawanan bola keranjang

\is 4.2.6.3

\sdn Bersenam
\oldis 4.2.6.3

\oldsdn Bersenam

\dd Use this domain for words related to exercise.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to doing something in order to stay healthy and become stronger?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal melakukan sesuatu dengan tujuan menjaga kesihatan diri dan memperkuatkan tubuh jasmani?
\ex exercise, get exercise, train, work out, keep fit
\exn Bersenam, berlatih, mengikuti suatu rancangan menjaga kesihatan (contoh: aerobik) dengan sepenuhnya atau menggunakan kemudahan-kemudahan latihan bersenam dengan sepenuhnya untuk memperkuatkan tubuh jasmani

\is 4.2.6.4
\sd Gambling
\sdn Berjudi
\oldis 4.2.6.1.1
\oldsd Gambling
\oldsdn Berjudi

\dd Use this domain for words related to gambling.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to gambling?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada kegiatan berjudi?
\ex gamble, gambling, gaming, bet, place a bet, wager
\exn Berjudi, giat berjudi, membuat pertaruhan, bertaruh
\qu (2) What types of gambling games are there?
\qun (2) Apakaj jenis-jenis perjudian yang ada?
\ex cards, dice, lottery, roulette
\exn Permainan daun terup, permainan buah dadu, perjudian yang menggunakan buah dadu di atas meja yang berputar
\qu (3) What other kinds of events do people typically bet on?
\qun (3) Apakah acara-acara lain yang juga melibatkan suatu pertaruhan?
\ex cockfight, horse race
\exn Acara ayam berlaga, acara lumba kuda
\qu (4) What words refer to a person who gambles?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang berjudi?
\ex gambler, bookie
\exn Kaki judi, penerima pertaruhan
\qu (5) What words refer to a person's chances of winning?
\qun
\ex odds
\exn

\is 4.2.7
\sd Play, fun
\sdn Bermain, berseronok
\oldis 4.2.7
\oldsd Play, fun
\oldsdn Bermain, berseronok
\dd Use this domain for words related to playing and fun.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words are used of play?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang dikaitkan dengan perihal bermain untuk tujuan berseronok?
\ex play, have fun, goof off, frolic, amuse oneself/others, amusement, play games, caper, gambol, disport
\exn Bermain, berseronok, berlawak jenaka, bergurau senda, menghiburkan lima deria sendiri dan orang lain., penghiburan, melibatkan diri dalam permainan-permainan, aktiviti-aktiviti, melompat-lompat, berfoya-foya (bermain-main)
\qu (2) What words refer to the things people play with?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada benda-benda mainan?
\ex toy, doll, plaything, bauble, puzzle, kite, ball, top, trifle, trinket, stilts, jump rope
\exn Permainan kanak-kanak, anak patung (boneka), alat-alat mainan, barang-barang yang cantik dan berkilat (kerana murah dan menarik perhatisn), teka-teki, layang-layang, bola, gasing, hal-hal yang tidak penting, barang-barang perhiasan yang kecil dan kurang berharga
\qu (3) What words refer to people who play?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada orang-orang yang suka bermain-?
\ex player, playmate
\exn Bersifat kebudak-budakan (suka bermain tetapi tidak mahu bertanggungjawab), bermain mata (bermain kayu tiga) teman sepermainan (bagi kanak-kanak) pelacur, gundik
\qu (4) What words describe a person who plays?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan untuk menyatakan perihal seseorang yang suka bermain-main?
\ex playful, frolicsome, mischievous, frisky, prankish, jolly, rollicking
\exn Suka bermain-main, suka bergurau senda, nakal, lincah, suka berkelakar, suka berfoya-foya, suka berseronok
\qu (5) Where do people play?
\qun (5) Orang biasa bermain-main di mana?
\ex playground
\exn Padang permainan

\is 4.2.8
\sd Humor
\sdn Kebolehan berlucu
\oldis 4.2.8
\oldsd Humor
\oldsdn Kebolehan berlucu
\dd Use this domain for words related to humor.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to humor in general?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang dikatkan dengan perihal berlucu pada amnya?
\ex humor, comedy, comic relief, fun, caprice, fooling, kidding, joshing, wittiness, salt, whim, drollery, jocularity, levity, mirth
\exn Kebolehan berlucu, cerita jenaka, mengelikan hati, melegakan, seronok, tingkah laku beragam (bagaikan orang yang mahir berlakon bermacam-rupa komedi) bermain-main, suka berolok-olok, suka bergurau-senda, pintar dan lucu, membangkitkan semangat, rekaan cerita (yang tidak wajar) yang melucukan (berkaitan dorongan hati -mengusik hati, menggelikan), kelakar, kelucuan (lawak-jenaka), tidak bersungguh-sungguh (cuma bergurau & bermain-main), keriangan (periang - boleh merangsangkan gelak ketawa)
\qu (2) What words refer to a person's sense of humor (ability to joke)?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang biasa dikaitkan dengan kebolehan seseorang untuk berlucu dan berasa lucu?
\ex sense of humor, (have a real) funny bone, (be/have a great) wit
\exn Kebolehan berlucu dan berasa lucu, senang berlucu, menunjukkan kepintaran berlucu
\qu (3) What words refer to something said humorously?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yang dinyatakan dengan lucu?
\ex joke, pun, play on words, word play, riddle, jest, gag, wisecrack, witticism, pleasantry, banter, badinage, retort, repartee, riposte, ridicule, quip, one-liner, flash of wit, comeback, gag, crack
\exn Gurauan, kata-kata lucu yang mempunyai bunyi yang sama, suka bermain dengan kata-kata, kata-kata yang mengusik atau mengelikan hati (seloka jenaka), teka-teki, gurauan, kelakar, kata-kata pintar dan lucu, kata-kata yang mencerminkan kepintaran (seseorang) berlucu, kata-kata untuk beramah mesra, gurau senda, sendaan, jawapan pintar & tajam yang lucu, jawapan tepat berunsur kelucuan, tangkisan pantas berunsur kelucuan, ejekan, sindiran (yang menyebabkan pihak yang disindir atau diejek diketawakan orang), senafas kata-kata yang dilafaskan begitu cepat sehingga mengelikan hati, seimbas kata-tata pintar & lucu, jawapan yang cepat dan tajam berunsurkan kelucuan, balas jawap yang tepat dan berunsur kelucuan
\qu (4) What words refer to something done humorously?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal melakukan sesuatu dengan lucu?
\ex joke, play a joke on, prank, play a prank on, farce, clowning, fooling around, tomfoolery, buffoonery, horseplay, monkey business
\exn Bergurau senda, memperguraukan, bersenda, mempersendakan, berlagak seperti seorang badut, mempermainkan, memperbodohkan diri sendiri, berlawak jenaka, bergurau senda secara kasar dan kedengaran bising, tipu muslihat
\qu (5) What words describe something that is humorous?
\qun
\ex humorous, funny, hilarious, hysterical, silly, comical, ludicrous, amusing, comic, absurd, facetious, droll, laughable, zany
\exn
\qu (6) What is a person called who jokes?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang suka atau pandai bergurau senda?
\ex comedian, humorist, joker, jokester, wit, wag, comic, clown, jester, buffoon, punster, fool, practical joker, gagman, wisecracker
\exn Pelawak, orang yang pandai berjenaka, orang yang suka bergurau senda, orang yang pandai berlawak-jenaka, orang yang pintar lagi lucu, mulut murai, komik, orang yang membadut, badut, orang yang suka bergurau, orang yang berlagak lucu seperti badut, orang yang pandai berseloka jenaka, orang bodoh, seseorang yang selalu bergurau sahaja, jurulawak, orang yang pintar memberi jawapan tepat dengan berlucu
\qu (7) What words are used of joking?
\qun (7) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal bergurau senda?
\ex to joke, be witty, jest, crack a joke, make pun, to pun, make fun of, make sport of, retort, banter, kid, wisecrack, come back at, josh, clown
\exn Bergurau senda, berakal pintar sewaktu berlucu, bergurau, bersenda, berseloka jenaka, berseloka lucu, mempersendakan, memperbodohkan, beri jawapan tepat yang berunsur lucu, berkelakar, bermain-main, berlucu dengan kepintaran akal, membalas dengan jawapan yang cepat dan lucu, berlawak, berlawak-jenaka
\qu (8) What words describe a person's sense of humor?
\qun (8) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal kebolehan seseorang itu untuk berlucu?
\ex witty, comic, jocular, droll, smart, dry wit, slapstick, fun, facetious, waggish, comical, salty
\exn Berakal pintar, lawak, pandai berjenaka, pandai berlucu, pandai, tiada kepintaran berlucu, komedi kasar - berseronok dalam kekejaman, berseronok, suka berjenaka, bermulut murai, pandai berlawak, berpengalaman (ada kemahiran)
\qu (9) What words describe a person who jokes?
\qun (9) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan seseorang yang bergurau senda?
\ex witty, quick-witted, smart, jocular, droll, funny, waggish, facetious, whimsical, humorous, comic
\exn Kepintaran yang tajam, berakal pintar, pintar, pandai berjenaka, penuh kelakar, mengelikan hati, bermulut murai, suka berjenaka, pandai reka cerita-cerita lucu, melucukan, bagai seorang pelawak
\qu (10) What words indicate the joking manner in which a person acts or speaks?
\qun (10) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menunujukkan telatah (kelakuan dan kata-kata) seseorang yang bergurau senda?
\ex humorously, jokingly, jestingly, in jest, in sport, in play, in fun, not seriously
\exn Berkelakuan dan berkata-kata dengan lucu, bergurau sahaja (dalam kelakuan dan kata-kata), berjenaka sahaja berlawak-jenaka sahaja, berlagak bodoh sahaja, cuma bermain-main, sangat menyeronokkan, tidak bersungguh-sungguh (dalam maksud dan niat yang ditunjukkan)

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.2.8
\oldqu (5) What words describe something which is humorous?

\oldex humorous, funny, hilarious, hysterical, silly, comical
\oldexn Melucukan, menggelikan hati, begitu menggelikan hati sehingga orang ketawa terbahak-bahak, begitu lucu sehingga orang riuh rendah berketawa macam orang-orang yang hilang akal

\oldex laugh, laugh uproarously, guffaw, chuckle, giggle
\oldexn Berketawa, bergelak ketawa dengan kuat sehingga suasana menjadi riuh rendah, berketawa terbahak-bahak, terberangsang untuk ketawa, ketawa terdekih-dekih

\qun

\is 4.3.1.2.1
\sd Below standard
\sdn Pencapaian kurang baik (sempurna)
\oldis 4.4.2.1.2
\oldsd Below standard
\oldsdn Pencapaian kurang baik (sempurna)
\dd Use this domain for words related to behaving below a standard.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to being unacceptable?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada pencapaian yang tidak dapat diterima kerana tidak menepati syarat-syarat?
\ex be below the standard, be unacceptable, be imperfect, be abnormal, miss the mark, fail, fail to make the grade, fail to live up to expectations, not live up to
\exn Pencapaian kurang baik (sempurna) - di bawah tahap pencapaian (markah, moral, perlaksanaan) yang baik, yang tidak dapat diterima (sebagai baik, cermerlang atau sempurna) kerana tidak menepati syarat-syaratnya, tidak sempurna, tidak menurut norma (contoh: persetubuhan atau perkahwinan sejenis), di luar sasaran, gagal, gagal mencapai markah (lulus, baik, cermerlang atau penuh), seperti kata pepatah - setinggi-tinggi tupai melompat, akhirnya jatuh ke tanah juga, tidak mampu memenuhi cita-cita atau wawasan hidup
\qu (2) What words refer to unacceptable behavior?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada tingkah laku yang disangkal?
\ex act unacceptably, dissatisfactory, abnormal, unpleasing, unpleasantly, be impolite, ill mannered
\exn Berkelakuan tidak sopan (senonoh), memberi layanan yang tidak memuaskan, melakukan persetubuhan luarbiasa, membuat suatu keputusan yang tidak membanggakan atau menyenangkan, tidak berbudi bahasa, perangai yang buruk
\qu (3) What words describe the behavior of someone who acts unacceptably?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal tabiat seseorang yang dianggap tidak sesuai?
\ex unacceptable, dissatisfactory, abnormal, unpleasing, impolite, ill mannered, rude
\exn Tidak sesuai (senonoh, sopan, bermoral), tidak memuaskan, luarbiasa (daripada erti baik), tidak membanggakan atau tidak menyenangkan, tidak berbudi bahasa, perangai buruk, tidak sopan

\oldsd Bad-tempered
\oldsdn Cepat marah

\dd Use this domain for words related to being bad-tempered--to behave in an angry, unfriendly way.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe a person who is often bad-tempered?
\qun
\ex bad-tempered, grumpy, grouchy, disagreeable, cantankerous, uptight
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to being bad-tempered for a short time?
\qun
\ex be in a bad mood, be in a huff, be in one of his bad moods, got out of bed on the wrong side, got out on the wrong side of the bed
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe someone who refuses to talk because they are angry?
\qun
\ex sullen, surly, sulky, sulk, be in a sulk, give someone the silent treatment
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe someone who is easily annoyed by unimportant things?
\qun
\ex irritable, crotchety, petulant, fractious
\exn
\qu (5) What words describe someone who gets angry easily?
\qun
\ex short-tempered, quick-tempered, have a short fuse, temper
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to someone who is bad-tempered?
\qun
\ex grouch
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.4.2.1.8
\oldqu (1) What words describe a person who behaves in an angry or unfriendly way?
\oldqun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang cepat marah atau yang menunjukkan sikap tidak peramah?
\oldex bad-tempered, grumpy, grouch, disagreeable
\oldexn Pemarah -cepat marah (orang takut mendekati kerana waktu marah seseorang kelihatan tidak peramah), perengus (mudah meradang-hilang sabar), perungut (mudah rasa kecil hati), pemberang (mudah berselisih faham atau mudah cari lawan - cepat naik berang sehingga bertengkar)
\gd I93489181-AD8C-4A18-8DBC-FD7A9C871126

\is 4.3.2
\sd Admire someone
\sdn
\oldis 4.4.1.2.1
\oldsd Think well of
\oldsdn Memandang tinggi
\dd Use this domain for words related to admiring someone--to feel good about someone because you think that he is a good person.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to admiring a person?
\qun
\ex admire, be an admirer of, accept, approve of, esteem (v), hold in someone in high esteem, look up to, have a high opinion of, hold someone in high regard, respect, respectful, think highly of, think well of, hold in honor
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to admiring someone very much?
\qun
\ex idolize, revere, worship, put someone on a pedestal, hero-worship
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to what someone thinks of a person, either good or bad?
\qun
\ex estimation, opinion, regard
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the thought or feeling that someone is good?
\qun
\ex admiration, adulation, esteem (n), respect
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a person who is admired?
\qun
\ex idol, hero, heroine
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe someone who is admired?
\qun
\ex admirable, estimable, honorable, idolized
\exn

\oldex accept, respect, think well of, esteem, hold in esteem, hold in honor
\oldexn Menyambut baik dalan fikiran, menghormati, memandang tinggi (berfikir baik), beri hormat, memandang dengan rasa hormat, memandang mulia

\is 4.3.2.1
\sd Despise someone
\sdn
\oldis 4.4.2.2.1
\oldsd Think poorly of
\oldsdn Memandang rendah terhadap
\dd Use this domain for words related to despising someone--to feel bad about someone because you think they are not as good as you.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to despising someone?
\qun
\ex despise, disdain, disregard, rebuff, reject, repudiate, scoff, scorn, shun, slight, sneer at, snub, spurn, be contemptuous of, hold in contempt, feel contempt for, feel superior, think someone is worthless, think poorly of, feel superior to, look down on, spit on, be cliquish, turn up your nose at
\exn
\qu (2) What words describe someone who despises someone?
\qun
\ex contemptuous, disdainful, disrespectful, haughty, scornful, snobbish, superior
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a person who despises someone?
\qun
\ex scoffer
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the feeling of despising someone?
\qun
\ex contempt, disdain, disregard, disrespect, hate, irreverence
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to something you do that shows you despise someone?
\qun
\ex rebuff (n), slight (n), snub (n)
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe something someone does to show they despise someone?
\qun
\ex withering (look), derisive (laugh)
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe someone who is despised?
\qun
\ex contemptible, despicable, pitiable, pitiful, despised
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.4.2.2.1

\oldqun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada perihal memandang rendah terhadap seseorang?
\oldex despise, hate, think poorly of, feel superior to, be jealous, look down on, wish ill, wish evil, spit on, want revenge, reject
\oldexn Menghina, benci, berpendapat jahat (berfikiran keji) terhadap, berasa lebih penting, tinggi atau berkuasa daripada, cemburu, memandang rendah terhadap, menyumpah hidup sejahtera seseorang atau suatu pihak - berharap yang tidak baik (seperti sakit-penyakit) akan menimpa, mengutuk kehidupan orang - mengharapkan agar kejahatan (kemalangan) akan menimpa, meludah terhadap, ingin balas dendam, menyangkal

\is 4.3.2.2
\sd Humble
\sdn Merendahkan diri
\oldis 4.4.1.1.3
\oldsd Humble
\oldsdn Merendahkan diri
\dd Use this domain for words related to being humble--to not think that you are better than other people, or to not think that you are better than you really are, and to not talk or act as if you were better than other people.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe someone who is humble?
\qun
\ex humble, lowly, meek, mild, modest, self-deprecating, self-effacing, simple, timid, timorous, unassuming, unpretentious
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to doing something humble?
\qun
\ex be humble, humbly, condescend
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the quality of being humble?
\qun
\ex humility, humbleness, condescension, debasement, lowliness, modesty, self-abasement, self-deprecation, timidity
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe something someone does that is humble?
\qun
\ex humble
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to becoming humble?
\qun
\ex humble yourself
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to one person causing another to be humble?
\qun (6) Bagaimanakah menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang mempengaruhi orang lain untuk merendahkan diri?
\ex to humble someone, humiliate, debase
\exn Mempengaruhi seseorang sehingga dia merendahkan hati (sabar menurut perintah, mampu memumpukan perhatian kepada yang selain daripada dirinya sendiri, lembut hati atau bersikap rendah hati)
\qu (7) What words refer to being too humble?
\qun
\ex put yourself down, run yourself down, sell yourself short, underestimate yourself
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.4.1.1.3
\oldqu (1) What words describe a person who is humble?
\oldqun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan seseorang yang tidak bersikap hidung tinggi?
\oldex be humble, meek, self-deprecating, mild, modest
\oldexn Merendahkan diri, sabar menurut perintah (yang wajar bukan sebarangan), sikap hanya menumpukan perhatian terhadap diri sendiri semakin kurang, lembut hati, rendah hati
\gd I5D21B3F1-85D5-4999-AF64-C4D0101050C0

\is 4.3.2.3
\sd Proud
\sdn Angkuh
\oldis 4.4.2.1.4
\oldsd Proud
\oldsdn Angkuh
\dd Use this domain for words referring to being proud--to think that something or someone is very good and to feel very good about them, especially to think and feel very good about yourself--to think that you are better than others, to think that you are better than you really are, or to talk and act as if you were better than other people.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to being proud of something or someone?
\qun
\ex be proud of, be pleased with, be delighted with, be thrilled with, take pride in, pride yourself on
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to being proud of yourself?
\qun
\ex be proud of yourself, be full of yourself, fancy yourself, let something go to your head
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to being satisfied with yourself?
\qun
\ex self-satisfied, smug, pleased with yourself, complacent
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to thinking you are more important than you really are?
\qun
\ex self-important, pompous, jumped up, have delusions of grandeur, get too big for your boots/britches
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to thinking you are better than other people?
\qun
\ex snobbish, snobby, haughty, snooty, snotty, superior, stuck-up, class-conscious
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe someone who is proud?
\qun
\ex proud, aloof, arrogant, bigheaded, boastful, brash, conceited, contemptuous, egocentric, egotistic, egotistical, hoity-toity, imperious, inflated, lofty, ostentatious, pretentious, prideful, proud hearted, puffed up, self-aggrandizing, self-confident, uppity, vain
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to behaving in a proud way toward other people?
\qun
\ex look down on, look down your nose at, be beneath you, think you're too good for
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to the quality of being proud?
\qun
\ex pride, sense of achievement, aloofness, arrogance, audacity, conceit, egotism, flashiness, haughtiness, hauteur, loftiness, ostentation, pretension, self-importance, self-respect, self-will, showiness, snobbery, snobbishness, vanity
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to a proud person?
\qun
\ex snob, prig
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to something or someone you are proud of?
\qun
\ex be someone's pride and joy, be the pride of, be a credit to
\exn
\qu (11) What words refer to something making someone proud?
\qun
\ex go to your head
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to stopping someone from behaving proudly by criticizing them?
\qun
\ex put someone in their place, wipe the smile off someone's face, cut someone down to size
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.4.2.1.4

\oldex boast, brag
\oldexn Memperlihatkan sikap angkuh dan sombong waktu berkata-kata, bercakap besar
\oldqu (2) What words refer to a person who is proud?
\oldqun (2) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang yang angkuh atau sombong?
\oldex braggart
\oldexn Orang yang berhidung tinggi, orang yang suka bercakap besar

\oldex proud, arrogant, boastful, self-agrandizing, brash
\oldexn Angkuh, sombong, suka bercakap besar, suka memborakkan (kejayaan, kekayaan, kedudukan, kemewahan) sendiri, berhidung tinggi

\is 4.3.3
\sd Love
\sdn Mengasihi
\oldis 4.4.1.2
\oldsd Love
\oldsdn Mengasihi
\oldis 4.4.1.2.2
\oldsd Wish well
\oldsdn Mengharapkan yang baik
\dd Use this domain for words related to loving someone--to feel good about someone, want good things to happen to them, and want to do good things for them.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to loving someone?
\qun
\ex love (v), like, attached, care about, cherish, be close, feel friendly toward, favor, hold in favor, feel favorable toward, be fond of, wish someone well, hope things turn out well for someone, be partial to, be enshrined in your heart
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to loving someone very much?
\qun
\ex adore, worship, be devoted to, dote on, think the world of, mean the world to
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the feeling of love?
\qun
\ex love (n), adoration, affection, compassion, concern, devotion, fondness, goodwill, attachment, kindness, solicitude, sympathy
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe someone who loves?
\qun
\ex loving, affectionate, caring, compassionate, concerned, devoted, doting, fond, solicitous, sympathetic, tender, tender-hearted, warm, warmhearted
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to someone who loves?
\qun
\ex lover, well-wishers
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe someone who is loved?
\qun (6) Bagaimana merujuk kepada seseorang yang dikasihi?
\ex beloved, dear
\exn Kekasih, yang sungguh disayangi (bagaikan permata di hati)
\qu (7) What words refer to someone you love?
\qun
\ex loved ones, darling, pet, the one you love
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to something someone does that is loving?
\qun
\ex act of love, act of kindness, favor
\exn
\qu (9) What words describe someone who does not love?
\qun
\ex unloving, uncaring
\exn
\qu (10) What words describe someone who is not loved?
\qun
\ex unloved, unlovable
\exn

\oldex hateful, spiteful, uncaring, unfeeling
\oldexn Pembenci (mempunyai perasaan benci yang kuat), pengganas-penjenayah (keinginan untuk mencederakan atau membinasakan, mengganas), dingin (tiada sikap mempedulikan seperti waktu adanya perang dingin), pembengis (tiada rasa belas kasihan, rasa bebas melakukan kekejaman)

\is 4.3.3.2

\exn

\ex don't care, not give a damn, couldn't care less, be past caring, shrug off

\exn

\exn

\ex abandonment, dereliction, desertion
\exn

\ex derelict
\exn

\exn

\qun
\ex ghost town, abandoned field, abandoned homestead
\exn

\qun
\ex desert, disown, divorce, dump, forsake, leave alone, maroon
\exn

\qun
\ex abandoned child, waif, street kid
\exn

\qun
\ex abandoned, forsaken, derelict, uncared-for
\exn

\oldexn Meninggalkan, tinggalkan, membiarkan, terbiar, di tinggalkan berseorangan, tertinggal di belakang -ketinggalan di belakang, tertinggal, dibuang (dari kereta, kapal dsn), bercerai, berhenti daripada menggunakan, bandar terbiar - ‘bandar hantu' (begitu sunyi kerana tiada tanda-tanda hidup), ladang terbiar, rumah ladang yang terbiar, anak buangan -anak terbiar

\is 4.3.4
\sd Do good to
\sdn Berbuat baik terhadap
\oldis 4.4.1
\oldsd Good behavior
\oldsdn Kelakuan baik
\oldis 4.4.1.3
\oldsd Do good to
\oldsdn Berbuat baik terhadap
\dd Use this domain for words referring to doing good to someone.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to doing good to someone?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal berbuat baik kepada seseorang?
\ex do good to, be good to, be kind to, benefit (v), treat well, be merciful to, bless, care for
\exn Berbuat baik kepada, berbaik dengan, mengasihi, bermurah hati terhadap, membawa faedah kepada, memperlakukan dengan baik, menunjukkan belas kasihan kepada, memberkati
\qu (2) What words describe a person who does good to other people?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang berlaku baik terhadap orang lain?
\ex accommodating, benevolent, benign, caring, charitable, chivalrous, considerate, courteous, gentle, gracious, humane, kind, kindhearted, kindly, nice, obliging, thoughtful
\exn Murah hati, dengan murah hati, penuh kasih sayang (suka mengasihi), mempunyai belas kasihan, bertimbang rasa, baik hati, lembut hati, pemurah, bagus, besar hati menunjukkan kemurahan (dermawan), mempedulikan
\qu (3) What words refer to something good that someone does for another person?
\qun
\ex kindness, benefit (n), blessing, courtesy, charity
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the character quality of doing good?
\qun
\ex consideration, courtesy, graciousness, kindness, kindliness, thoughtfulness
\exn

\exn Pembantu, penolong, teman kerja-mengiringi untuk membantu atau memberi sokongan, rakan sejenayah

\ex helpful, accommodating, cooperative, obliging
\exn Suka atau sedia membantu, suka berkerjasama, murah hati, mudah bertolak-ansur

\dd Use this domain for words referring to meddling--involving oneself in something that does not concern oneself, such as someone else's business or affairs, or a fight between other people.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal bertindak untuk campur tangan tanpa memanfaatkan - iaitu melibatkan diri dalam hal orang lain yang tidak berkaitan dengan diri sendiri contohnya dalam hal urusniaga, urusan peribadi, atau perselisihan faham orang lain

\ex meddle, bother, butt in, eavesdrop, encroach, infringe, interfere, intervene, intrude, pry, snoop, tamper
\exn Campur tangan dalam urusan-urusan peribadi seseorang tanpa memanfaatkan dan mungkin menimbulkan masalah lain pula- menjaga tepi kain orang, menjadi penghasut atau batu api, penyibuk
\qu (2) What words refer to a person who meddles?
\qun
\ex busybody, eavesdropper, interloper, intruder, meddler, snoop
\exn

\is 4.3.4.6.1
\sd Spoil
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words referring to spoiling something that is happening, such as an event, work, relationship, or feeling, by doing something that makes it less attractive, less enjoyable, or less effective--to do something bad to something that is happening, so that people can't do what they were doing or don't enjoy it as much.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to spoiling the quality of something?
\qun
\ex spoil, impair, mar, detract from
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to spoiling someone's work?
\qun
\ex spoil, mess up, undermine, sabotage, throw a wrench in the works, pour cold water on
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to spoiling a relationship?
\qun
\ex spoil, sour, poison
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to spoiling an event?
\qun
\ex spoil, mar, put a damper on, cast a shadow over
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to spoiling a person's reputation?
\qun
\ex spoil, damage, damaging, discredit, harm, tarnish, be tainted
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to completely spoiling something?
\qun
\ex ruin, destroy, wreck, screw up, spoil everything
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to someone who spoils people's enjoyment of an event?
\qun
\ex wet blanket, spoilsport, killjoy
\exn
\qu (8) What words describe something that has not been spoiled?
\qun
\ex unspoiled, unblemished
\exn

\is 4.3.5.4

\sdn Tidak boleh diharap
\oldis 4.4.2.7
\oldsd Unreliable
\oldsdn Tidak boleh diharap
\dd Use this domain for words related to being unreliable.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe a person who cannot be relied on to do what he should?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang tidak boleh diharap untuk melakukan apa yang dia harus lakukan?

\is 4.3.5.5
\sd Deceive
\sdn Memperdaya
\oldis 4.4.2.5.2
\oldsd Deceive
\oldsdn Memperdaya
\dd Use this domain for words related to deceiving someone.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to acting in such a way that someone is led to believe something false?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal megambil tindakan-tindakan yang boleh mempengaruhi seseorang sehingga dia tertipu (percaya terhadap sesuatu yang tidak benar)?
\ex deceive, fool, take in, defraud, cheat, fleece, bilk, swindle, hustle, dupe, hoodwink, foist upon, palm off on, outwit, outmaneuver, finagle, slip one over on, put something over on, con, lay a trap for, lure, beguile, delude, trick, entrap, ensnare, pull the wool over someone's eyes, play a trick on, play a practical joke on, send on a fool's errand, make a fool of, mislead
\exn Memperdaya, memperbodohkan, menggoda seseorang sehiingga tertipu (terpedaya), menipu, tipu, merompak menerusi tipu-helah, menipu dari segi mengelakkan bayaran dengan melarikan diri, penipuan, jual-beli secara haram (melalui tipu-daya), perdaya, menggunakan tipu muslihat, bermuka-muka supaya orang terpedaya untuk menerima sesuatu yang tidak berguna, memujuk sehingga seseorang itu terperdaya untuk menerima sesuatu, menang kerana kepintaran membelit, mengatasi melalui pengendalian yang licik, memdapatkan sesuatu menerusi penipuan, bagai serigala berbulu domba - menyamar supaya sukar dikenali, menggunakan alat solek, rambut palsu dsn untuk melepaskan diri, menjadi penjenayah - contohnya penjenayah laman web kewangan, menyediakan jerat- melalui suatu komplot jahat, mengumpan, mengakali, mempermainkan, ikhtiar yang tidak jujur-membohong, menjerat, memerangkap, menghalang daripada pengetahuan benar, bermain-main untuk memperdayakan-mempermain-mainkan, memperolok-olokkan, memperlakukan seseorang seperti orang bodoh yang boleh disuruh mengerjakan sesuatu yang sia-sia (dengan janji-janji palsu), memperbodoh-bodahkan, mengelirukan
\qu (2) What words refer to the act of deceiving someone?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perbuatan memperdayakan seseorang?
\ex deceit, deception, fraud, delusion, cunning, illusion, treachery
\exn Tipu-helah, penipuan, perdayaan, khayalan, licik, kepercayaan palsu, pengkhianatan
\qu (3) What words refer to someone who deceives?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang memperdayakan?
\ex deceiver, magician, conjuror
\exn Penipu (pembohong), ahli sihir, ahli silap mata
\qu (4) What words refer to someone who deceives in order to steal?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang memperdaya dengan tujuan mencuri?
\ex con man, swindler, snake, cheat
\exn Penjenayah, penipu, seperti ular yang licik, pembohong
\qu (5) What words refer to someone who pretends to be someone else?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal seseorang yang berpura-pura sebagai orang lain?
\ex imposter, charlatan, fraud, fake, pretender, quack, wolf in sheep's clothing
\exn Penyamar, doktor palsu, penipu, pelakon, pembohong, penyamar doktor, serigala berbulu domba - penjahat yang berpura-pura baik
\qu (6) What words describe someone who deceives?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang memperdaya?
\ex deceptive, fraudulent, cunning, treacherous
\exn Pembohong, penipu, licik - penjahat, pengkhianat - pembelot

\dd Use this domain for words related to being a hypocrite.

\ex be a hypocrite, act hypocritically, hypocrisy, pretend, pretense
\exn Menjadi seorang munafik, bertabiat seperti seorang munafik, kemunafikan, berpura-pura, kepura-puraan

\is 4.3.6
\sd Self-controlled
\sdn Berkemampuan menguasai diri sendiri
\oldis 4.4.1.6
\oldsd Self-controlled
\oldsdn Berkemampuan menguasai diri sendiri
\dd Use this domain for words referring to self-control--deciding not to do something that you want to do, because you think it would be bad to do it; or deciding to do something, because you know it is good.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe someone who is self-controlled?
\qun
\ex self-controlled, ascetic, austere, careful, conscientious, controlled, disciplined, discreet, moderate, provident, prudent, puritanical, restrained, sober-minded, stoic, tempered, tolerant, unsparing
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to a self-controlled person?
\qun
\ex ascetic, conformist, moderate, puritan, stoic
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to being self-controlled?
\qun
\ex abstain, behave, behave yourself, constrain, contain yourself, control yourself, discipline yourself, forbear, forgo, restrain yourself, say no, tolerate
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the quality of being self-controlled?
\qun
\ex self-control, abnegation, abstention, abstinence, asceticism, constraint, discipline, equanimity, forbearance, moderation, poise, reserve, restraint, self-denial, self-discipline, sobriety, stoicism, sufferance, temperance, tolerance, toleration
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to controlling your feelings?
\qun
\ex keep your temper, calm and collected, composed, composure, forbearing, unexcitable, long-suffering, poised, reserved, staid, steady, unexcited
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to controlling your eating?
\qun
\ex put a knife to your throat
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to controlling your desire to drink alcohol?
\qun
\ex stay sober, go on the wagon
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to controlling your desire to spend money?
\qun
\ex frugal, frugality, thrifty, thrift
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.4.1.6
\oldqu (1) What words refer to controlling oneself?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal menguasai diri sendiri?
\oldex self control
\oldexn Berkemampuan menguasai diri sendiri
\oldqu (2) What words describe a person who controls himself?
\oldqun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang menguasai dirinya sendiri?
\oldex be self-controlled, disciplined, controlled, calm and collected, careful, conscientious, frugal
\oldexn Menguasai diri sendiri, berdisiplin (tertib), terkawal (perasaan, pemikiran, pertuturan, perbuatam), tenang dan tenteram, berhati-hati, cermat dan teliti kerana sikap bertanggungjawab, tidak membazir kerana adanya sikap jimat cermat (contoh: penggunaan wang)

\sdn Lemah mengawal diri

\ddn

\qun
\ex addicted, excessive, gluttonous, indulgent, intemperate, piggish, prodigal, riotous, self-indulgent, surfeit, unbridled, uncontrolled, unrestrained, voracious
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to a person who does not control himself?
\qun
\ex addict, Epicurean, glutton, pig, prodigal
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a lack of self-control?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal sifat seseorang yang lemah mengawal suatu keinginan yang timbul dalam dirinya (fikiran atau hatinya)?
\ex lack self-control, indulge, overdo, permit, do something to excess, lose control, get carried away, break down, give in to
\exn Lemah mengawal diri, bagai seorang pelahap, bertabiat kerterlaluan (contohnya tabiat minum arak sehingga mabuk)
\qu (4) What words refer to the quality of lacking self-control?
\qun
\ex addiction, debauchery, dissipation, excess, excitability, extravagance, gluttony, indulgence, intemperance, leniency, overindulgence
\exn

\is 4.3.6.2

\sdn
\oldis 4.4.1.6.1
\oldsd Orderly
\oldsdn Teratur
\dd Use this domain for words referring to being tidy in your habits, such as keeping your belongings neat and organized,.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan perihal tabiat ingin memperhatikan supaya segala sesuatu itu teratur. Contohnya menjaga supaya barang-barang kepunyaan sendiri tersusun rapi ataupun dalam hal merancangkan kegiatan peribadi dan penggunaan masa.
\qu (1) What words describe someone who is tidy?
\qun
\ex tidy, neat, orderly, organized, consistent, house-proud
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to making something tidy?
\qun
\ex tidy, tidy up, clean up, clear up, straighten, straighten up, get the place straight, put something straight, put something in order, put something away
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the quality of being tidy?
\qun
\ex tidiness, neatness
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe something that is tidy?
\qun
\ex tidy, immaculate, just so, neat, shipshape, smart, trim, well-kept
\exn

\is 4.3.6.4
\sd Mistake
\sdn
\oldis 4.4.2.6.2
\oldsd Make a mistake
\oldsdn Melakukan suatu kesilapan
\dd Use this domain for words referring to mistakes--something bad that someone does by accident.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk kesilapan-kesilapan yang tidak berkaitan dengan moral.
\qu (1) What words refer to a mistake?
\qun
\ex mistake, error, slip, mix-up, slip-up, oversight, aberration
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to a mistake in writing or speaking?
\qun
\ex mistake, misprint, spelling mistake, slip of the tongue, error, typographical error, typo
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to a serious mistake in judgment or planning?
\qun
\ex mistake, miscalculation, misjudgment, error of judgment, be a bad move, blunder, bad tactics, muddle, confusion, mess something up, make a mess of something
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to an embarrassing mistake?
\qun
\ex put your foot in it, faux pas, gaffe, boo-boo, indiscretion
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to making a mistake?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal melakukan suatu kesilapan?
\ex make a mistake, make an error, mistake something, go wrong, get something wrong, blunder, goof, goof up, slip up, misjudge, bungle
\exn Melakukan suatu kesilapan, suatu (tindakan, perbuatan, percakapan) yang salah, kesalahan, salah anggap, tersilap langkah kerana suatu kebodohan, bertindak dan berkata-kata tanpa berhati-hati sehingga tersalah langkah atau kata, tersilap kata, ‘ Cis! ‘, ‘ Alamak! ‘, ‘ Maaf! ‘
\qu (6) What words describe something done by mistake?
\qun
\ex by mistake, mistaken, mistakenly, in error, erroneously
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to mistaking one thing or person for another?
\qun
\ex mistake something, confuse, mix someone up with, get something mixed up, muddle
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to causing someone to make a mistake?
\qun
\ex trip someone up, catch someone out
\exn
\qu (9) What do you say when you make a mistake?
\qun
\ex oops
\exn

\is 4.3.7.2

\sdn Gila
\oldis 4.4.2.9
\oldsd Crazy
\oldsdn Gila

\dd Use this domain for words related to being crazy--to act stupid or strange.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe someone who is crazy?
\qun
\ex crazy, mad, insane, berserk, barmy, deranged, dotty, batty, flaky
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to a crazy person?
\qun
\ex maniac, lunatic, nut, nutcase, loony, madman, madwoman, nutter, wacko, weirdo
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to being crazy?
\qun
\ex be nuts, be crackers, need your head examined, be out of your mind, be off your rocker, be stark raving mad, be out to lunch
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the quality of being crazy?
\qun
\ex craziness
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to something someone does that is crazy?
\qun
\ex craziness, insanity, lunacy, madness
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe something someone does that is crazy?
\qun
\ex crazy, insane, mad, screwy
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to beginning to feel like you are crazy?
\qun
\ex go crazy, go mad, go nuts, go round the bend
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to beginning to act crazy?
\qun
\ex go crazy, go berserk, go mad, go nuts
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to causing someone to feel or act crazy?
\qun
\ex drive someone crazy, drive someone nuts, drive someone mad, drive someone round the bend
\exn

\is 4.3.8
\sd Change behavior
\sdn Berubah tabiat
\oldis 4.4.1.9
\oldsd Change behavior
\oldsdn Berubah tabiat

\dd Use this domain for words related to changing your behavior either for the better or for the worse.
\ddn
\qu (1) What general words refer to changing your behavior?
\qun
\ex change your behavior, modify your behavior, alter your behavior, turn to something
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to changing your behavior for the better?
\qun
\ex reform, grow up, mature, mend your ways, turn over a new leaf, shape up, improve, go straight, overcome your past
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to changing your behavior for the worse?
\qun
\ex go bad, backslide, fall into sin, your behavior is deteriorating, go crooked
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to trying to change someone's behavior?
\qun
\ex change someone, discipline, train, reform someone, influence, have a good/bad influence on someone, turn someone toward/away from something
\exn

\oldexn Mengubah (berubah, perubahan) tabiat

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.4.2.1.9
\oldqu (1) What words describe a person who is not like most other people?
\oldqun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal seseorang yang bukan seperti kebanyakan orang?
\oldex unusual, abnormal, exceptional, aberrant, peculiar, unnatural, eccentric, uncommon, rare, unique, odd, strange, queer, quaint, original, unconventional, weird
\oldexn Luar biasa (kebolehannya, kejayaanya), di luar norma; (kelahirannya), istimewa (pencapaian rekod baru), ganjil (corak hidup), aneh (kepercayaan), bukan semula jadi; (kekuatan), eksentrik (gaya hidup), tidak biasa-biasa; (perlantikan), jarang ditemui (kepintaran akal), unik-tiada taranya, satu-satunya (keperibadian, perbuatan), janggal (suatu pernyataan), ajaib (kejadian), pelik; (tindakan), ganjil tetapi menarik (pembinaan), asli-bukan tiruan (perubahan hidup), bukan penurut; (pencipta sejarah baru dalam suatu perkumpulan: keluarga, kerajaan negara, bangsa-perintis era atau wawasan baru), bukan biasa dalam pandangan; (pelbagai karya - fesyen rambut, baju)
\oldqu (2) What words refer to not being like most other people?
\oldqun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal tidak dianggap atau tidak menjadi sama seperti kebanyakan orang?
\oldex unconformity, nonconformity
\oldexn Tidak dianggap sama seperti kebanyakan orang (dalam tindakan, tingkah laku, pendapat, wawasan atau sikap), tidak menjadi sama seperti kebanyakan orang (dalam tindakan, tingkah laku, pendapat, wawasan atau sikap)

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.4.3

\is 4.3.9

\oldis 4.3
\oldsd Culture
\oldsdn Kebudayaan

\dd Use this domain for general words referring to culture--the way a group of people (such as a tribe) behaves that is different from other groups.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada kebudayaan pada amnya - iaitu kelakuan sekumpulan manusia (contohnya suatu suku kaum) yang berbeza daripada kumpulan-kumpulan (suku kaum - suku kaum) yang lain.

\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada kebudayaan pada amnya?
\ex culture, cultural norm, civilization
\exn Kebudayaan, adat resam, adat istiadat, budaya setempat (tatatertib, kebiasaan suatu kaum, tatarakyat), peradaban

\is 4.4.1
\sd Prosperity
\sdn Kemakmuran
\oldis 4.5.1
\oldsd Prosperity
\oldsdn Kemakmuran
\dd Use this domain for words related to prosperity--when good things are happening.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to life going well?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal keadaan hidup serba baik yang dialami?
\ex be fortunate, be blessed, have it easy, have a good life, prosper, be prosperous, everything is going well, have a good time, have plenty
\exn Bertuah, diberkati, hidup senang-lenang, makmur, hidup dalam kemakmuran, semuanya serba baik, menempuh waktu hidup yang penuh nikmat - amat seronok, hidup yang berkelimpahan- dilimpah rahmat
\qu (2) What words refer to a good life?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal hidup yang serba baik (mewah)?
\ex the good life, good times, prosperity, blessing, good fortune, ease, welfare, quality of life, utopia
\exn Hidup yang serba baik, masa hidup yang penuh nikmat-waktu-waktu yang begitu menyeronokkan, (zaman) kemakmuran, pemberkatan, keberuntungan yang melimpah, kesenangan, kesejahteraan, taraf hidup yang baik (cemerlang) - setaraf dengan negara-negara maju
\qu (3) What words describe a good life?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal hidup yang serba baik atau mewah itu?
\ex good, blessed, fortunate, easy, prosperous, carefree, trouble free, quality, plentiful, fun-filled, fantastic, great, full, fruitful, productive, enjoyable, happy, wonderful
\exn Baik, sungguh diberkati-banyak berkat, (berasa amat) bertuah-beruntung, senang-lenang, tiada kekhuatiran, tidak ada masalah, bertaraf mewah, berkelimpahan, sungguh seronok, hebat, sangat baik, serba cukup, sangat berhasil, produktif-penuh kejayaan, amat menyeronokkan, mengembirakan, sungguh menakjubkan

\is 4.4.2
\sd Trouble
\sdn Kesusahan
\oldis 4.5.2
\oldsd Trouble
\oldsdn Kesusahan
\dd Use this domain for words referring to bad things that happen in life.
\ddn Gunakan domain ini untuk lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perkara-perkara buruk yang berlaku dalam kehidupan.
\qu (1) What words refer to bad things that happen in life?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perkara-perkara buruk yang berlaku dalam kehidupan?
\ex trouble, adversity, difficulty, hardship
\exn Kesusahan, peristiwa-peristiwa malang, kesulitan-kerumitan
\qu (2) What types of trouble are there?
\qun (2) Apakah kesusahan-kesusahan yang mungkin menimpa?
\ex be in need, be in pain, be injured, harm, be in distress, suffer persecution, be in danger, social unrest, anarchy
\exn Menghadapi kekurangan, mengalami kesakitan, mengalami luka-cedera, (maksiat yang) memudaratkan (masa depan), mengalami kedukacitaan, diseksa atau menderita penganiayaan, menempuh waktu (saat) bahaya, kerusuhan dalam masyarakat, keadaan huru-hara - kacau-bilau
\qu (3) What causes trouble?
\qun (3) Apakah yang mengakibatkan kesusahan?
\ex war, famine, disaster, accident, sickness, injury, death, conflict, harm, destruction, oppression
\exn Perang, kebuluran, bencana-malapetaka, kemalangan, sakit-penyakit, luka-cedera, kematian, konflik-persengketaan, mudarat sosial (keruntuhan moral) - pelbagai bahaya, pembinasaan (suatu pusat strategik), penindasan

\is 4.4.2.4
\sd Disaster
\sdn Bencana, malapetaka
\oldis 4.5.2.9
\oldsd Disaster
\oldsdn Bencana, malapetaka

\dd Use this domain for words related to a disaster.
\ddn
\qu (1) What general words refer to a disaster?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang biasa dikaitkan dengan suatu kejadian yang mengakibatkan kebinasaan manusia dan alam persekitarannya (kehidupan lain, alam semulajadi atau sebarang binaan)?
\ex disaster, catastrophe, tragedy, calamity, crisis, emergency
\exn Bencana alam, malapetaka, peristiwa malang- nahas di darat, di udara atau di laut, bala
\qu (2) What words refer to a natural disaster?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada suatu kebinasaan yang diluar pengaruh manusia?
\ex natural disaster, 'act of God'
\exn Bencana alam -malapetaka semulajadi, penghakiman Tuhan
\qu (3) What words describe an event that causes a disaster?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menjelaskan perihal suatu kejadian yang mengakibatkan kebinasaan segala sesuatu yang terlibat?
\ex disastrous, catastrophic, tragic
\exn Kejadian yang malang-mencelakakan, telah berlaku suatu malapetaka, suatu peristiwa yang amat menyayat hati
\qu (4) What types of disasters are there?
\qun (4) Apakah bencana-bencana yang mungkin terjadi?
\ex epidemic (of disease), forest/grass fire, storm, famine, plague (of insects), earthquake, war
\exn Wabak (sesuatu penyakit), kebakaran rumput-rampai atau hutan -belantara, ribut taufan-pelbagai angin ribut yang membinasakan, kebuluran, hawar (serangga), gempa bumi, perang

\is 4.4.2.6
\sd Suffer
\sdn Menderita
\oldis 4.5.2.8
\oldsd Suffer
\oldsdn Menderita

\dd Use this domain for words related to suffering--to feel very bad because of something very bad that has happened to you.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to suffering?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal menderita?
\ex suffer, ache for someone, be afflicted with, agonize, endure, feel horrible, have a hard time, be hurting, be in pain, feel pain, feel rotten, undergo, go through, put up with, be subjected to, be in the grip of, be in the throes of
\exn Menderita, bertahan dalam penderitaan, menempuh hidup penuh derita - sedang menghadapi penderitaan
\qu (2) What words refer to suffering because of something you have done?
\qun
\ex suffer, pay for, pay the penalty for, count the cost, cost someone dearly, stew in your own juice, know to your cost, find out to your cost, at a cost to
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the feeling of suffering?
\qun
\ex suffering, ache, affliction, agony, distress, misery, pain, torment (n), torture (n)
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe someone who suffers?
\qun
\ex suffering, tormented
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to causing someone to suffer?
\qun
\ex distress (v), give someone a hard time, hurt, inflict, put someone through, subject to, torment (v), torture (v)
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to something that causes someone to suffer?
\qun
\ex adversity, hardship, hell, injury, tormenter, torturer
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe something that causes someone to suffer?
\qun
\ex agonizing, distressing, hard, hurtful, painful, tormenting, torturing
\exn
\qu (8) What words describe something that is too painful to accept?
\qun
\ex unbearable, unbearably, intolerable, intolerably, unendurable
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to someone who suffers?
\qun
\ex sufferer, casualty, victim
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to someone who seems to enjoy suffering?
\qun
\ex masochist, martyr, be a glutton for punishment
\exn

\is 4.4.3.1
\sd Brave
\sdn
\oldis 4.5.3.1
\oldsd Courage
\oldsdn Keberanian
\dd Use this domain for words describing someone who is brave--not afraid to do something dangerous.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to the action of showing courage?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tindakan yang menunjukkan suatu keberanian?
\ex show courage, be brave, dare, brace yourself, embolden, face (v), buck up
\exn Menunjukkan keberanian, menghadapi keadaan dengan berani, berani menghadapi cabaran
\qu (2) What words describe someone who is brave?
\qun
\ex courageous, brave, bold, adventurous, assured, audacious, confident, cool under fire, daring, dauntless, doughty, fearless, gallant, gutsy, heroic, intrepid, never-say-die, plucky, spunky, stout, stouthearted, undaunted, valiant, valorous
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the ability to do something brave?
\qun
\ex courage, bravery, assurance, audacity, boldness, confidence, firmness, fortitude, gallantry, grit, guts, heroism, manliness, nerve, pluck, spunk, valor, fighting spirit
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to a person who has courage?
\qun
\ex hero, heroine, daredevil
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to being brave enough to do something?
\qun
\ex be brave enough to do something, dare, have the guts to do something, have the nerve to do something, pluck up the courage to do something, have the courage of your convictions
\exn

\oldexn Penuh keberanian, berani, gagah berani, bertekad, berani berperang atau berlawan, gagah, handal, berhati singa, berjiwa perwira, tidak berjiwa pengecut, tidak tawar hati, berkeyakinan, sabar menempuh jerit-payah-tabah menghadapi cabaran, tahan lasak-gagah perkasa, enggan putus asa atau berkecil hati (berhati kebal atau berazam kuat untuk meneruskan perjuangan), enggan menyerah kalah (pantang mati sebelum ditakdirkan)

\oldexn Berani-sikap, menunjukkan keberanian-tindakan, handal-ketangkasan, gagah-semangat, berani mati-tekad berjuang, yakin menang-percaya perjuangannya tidak sia-sia walaupun mungkin terkorban nyawa

\is 4.4.3.2

\ex cowardice
\exn

\exn

\exn

\exn

\qun
\ex cower
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 4.5.3.2

\oldex coward, sissy, wimp
\oldexn Penakut, pengecut, bacul

\is 4.4.3.3
\sd Avoid
\sdn
\oldis 4.5.3.3
\oldsd Avoid trouble
\oldsdn Mengelakkan masalah
\dd Use this domain for words related to avoiding something bad, such as trouble or someone you don't want to meet.

\ex avoid trouble, avoid adversity, retreat, appease, to run away
\exn Mengelakkan masalah, menjauhkan diri daripada segala (sebarang) kesusahan, mengundurkan diri, mengikhtiarkan perdamaian, melarikan diri

\is 4.4.4.4
\sd Save from trouble
\sdn Menyelamatkan daripada kesusahan
\oldis 4.5.4.4
\oldsd Save from trouble
\oldsdn Menyelamatkan daripada kesusahan
\dd Use this domain for words related to saving someone or something from trouble (something bad is happening) or danger (something bad will happen).
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to saving someone from trouble?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada perihal menyelamatkan seseorang daripada kesusahan?
\ex save, save someone's life, rescue (v), come to someone's rescue, mount a rescue, release, come to the aid of, preserve life, cover, defend, deliver, ensure someone's safety, extricate, free, guard, harbor, hide, insurance, insure, keep, preserve, protect, ransom, recover, retrieve, safeguard, safekeeping, safety, salvage, screen, secure someone's safety, grant asylum, shelter, shield, spare, pick up (a survivor), get someone out of, bail out, throw someone a lifeline, grant safe conduct
\exn Menyelamatkan, melepaskan, membebaskan, bebas-dibebaskan, terlepas-dilepaskan, datang untuk menolong, juruselamat, perintis perlepasan, pemimpin kebebasan, pejuang (pembela) nyawa manusia -(gembala hidup)
\qu (2) What words refer to the act of saving someone?
\qun
\ex salvation, rescue (n), defense, deliverance, extrication, recovery
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to saving yourself?
\qun
\ex make it to safety, get to safety, avoid, break, bypass, dodge, duck, elude, escape, evade, evasion, flee, shake, shy away from, sidestep, give someone the slip
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe someone who is safe?
\qun
\ex safe, clear, found, free, guarded, immune, impregnable, intact, invulnerable, protected, secure, security, sheltered, unharmed, unhurt, unscathed, untouched, welfare, be out of danger, at a safe distance, be in good hands, safe and sound, with a whole skin
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to a person who saves someone?
\qun
\ex savior, defender, deliverer, liberator, rescuer, protector, guardian
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to a place where you are safe?
\qun
\ex safety, place of safety, refuge, sanctuary, shelter, safe house, safe harbor, haven, stronghold, asylum, hideout, retreat
\exn
\xe We made it to safety.
\xen

\is 4.4.4.5

\sdn
\oldis 4.5.3.4
\oldsd Guard something dangerous
\oldsdn Mengawal unsur-unsur bahaya
\oldis 4.5.4.5
\oldsd Defend from danger
\oldsdn Mempertahankan daripada bahaya
\dd Use this domain for words related to protecting someone from danger or being hurt.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to protecting someone?
\qun (1) Apakah lingkungan perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada perihal memberi perlindungan kepada seseorang?
\ex protect, protection, protective, guard, safeguard, fortify, secure, watch, keep safe, keep, insulate, encircle, defend, defense
\exn Melindungi, memberi perlindungan, mengawasi, mencegah daripada bahaya dengan memberi perlindungan, jaminan, penerangan dsn, mengukuhkan, menjamin, menjaga, mengawal keselamatan, mempertahankan, mengasingkan untuk tujuan memelihara daripada bahaya, mengelilingi supaya terselindung daripada bahaya musuh, mempertahankan, kubu pertahanan-tempat pernaungan kepada kaum pelarian
\qu (2) What is a person called who protects someone?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada pihak yang memberi perlindungan kepada pihak yang lain?
\ex protector, guard, watchman, defender, advocate, sentry, bodyguard, defensive force
\exn Pelindung, pengawal, penjaga, pembela, peguambela, pengawas, pengawal peribadi, pasukan ketahanan
\qu (3) What words are used for a place where someone is protected?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang digunakan untuk merujuk kepada tempat di mana seseorang itu boleh menerima perlindungan?
\ex fortress, fort, castle, battlement, moat, fortification
\exn Kota pertahanan, menara pertahanan, istana yang dipertahankan, benteng (tembok) pertahanan-tempat melepaskan tembakan meriam, kubu (parit) pertahanan, kota berkubu
\qu (4) What words refer to something used to protect someone?
\qun
\ex armor, shield, guard
\exn

\exn

\ex lucky, fortunate, some people have all the luck, lead a charmed life, not know you're born, it's all right for some
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe something good that happens as a result of good luck?
\qun
\ex lucky, fortunate, miraculous, a good thing, a good job, stroke of luck, fluke
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to something that makes good things happen to someone?

\exn

\qun

\exn

\qun
\ex luckily, fortunately, happily
\exn

\qun
\ex blessing in disguise
\exn

\qun
\ex wish someone luck, good luck, best of luck
\exn
\qu (9) What do people say to try to prevent bad luck?
\qun
\ex knock on wood, touch wood, keep your fingers crossed
\exn

\is 4.5.4.6
\sd Rebel against authority
\sdn Memberontak terhadap pihak berkuasa
\oldis 4.6.8.3
\oldsd Rebel against authority
\oldsdn Memberontak terhadap pihak berkuasa
\dd Use this domain for words related to rebelling against authority.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to rebelling against authority?
\qun
\ex rebel, revolt, resist, rise up, rise against, mutiny, overthrow
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to the act of rebellion?
\qun (2) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada tindakan yang berunsur pemberontakan?
\ex rebellion, revolt, revolution, sedition, insurrection, insurgency, mutiny, civil disobedience, coup, coup d'etat, counterrevolution, putsch, takeover, uprising
\exn Pemberontakan, penderhakaan, revolusi - perintis perubahan yang mendadak, penghasutan, penentangan, perusuhan, pengkhianatan, pelanggaran awam, perampasan kuasa, kudeta - pembangkitan kerajaan baru yang berjaya menggulingkan pemerintah sebelumnya secara ganas atau haram - penggulingan pihak pemerintah, pembangkang (gerak-balas, anti) revolusi
\qu (3) What words refer to the process of rebellion?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal kegiatan pemberontak?
\ex rebel cause, rebel movement
\exn Kegiatan pemberontak/pengganas, pergerakan puak pembangkang atau puak yang ingin merampas kuasa
\qu (4) What words refer to an instance of rebelling?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada suatu tindakan memberontak yang tertentu?
\ex act of rebellion, rebellious act, revolutionary act, demonstration, riot, disorder, sabotage
\exn Suatu pemberontakan, suatu tindakan memberontak, suatu revolusi - suatu perubahan memdadak, tunjuk rasa, rusuhan, pencerobohan (tatanegara, tatatertib, tata susila, tatarakyat), penyerbuan - suatu serangan atau tindakan menyerang atau memerangi untuk merosakkan rancangan tertentu atau menggagalkan suatu usaha tertentu
\qu (5) What words refer to a person who rebels?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang giat memberontak?
\ex rebel, activist, agitator, anarchist, belligerent, conspirator, extremist, guerrilla, insurgent, liberationist, militant, mutineer, rabble-rouser, radical, rebel, revolutionary, revolutionist, terrorist
\exn Pemberontak, perintis atau pejuang perubahan, pengkhianat, pihak pelampau (radikal), penentang kewujudan sebarang bentuk kerajaan, perusuh
\qu (6) What words describe a rebel?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang menjelaskan sifat seseorang pemberontak?
\ex rebellious, revolutionary, defiant, mutinous, radical
\exn Suka atau selau memberontak, mempunyai daya perintis untuk mencabar atau memperjuangkan suatu perubahan, suka melawan, bersifat pengkhianat, suka merombak untuk membawa pembaruan atau peubahan yang menyeluruh
\qu (7) What words describe a revolution?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menjelaskan suatu revolusi atau perubahan yang mendadak?
\ex violent, peaceful
\exn Berunsur keganasan (penggulingan, penyerahan), berunsur kedamaian (persetujuan, perjanjian)
\qu (8) What is the leader of a rebellion called?
\qun (8) Bagaimanakah seseorang yang mengetuai suatu pemberontakan dirujuk?
\ex leader of a rebellion, rebel leader, revolutionary leader
\exn Penaung / perintis / pemimpin pemberontakan, ketua pemberontak, pemimpin / pejuang utama atau bapa revolusi
\qu (9) What does the leader of a rebellion do?
\qun (9) Apakah yang dilakukan oleh ketua pemberontak?
\ex lead a rebellion, organize a rebellion
\exn Meminpin suatu pemberontakan, penderhakaan atau perubahan, merancang suatu pemberontakan, penderhakaan atau perubahan
\qu (10) What do the authorities do to stop a rebellion?
\qun (10) Apakah yang dilakukan oleh pihak-pihak berkuasa untuk membasmikan suatu pemberontakan?
\ex put down, suppress
\exn Membenteraskan-membasmikan, menumpaskan kuasa pengaruh pemberontak, memimpin gerak / tindak balas untuk mencegah kegiatan lanjut pihak subversif, menentang usaha pengganas atau puak pelampau yang ganas, membangkitkan semangat patriotik untuk menentang dan menghalang kegiatan penghasut dan pengkhianat, menegakkan keadilan - membenarkan dan menyokong pihak yang memberontak terhadap suatu kejahatan sosial yang dianggap sebagai pencerobohan hak asasi manusia atau rakyat, mengusahakan perubahan atau pembaharuan untuk menjaga kemerdekaan dan kemajuan (maruah) bangsa & negara

\is 4.5.6.2

\sdn Berkedudukan rendah
\oldis 4.6.6.2

\oldsdn Berkedudukan rendah
\dd Use this domain for words related to low social status.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to being low in status?
\qun
\ex be low down, be at the bottom, be at the bottom of the pile
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to low status?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada suatu kedudukan rendah dalam masyarakat?
\ex low status, low estate
\exn Berkedudukan rendah, tidak berdarjat, kaum miskin-golongan yang tertindas - orang- orang yang bernasib malang (ada kecacatan yang menghalang kemajuan) - lapisan masyarakat yang dipandang rendah, jijik, hina atau keji (kasta yang terendah)
\qu (3) What words describe someone who is low in status?
\qun
\ex junior, low-ranking
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to being lower in status than someone else?
\qun
\ex assistant, subordinate, under
\exn
\qu (5) What words are used of lowering someone's status?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan seseorang yang telah diturun pangkatnya ataupun kedudukan rendah seseorang?
\ex be reduced in status, humble, reduce in rank, bust (in rank), debase, degrade, demote
\exn Menjadi miskin-berubah ke status yang ledih rendah, berkedudukan rendah, turun pangkat, kegagalan mengekalkan suatu kedudukan - menjadi bankrap, jatuh atau turun pangkat

\is 4.6
\sd Government
\sdn Kerajaan
\oldis 4.6
\oldsd Government
\oldsdn Kerajaan
\dd Use this domain for words related to government.
\ddn
\qu (1) What general words refer to government?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada kerajaan pada amnya?
\ex govern, government, governor, governance
\exn Memerintah, kerajaan yang memerintah (pemerintah), gabenor (yang dipertua negeri, pemerintah suatu negeri atau wilayah), pemerintahan-pentadbiran urusan-urusan kerajaan
\qu (2) What words refer to the place where the government is?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal di mana sesuatu kerajaan itu berpusat?
\ex capital, seat of government
\exn Ibu kota atau ibu negara (negara)-ibu negeri (negeri), mahligai-tempat semayam diraja khususnya balairong diraja - pusat kuasa tertinggi (contoh masa kini: tempat DYMM Yang Di Pertuan Agung, para Sultan negeri, Gabernor & Yang Dipertua Negeri bermesyuarat), istana - pusat pentadbiran & pertahanan negara (contoh masa kini: Kerajaan pusat termasuk semua kementerian dalam negara)
\qu (3) What words describe something having to do with the government?
\qun
\ex governmental, official
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe the kind of government in a country?
\qun
\ex monarchy, democracy, democratic, republic, republican, autocratic, dictatorship, dictatorial, communist, communistic, socialist, socialistic, theocracy, theocratic
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to flags and other symbols of government?
\qun
\ex flag, official seal, crown, scepter, throne, regalia
\exn

\is 4.6.1
\sd Ruler
\sdn
\oldis 4.6.1.1
\oldsd Supreme authority
\oldsdn Kuasa tertinggi
\dd Use this domain for words related to the ruler of a country.
\ddn
\qu (1) What is the person called who is the highest ruler in the country?
\qun (1) Siapakah pihak yang mempunyai kuasa tertinggi dalam sesebuah negara?
\ex ruler, highest ruler, supreme authority, head of state, leader of the country, emperor, king, president, premier, chancellor, prime minister, Caesar, pharaoh, chief, paramount chief, chieftain, chief of state
\exn Pihak pemerintah, pemimpin kerajaan (YAB Pedana Menteri Malaysia) - ketua persidangan para raja (DYMM Yang Di Pertuan Agung), pihak perundangan tertinggi (contoh: DYMM Yang Di Pertuan Agung - berhak memberi amnesti atau pengampunan, mahkamah tertinggi atau mahkamah agung), pemimpin kerajaan negeri, pemimpin negara, maharaja, raja, presiden, yang terutama dalam negeri (contoh: TYT, DYMM Sultan atau Gabenor) - yang terutama dalam kerajaan negeri (contoh: Ketua Menteri), canselor (contoh: institusi pendidikan tinggi), pedana menteri, kaiser, firaun, pengetua (suatu institusi pendidikan)-ketua jabatan polis), ketua (jabatan negeri atau wilayah) ketua negeri - ketua menteri
\qu (2) What words refer to the position or office of the ruler?
\qun
\ex throne, kingship, presidency, premiership, chieftaincy, chieftainship, position, office
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe something having to do with the ruler?
\qun
\ex royal, regal, imperial, kingly, presidential, majestic
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the house of the ruler?
\qun
\ex palace, castle, White House, number 10 Downing Street
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to the symbols of the ruler?
\qun
\ex throne, crown, diadem, scepter, royal robes, presidential seal
\exn
\qu (6) What special words and phrases are used when talking to the ruler?
\qun
\ex your majesty, live forever
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to when a ruler begins to rule?
\qun
\ex take the throne, crown (v), swear in, take the oath of office
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to when a ruler stops ruling?
\qun
\ex abdicate, resign, overthrow, leave office
\exn

\exn Bakal raja, pewaris takhta yang sah, pewaris yang akan menaiki takhta kerajaan - bakal pemimpin diraja, contoh: Putera Diraja Wales
\qu (4) What words are used to describe things related to the king's family?
\qun
\ex royal, queenly, princely, noble
\exn

\ex arraign, book, lock up, imprison, put behind bars, handcuff, chain
\exn Mengemukakan dakwaan-dakwaan semasa menjalankan soal-siasat, mengurung, memenjarakan, dikurung dalam penjara, menggari, merantai

\is 4.7
\sd Law
\sdn Undang-undang
\oldis 4.7
\oldsd Law
\oldsdn Undang-undang
\dd Use this domain for words related to the law.
\ddn
\qu (1) What general words refer to the law?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang biasa digunakan untuk merujuk kepada undang-undang?
\ex law
\exn Undang-undang (hukum) negeri, undang-undang (hukum) negara
\qu (2) What words describe something that agrees or disagrees with the law?
\qun
\ex in accordance with, just, lawful, legal, legality
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to enforcing the law?
\qun (3) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang merujuk kepada perihal menguatkuasakan undang-undang?
\ex law enforcement, police, policeman, enforce
\exn Penguatkuasaan undang-undang, jabatan polis- pasukan polis, pegawai polis, menguatkuasakan
\qu (4) What words refer to a lawyer?
\qun (4) Apakah lingkungan perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada seseorang peguam?
\ex lawyer, advocate, barrister, bar
\exn Peguam, peguambela, peguamcara, berjawatan rasmi untuk mewakili sesuatu pihak dalam suatu pembicaraan mahkamah, peguam yang berhak membela atau mendakwa pihak-pihak yang terlibat dalam suatu pembicaraan makahmah
\qu (5) What words refer to administering the law?
\qun (5) Apakah lingkungan perkataan berkaitan yang merujuk kepada perihal mentadbiran undang-undang atau suatu perundangan?
\ex adjudicate, judge, administer, justice, jury
\exn Memberi keputusan penghakiman - membuat pengadilan, menghakimi, menegakkan keadilan dalam urusan penghakiman, memberi layan sama rata berdasarkan undang-undang yang termaktub, tidak berat sebelah waktu mengadili sesuatu kes, dengan adil saksama, sidang juri
\qu (6) What words refer to a person's responsibility to obey the law?
\qun
\ex responsible, responsibility, obligation
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to a person's rights under the law?
\qun
\ex right
\exn

\exn Undang-undang, hukum, peraturan, perundangan, perintah, rukun (rukun tetangga), tatanegara (rukun negara), penghakiman, keputusan pihak berkuasa untuk penguatkuasaan, hukum-hukum agama - pedoman, syariah, perlembagaan (batasan kuasa perundangan untuk mencegah ketidakadilan), penggubalan undang-undang

\exn Melakukan suatu jenayah, melangar undang-undang, melakukan sesuatu yang salah di sisi undang-undang, mengambil tindakan yang haram

\exn Jenayah, jenayah kecil, jenayah besar, kesalahan serius yang harus dikenakan hukuman mati, pengkhianatan, tindakan atau kegiatan yang haram, kegiatan melanggar undang-undang, melakukan kesalahan, kesalahan, perbuatan yang tidak benar atau tidak betul seperti memberi atau menerima rasuah, perbuatan cabul seperti merogol, pelanggaran, pencerobohan, dosa, kejahatan
\qu (3) What words refer to a person who breaks the law?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang melanggar undang-undang?
\ex criminal, lawbreaker, underworld
\exn Penjenayah, pembunuh, pengkianat, penyeludup dadah atau barang-barang haram, pengganas, penerima atau pemberi rasuah, perogol, penceroboh, orang yang berdosa, orang jahat
\qu (4) What words describe an action that is against the law?
\qun
\ex illegal, against the law, criminal, wrong
\exn

\exn Mahkamah umum, mahkamah undang-undang, mahkamah tertinggi, mahkamah tinggi, mahkamah yang lebih tinggi untuk memansuhkan keputusan mahkamah rendah, mahkamah daerah, mahkamah pembicaraan kes-kes cerai, mahkamah pembicaraan kes-kes bawah umur, mahkamah tinggi untuk mengemukakan rayuan-rayuan berkaitan, tribunal-badan pengadilan, mahkamah tentera, mahkamah haram (tidak sah menurut kuasa & keadilan perundangan)

\ex courthouse
\exn Bilik pembicaraan dalam mahkamah
\qu (3) What are the parts of a courthouse?
\qun (3) Apakah bahagian-bahagian tertentu dalam sesebuah mahkamah?
\ex courtroom, judge's chambers, jury room
\exn Bilik pembicaraan, bilik hakim (semasa pembicaraan ditangguhkan), bilik sidang juri (semasa pembicaraan ditangguhkan atau semasa membuat keputusan)
\qu (4) What are the parts of a courtroom?
\qun (4) Apakah bahagian-bahagian tertentu dalam bilik pembicaraan?
\ex jury bench, witness stand, witness box, judge's bench, lawyers table, bar, dock
\exn Ruang duduk sidang juri dalam bilik pembicaraan, tempat berdirinya seseorang saksi semasa menjawap atau memberi keterangannya, tempat duduk seseorang saksi semasa menjawap atau memberi keterangannya, ruang duduk hakim dalam bilik pembicaraan, meja peguambela dan peguamcara, kayu pagar melintang yang menandakan perbatasan antara tempat duduk para pelawat atau penonton dan tempat berlangsungnya pembicaraan, ruang duduk atau berdiri orang yang didakwa
\qu (5) What words refer to the time when the court is in session?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan waktu sesuatu pembicaraan sedang berlangsung?
\ex session, the court is now in session
\exn Sesi pembicaraan, sesi pembicaraan kes tertentu dalam mahkamah sedang berlangsung
\qu (6) What is a court case called?
\qun (6) Apakah lingkungan perkataan yang berkaitan dengan sesuatu kes yang dibicarakan dalam sesebuah mahkamah?
\ex trial, case, lawsuit, suit, action, litigation, proceedings, dispute, hearing
\exn Pembicaraan, kes pembicaraan, dakwaan, aduan yang dikemukakan di mahkamah, saman, pendakwaan-litigasi, sesi-sesi pembicaraan, hal yang sedang dipertikaikan, kes pengadilan - hal yang dibicarakan - hal yang diadili

\ex judge, court clerk, court recorder, bailiff
