\ex tether, rope, prod (stick to direct cattle), cowbell
\exn kayu, tali, loceng di leher lembu,
\qu (4) What words refer to a place where animals can eat grass?

\ex pasture, field, range
\exn

\oldis 6.4.1

\oldsdn Memburu

\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada memburu binatang?
\ex hunt (v), hunt (n), lay in wait, blind, decoy, animal call, bag an animal, strike to cause injury, strike hard, kill, flush an animal out of hiding, to suddenly come out of hiding, search, hide, capture, chase away, aim, miss target, shoot, hit target, nick
\exn memburu, buruan, hendap, buta, umpan, panggilan binatang, mencederakan, memukul dengan keras, membunuh, keluar dari persembunyian, mencari, bersembunyi, menangkap, mengejar, mengarahkan kepada sasaran, hilang sasaran, menembak, ditangkap

\exn menajamkan

\exn tempat pemburuan

\exn memburu dengan anjing, anjing buru, loceng anjing pemburu, mengejar, mengesan bau, mengikuti bau, mengepung binatang, menyalak dengan suara garuk

\is 6.4.6
\sd Things done to animals
\sdn Perkara yang dibuat terhadap binatang
\oldis 6.4.6
\oldsd Things done to animals
\oldsdn Perkara yang dibuat terhadap binatang
\dd Use this domain for words related to things done to animals.
\ddn
\qu (1) What things are done to animals?
\qun (1) Apakah perkara yang dibuat terhadap binatang?
\ex ride
\exn kawanan, tangkap, buru, perangkap, menibai serangga, menghapuskan, potong, jinakkan, sabung, sangkar, tunggang
\qu (2) What words refer to someone moving animals?
\qun
\ex herd, shoo away, scare off
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to catching (but not killing) animals?
\qun
\ex catch, capture, trap
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to killing animals?
\qun
\ex hunt, trap, snare, burn out
\exn
\qu (5) What words are used for killing birds?
\qun (5) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk membunuh burung?
\ex snare
\exn perangkap
\qu (6) What words are used for killing insects?
\qun (6) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk membunuh serangga?
\ex swat, fumigate, spray, flyswatter, bug spray
\exn tibai, mewasapi (dengan bahan kimia), sembur, menibai lalat, penyembur serangga.
\qu (7) What words are used for killing fish?
\qun (7) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk membunuh ikan?
\ex fish, fish for, hook, net, spear, bait
\exn tangkap ikan, mata kail, jala, lembing, umpan
\qu (8) What words are used of killing all animals?
\qun (8) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk membunuh semua binatang?
\ex exterminate, become extinct, extinction, wipe out
\exn menghapuskan, menjadi pupus, pupus, dihapuskan
\qu (9) What words are used for processing dead animals?
\qun (9) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk memproseskan binatang yang mati?
\ex butcher, skin, pluck feathers, render
\exn potong, pemotong daging, kulit, mencabut bulu
\qu (10) What words are used for taming animals?
\qun (10) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk menjinakkan binatang?
\ex tame, domesticate, train, pet
\exn menjinakkan, memelihara, latih, binatang peliharaan
\qu (11) What words refer to calling to an animal?
\qun
\ex bird call
\exn
\qu (12) What words are used for animals that perform a special task?
\qun
\ex watchdog, performing (animal), seeing eye dog, police dog, hunting dog
\exn
\qu (13) What special events feature animals?
\qun (13) Apakah peristiwa istimewa di mana binatang mengambil peranan utama?
\ex circus, cockfight, bullfight
\exn sarkas, sabung ayam, perlawanan lembu
\qu (14) What special places are reserved for animals?
\qun (14) Apakah tempat istimewa yang dikhaskan untuk binatang?
\ex cage, birdcage, zoo, park, reserve, preserve
\exn sangkar, sangkar burung, zoo, taman binatang, hutan simpanan, disimpan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 6.4.6
\oldqu (2) What words are used for moving animals?
\oldqun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk memindahkan binatang?
\oldex herd, shoo away, scare off
\oldexn kawanan, halau pergi, takutkan
\oldqu (3) What words are used for catching (but not killing) animals?
\oldqun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk menangkap (bukan membunuh) binatang?
\oldex catch, capture, trap
\oldexn tangkap, perangkap
\oldqu (4) What words are used for killing animals?
\oldqun (4) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk membunuh binatang?
\oldex hunt, trap, snare, burn out
\oldexn buru, perangkap, jerat, bakar
\oldqu (11) What words are used for animals which perform a special task?
\oldqun (11) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk binatang yang melakukan tugas khas?anjing pengawas, binatang yang digunakan dalam persembahan (sarkas), anjing polis, anjing buru
\oldex watchdog, performing (animal), seeing eye dog, police dog, hunting dog
\oldexn
\cf Animal husbandry; Hunt and fish
\gd I7C234CCC-0DBE-42B0-A377-DB99EBD2B51E

\is 6.5
\sd Working with buildings
\sdn Bekerja dengan bangunan
\oldis 6.5
\oldsd Working with buildings
\oldsdn Bekerja dengan bangunan
\dd Use this domain for words related to working with buildings.
\ddn
\qu (1) What general words refer to making a building?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata am yang merujuk kepada membuat bangunan?
\ex build, construct
\exn membangun, membentuk
\qu (2) What are the steps in building a building?
\qun (2) Apakah langkah-langkah untuk membangun sebuah bangunan?
\ex design, draft, draw up the plans, survey, excavate (the foundation)
\exn rekaan, draf, melukis plan, gali (dasar)
\qu (3) What are the people called who build buildings?
\qun (3) Apakah nama orang yang membuat bangunan?
\ex construction worker, architect, draftsman, builder, roofer, carpenter, plumber, electrician, bricklayer, mason, cabinetmaker, painter, landscaper, surveyor
\exn perabot,tukang seni tanam tukang cat
\qu (4) What special equipment is used to build a building?
\qun (4) Apakah peralatan istimewa yang digunakan untuk membangun bangunan?
\ex scaffolding
\exn perancah atau aram-aram (tiang dan papan)
\qu (5) What words refer to constructing a wall?
\qun (5) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada membina dinding?
\ex frame, erect a wall, put up siding, plaster, mud and wattle
\exn rangka, mendirikan dinding, plaster, sasak
\qu (6) What words refer to constructing a roof?
\qun (6) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada membina atap?
\ex to roof, a roof, roofing material
\exn membuat atap, atap, bahan atap

\is 6.5.1
\sd Building
\sdn Bangunan
\oldis 6.5.1
\oldsd Building
\oldsdn Bangunan
\dd Use this domain for words related to buildings and other large structures that people build.
\ddn
\qu (1) What types of buildings are there?
\qun (1) Apakah jenis-jenis bangunan yang ada?
\ex building, structure, construction, kitchen house, bathhouse, outhouse, latrine, outbuilding, bank, elevator, gallery, garage, gazebo, hospital, library, lighthouse, mausoleum, museum, outbuilding, observatory, pavilion, pyramid, rotunda, skyscraper, tabernacle, tower
\exn bangunan, rumah, gereja, sekolah, rumah sakit, ibu pejabat kerajaan, rumah dapur, rumah mandi, pondok kecil, stor, dewan masyarakat, pejabat, rumah pangsa, rumah satu tingkat, pangsapuri dua tingkat, pagar, pintu gerbang, menara
\qu (2) What kinds of buildings are used by animals?
\qun (2) Apakah jenis bangunan yang digunakan oleh binatang?
\ex barn, shed, hen house, coop, kennel, pound, doghouse, stable
\exn kandang, reban ayam,
\qu (3) What kinds of buildings are used for work and to make things?
\qun
\ex office, factory, shop, laboratory, plant, greenhouse
\exn
\qu (4) What kinds of buildings are used to store things?
\qun
\ex barn, granary, grain silo, warehouse, storehouse, safe, shed, treasury
\exn
\qu (5) What kinds of buildings are used to sell things?
\qun
\ex store, shop, shopping center, mall, kiosk, supermarket
\exn
\qu (6) What kinds of buildings are used by the government?
\qun
\ex courthouse, Parliament house, government headquarters, castle, palace
\exn
\qu (7) What kinds of buildings are used by the police?
\qun (7) Apakah jenis bangunan yang digunakan oleh polis?
\ex police station, jail, prison, jailhouse, cell
\exn stesen polis
\qu (8) What kinds of buildings are used by the military?
\qun (8) Apakah jenis bangunan yang digunakan oleh tentera?
\ex military base, guardhouse, barracks, fort, blockhouse, bomb shelter, watchtower, lookout, bunker
\exn kem tentera, berek, bangunan khas pertahanan askar, benteng pertahanan,bangsal kalis bom
\qu (9) What kinds of buildings are used by travelers?

\ex station, railroad station, bus station, gas station, petrol station, rest area, parking lot
\exn stesen bas, terminal lapangan terbang, hotel, motel, restoran, bar, stesen minyak, tempat rehat, tempat letak kereta
\qu (10) What kinds of buildings are used by travelers for sleeping?
\qun
\ex hotel, motel, inn, hostel, lodge
\exn
\qu (11) What kinds of buildings are used by travelers for eating?
\qun
\ex restaurant, bar, pub, tavern
\exn
\qu (12) What kinds of buildings are found at airports?
\qun (12) Apakah jenis bangunan yang terdapat di lapangan terbang?
\ex hangar, control tower, terminal
\exn hangar, menara kawalan, terminal lapangan terbang
\qu (13) What kinds of buildings are used for meetings?
\qun
\ex assembly hall, auditorium, center, hall, community center
\exn
\qu (14) What kinds of buildings are used for watching games and shows?
\qun
\ex theater, cinema, stadium, amphitheater, arena, ballpark, bullring, coliseum, racetrack, hippodrome
\exn
\qu (15) What kinds of buildings are used for schools?
\qun
\ex school, schoolhouse, university, library, dormitory, conservatory
\exn
\qu (16) What kinds of buildings are used in religion?
\qun
\ex church, synagogue, mosque, temple, shrine, cathedral, monastery, convent, cloister, nunnery, abbey, chapel, parsonage, sanctuary, basilica, pagoda, tabernacle
\exn
\qu (17) What kinds of buildings are made to remind people of something or someone?
\qun
\ex monument, megalith, mound, obelisk, ziggurat
\exn
\qu (18) What words describe different kinds of buildings?
\qun
\ex enclosed, open, multi-story, high-rise
\exn

\exn khemah, perlindungan, pondok

\ex outhouse, bunkhouse, garage, shed, barn
\exn

\ex stair, step, rung (of a ladder), staircase, stairway, stairwell, stairs, flight of stairs, elevator, lift, escalator, fire escape, ladder, banister, handrail, landing, ramp
\exn
\gd I84A8D541-9571-4CE9-ABEA-BD9CCCB8DBF0

\is 6.5.3
\sd Building materials
\sdn Bahan bangunan
\oldis 6.5.3
\oldsd Building materials
\oldsdn Bahan bangunan
\dd Use this domain for words related to the materials used to make a building.
\ddn
\qu (1) What materials are used to make a building?
\qun (1) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan untuk membina bangunan?
\ex rafter, pole, center pole, horizontal pole, pillar, roofing, tin sheet, thatch, leaf roof, shingle, brick, iron rod, mud, reed, wattle, paint, board, beam
\exn kasau, tiang, tiang tengah, tonggak, atap, zing, atap, atap daun, genting, batu bata, batang besi, tanah lumpur, menerung, sasak, cat, papan, alang
\qu (2) What materials are used to make walls?
\qun (2) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan untuk membuat dinding?
\ex wood, brick, cement, plaster, drywall, mud and wattle, clay, cow dung, reinforcing sticks
\exn kayu, batu bata, simen, plaster, lepa, tanah liat, tahi lembu, ranting untuk mengukuh
\qu (3) What kinds of materials are used for bricks?
\qun (3) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan untuk membuat batu bata?
\ex mud, clay, cement, straw, mortar, sun-dried, burned, fired, kiln-dried
\exn lumpur, tanah liat, simen, jerami, lepa, dikeringkan dengan matahari, dibakar, dengan api, ketuhar pembakaran
\qu (4) What materials are used to paint a house?
\qun (4) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan untuk mencat rumah?
\ex paint, varnish, lacquer, whitewash
\exn cat, barnis, cat kapur
\qu (5) What materials are used to make a roof?
\qun (5) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan untuk membuat atap?
\ex roofing material, tile roof, tile, tin roof, tin sheet, shingle, wooden shingle, asphalt shingle, shake, thatched roof, thatch, grass roof, grass, straw, palm leaf, sod, canvas (tent)
\exn bahan atap, atap jubin, atap zing, bumbung, genting sirap atap daun, atap rumput, jerami, daun palma, kain terpal, kanvas (khemah)
\qu (6) What materials are used to make a floor?
\qun (6) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan untuk membuat lantai?
\ex flooring, wooden floor, linoleum, tile floor, dirt floor, cement floor, cow dung
\exn lantai kayu, lantai jubin, lantai tanah, lantai simen, tahi lembu
\qu (7) What materials are used to make doors and windows?
\qun (7) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan untuk membuat pintu dan jendela?
\ex wood, glass, screen
\exn kayu, kaca, penghadang
\qu (8) What materials are used to make a foundation?
\qun (8) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan untuk membuat asas?
\ex foundation stone, cornerstone
\exn asas batu, asas sudut

\is 6.5.3.1
\sd Building equipment and maintenance
\sdn Peralatan bangunan dan penjagaan
\oldis 6.5.3.1
\oldsd Building equipment and maintenance
\oldsdn Peralatan bangunan dan penjagaan

\dd Use this domain for words referring to the equipment and maintenance of a building.
\ddn Gunakan bidang lingkungan ini untuk kata-kata yang merujuk kepada peralatan dan penjagaan sebuah bangunan.
\qu (1) What words refer to taking care of a building?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada menjaga sebuah bangunan?
\ex maintain, maintenance
\exn menjaga, penjagaan
\qu (2) What words refer to a person who takes care of a building?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada orang yang menjaga sebuah bangunan?
\ex janitor
\exn penjaga
\qu (3) What words refer to the equipment used to take care of a building?
\qun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada peralatan yang digunakan untuk menjaga sebuah bangunan?
\ex vacuum cleaner, broom, mop
\exn pembersih vakum, penyapu, pengelap lantai
\qu (4) What words describe a building that is in good condition?
\qun
\ex solid, solidly built, sound
\exn
\qu (5) What words describe a building that is not in good condition?
\qun
\ex disrepair, derelict
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to a building falling down?
\qun
\ex fall down, collapse, in ruins
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to repairing a building?
\qun
\ex repair, restore, restoration, fix up
\exn

\is 6.5.4

\sdn Infrastruktur
\oldis 6.5.4
\oldsd Infrastructure
\oldsdn Infrastruktur
\dd Use this domain for words related to infrastructure--the big things people make that many people use, such as roads, electric power lines, and water supply systems.
\ddn

\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada benda yang dibina oleh kerajaan untuk memenuhi keperluan orang awam?
\ex infrastructure, public works, park
\exn infrastruktur, kerja awam

\is 6.5.4.1
\sd Road
\sdn Jalan
\oldis 6.5.4.1
\oldsd Road
\oldsdn Jalan
\dd Use this domain for words related to a road.
\ddn
\qu (1) What types of roads are there?
\qun (1) Apakah jenis-jenis jalan?
\ex road, street, lane, path, footpath, way, avenue, boulevard, highway, freeway, thoroughfare, divided highway, paved road, dirt road, improved road, unimproved road
\exn jalan, lebuh raya, lorong, jalan kecil, jalan, jalan besar yang dibahagi, lorong lebar, jalan berturap, jalan tidak berturap, jalan yang diperbaiki, jalan yang tidak dibaiki
\qu (2) What words are used to describe when two roads come together?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang menggambarkan apabila dua jalan menjadi satu?
\ex corner, cross street, fork, intersection, juncture, pedestrian crossing, interchange, overpass, underpass, exit
\exn selekoh, simpang, lintasan pejalan kaki, jambatan penghubung, jalan bawah, jalan keluar
\qu (3) What words refer to a bridge?
\qun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada jambatan?
\ex bridge
\exn jambatan
\qu (4) What words refer to a tunnel?
\qun (4) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada terowong?
\ex tunnel
\exn terowong
\qu (5) What are the parts of a road?
\qun (5) Apakah bahagian-bahagian-bahagian jalan?
\ex center line, shoulder, edge, median, lane, passing lane, bed, roadbed, surface, pavement, sidewalk, curb
\exn garisan tengah, bahu, pinggir, pertengahan, lorong, lorong laluan, permukaan jalan, jalan berturap, jalan tepi
\qu (6) What words are used for the signs and markers on a road?
\qun (6) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk lambang dan tanda di jalan raya?
\ex sign, signpost, marker, line, speed bump, reflector
\exn lambang, tanda, papan tanda, penanda, garisan, bonggol, pemantul
\qu (7) What words are used for making a road?
\qun (7) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk membuat jalan?
\ex build a road, lay a new road, build up the bed, pave
\exn membina jalan, membuat jalan baru, menurap
\qu (8) What words are used to describe a bad road?
\qun (8) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk menggambarkan jalan rosak?
\ex pothole, road gone to pot, rutted, washboard, dusty, rough, broken pavement, cracked pavement, worn pavement, full of holes, in need of repair
\exn berlobang, jalan rosak, berabuk, turap rosak, jalan yang berketak-ketak, banyak lobang, perlu dibaiki
\qu (9) What words are used of fixing a road?
\qun (9) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk membaiki jalan?
\ex road repairs, repaving, repairing, fixing, detour, fill holes, patching holes
\exn pembaikan jalan, menurap, membaiki, lencongan, menyumbat lobang, membaiki lobang
\qu (10) What words refer to people and vehicles traveling on a road?
\qun (10) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada orang dan kenderaan yang digunakan di atas jalan?
\ex traffic
\exn trafik

\is 6.6
\sd Occupation
\sdn
\oldis 6.6
\oldsd Occupations
\oldsdn Pekerjaan
\dd Use this domain for words related to occupations.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to a person's occupation?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada pekerjaan seseorang?
\ex occupation, job, living, work, employment, profession, trade
\exn pekerjaan, kerja, pencarian, nafkah
\qu (2) What are the occupations in agriculture?
\qun (2) Apakah pekerjaan orang dalam pertanian?petani, pemanjat kelapa sawit
\ex farmer, palm tree climber
\exn
\qu (3) What are the occupations in animal husbandry?
\qun (3) Apakah pekerjaan orang dalam penternakan binatang?
\ex shepherd, herdsman
\exn gembala lembu, gembala kambing
\qu (4) What are the occupations in hunting and fishing?
\qun (4) Apakah pekerjaan orang dalam pemburuan dan nelayan?pemburu, nelayan, pemungut madu
\ex hunter, fisherman, honey gatherer
\exn
\qu (5) What are the occupations in medicine?
\qun (5) Apakah pekerjaan orang dalam perubatan?
\ex doctor, nurse, medicine man, midwife, medical technician, pharmacist, herbalist, witchdoctor
\exn doktor, jururawat, tukang ubat, bidan, juru teknik perubatan, farmasi, perawat herba, dukun
\qu (6) What are the occupations in hotel management?
\qun (6) Apakah pekerjaan orang dalam pengurusan hotel?
\ex hotel owner, concierge, porter, desk clerk
\exn pemilik hotel, porter, penyambut tetamu
\qu (7) What are the occupations in administration?
\qun (7) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam pengurusan?
\ex business man, secretary, treasurer, accountant
\exn peniaga, setiausaha, bendahari, akauntan
\qu (8) What are the occupations in manufacturing?
\qun (8) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam membuat barang-barang?
\ex mechanic, potter, tailor, weaver, blacksmith
\exn mekanik, pembuat tembikar, tukang jahit, tukang anyam, tukang besi.
\qu (9) What are the occupations in building?
\qun (9) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam membuat bangunan?
\ex carpenter, bricklayer
\exn tukang kayu, tukang bata
\qu (10) What are the occupations in trading?
\qun (10) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam jual beli?
\ex storekeeper, shopkeeper, trader, merchant
\exn penjaga stor, jual beli, pemborong
\qu (11) What are the occupations in food preparation?
\qun (11) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam persediaan makanan?
\ex cook, butcher, baker, restaurant owner, waiter
\exn tukang masak, tukang potong daging, tukang pembuat kuih, pemilik restoran, pelayan
\qu (12) What are the occupations in politics?
\qun (12) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam politik?
\ex president, MP, congressman, senator, legislator, cabinet member, minister, ambassador, civil servant, lawyer, lobbyist, tax collector, customs officer
\exn president, ahli parlimen, senator, ahli perundangan, ahli kabinet, menteri, duta, pegawai kerajaan, peguam, orang yang melobi, pemungut cukai, pegawai kastam
\qu (13) What are the occupations in childcare?
\qun
\ex homemaker, children's caretaker, nursery worker, nurse (for children), nanny
\exn
\qu (14) What are the occupations in religion?
\qun (14) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam agama?
\ex pastor, priest, clergyman, diviner
\exn guru agama
\qu (15) What are the occupations in transportation?
\qun (15) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam pengangkutan?
\ex chauffeur, driver, truck driver, cab driver, porter, loader, mover, dispatcher, captain of ship, sailor, pilot, copilot, navigator, steward, stewardess
\exn pemandu, pemandu trak, pemandu teksi, pemunggah barang, orang yang memindah barang, penghantar barang, kaptan kapal, kelasi, juruterbang, pembantu juruterbang, jurumudi, pramugara, pramugari
\qu (16) What are the occupations in the police and military?
\qun (16) Apakah pekerjaan orang yang terlibat dalam jabatan polis dan askar?
\ex policeman, guard, watchman, soldier, officer
\exn polis, pengawal,penjaga, askar, pegawai
\qu (17) What is a person called who is very good at his job?
\qun (17) Apakah gelar bagi orang yang sangat baik dengan kerja?
\ex expert, skilled worker, master craftsman, leader in his field, specialist
\exn pakar, pekerja mahir, pakar yang ulung, pemimpin dalam bidangnya
\qu (18) What words are used of finding a job?
\qun (18) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk mencari pekerjaan?
\ex look for a job, find a job, find employment, job hunting
\exn mencari pekerjaan,
\qu (19) What words are used of doing a job?
\qun (19) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan tentang melakukan pekerjaan?
\ex do a job, make a living, perform a task
\exn melakukan kerja, mata pencarian, melakukan tugas

\is 6.6.1
\sd Working with cloth
\sdn Bekerja dengan kain
\oldis 6.6.1
\oldsd Working with cloth
\oldsdn Bekerja dengan kain
\dd Use this domain for words related to working with cloth.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words are used for the craft?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk kemahiran ini?
\ex tailoring, spinning, sewing, weaving, knitting, rope making, embroidery, cordage
\exn anyam, kaitan, membuat tali, sulaman
\qu (2) What words are used for the activity?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada kegiatan itu?
\ex sew, spin thread, embroider, knit, crochet, mend, patch
\exn mengayam, menjahit, memintal benang, menyulam, mengait, memperbaiki, menampal
\qu (3) What are the steps in the process?
\qun (3) Apakah langkah-langkah dalam satu proses itu?
\ex design, cut out, assemble, stitch, tie, hem
\exn mereka, bentuk yang dipotong, mengumpul, menjahit, mengikat, kelim
\qu (4) Who does the activity?
\qun (4) Siapakah yang melakukan kegiatan ini?
\ex tailor, seamstress, weaver
\exn menjahit, tukang jahit perempuan, mengayam
\qu (5) What materials are used?
\qun (5) Apakah jenis bahan yang digunakan?
\ex sisal, cotton, wool
\exn sisal, kain kapas, kain bulu
\qu (6) What things are made?
\qun (6) Apakah benda yang dibuat?
\ex thread, yarn, rope, mat, cloth, clothes
\exn benang, tali, tikar, kain
\qu (7) What tools are used?
\qun (7) Apakah jenis alat yang digunakan?
\ex needle, knitting needle, spinning wheel, sewing machine, pins, scissors, tape measure
\exn alat tenun, jarum, jarum kait, pemintal, mesin jahit, pin, gunting, pita pengukur

\oldsdn Melombong
\oldis
\oldsd
\oldsdn Bahasa Dan Pemikiran
\oldis
\oldsd
\oldsdn Bahasa Dan Pemikiran
\oldis
\oldsd
\oldsdn Bahasa Dan Pemikiran
\oldis 6.6.2.1
\oldsd Mining
\oldsdn Melombong
\dd Use this domain for words related to mining.
\ddn

\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada menggali bahan galian dalam tanah?
\ex mine (v), quarry (v)
\exn melombong, lombong, lombong emas, lobang lombong, kuari

\exn

\qun
\ex mine shaft, tailings, entrance, head
\exn

\qun
\ex prospecting, pan for gold
\exn

\qun
\ex eureka, strike it rich
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to a person who mines?
\qun
\ex miner, prospector
\exn
\qu (7) What tools and machines are used in mining?
\qun
\ex pan, sluice, Geiger counter, metal detector, pick, rock hammer
\exn

\sdn Peleburan
\oldis 6.6.2.2
\oldsd Smelting
\oldsdn Peleburan
\dd Use this domain for words related to smelting--melting rocks to get metal out of them.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to melting rocks to get metal out of them?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada melebur batu untuk mendapat logam?
\ex smelt (metal ore), melt
\exn melebur, mencair
\qu (2) What words refer to rocks that have metal in them?
\qun
\ex ore
\exn
\qu (3) What tools and equipment are used to get metal out of rocks?
\qun (3) Apakah jenis alat yang digunakan untuk mengeluarkan logam dari bijih?
\ex furnace, forge, crucible
\exn relau, periuk peleburan
\qu (4) What words refer to the material left over after metal has been taken out of rocks?
\qun (4) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada sisa bahan yang tertinggal setelah logam dikeluarkan dari batu?
\ex slag, slagheap, dross
\exn sanga, timbunan sanga, serdak jirim buangan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 6.6.2.2
\oldqu (2) What words refer to rocks which have metal in them?
\oldqun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada batu yang mengandungi logam?
\oldex ore
\oldexn bijih
\gd I993B8955-52DB-4B2A-8E9A-405A155E7B60

\is 6.6.2.3
\sd Working with metal
\sdn Bekerja dengan logam
\oldis 6.6.2.3
\oldsd Working with metal
\oldsdn Bekerja dengan logam
\dd Use this domain for words related to working with metal. Answer each question below for each kind of smith.
\ddn Gunakan bidang lingkungan ini untuk kata-kata yang berkaitan dengan bekerja dengan logam. Jawab setiap soalan di bawah ini untuk setiap jenis tukang. logam, tukang besi, menuang, acuan, tukul, memateri, andas, belos, relau, memukul dengan penukul, bekerja dengan belos, pekerjaan logam, tukang emas, barang kemas
\qu (1) What is a person called who works with metal?
\qun (1) Apakah sebutan kepada orang yang bekerja dengan besi?
\ex smith, blacksmith (iron), goldsmith, silversmith, tinsmith, tinker, jeweler, welder
\exn tukang, tukang besi, tukang emas, tukang perak, tukang tin, tukang pateri, menggodek
\qu (2) What does a blacksmith do?
\qun (2) Apakah yang dibuat oleh tukang besi?
\ex work with (iron), forge, cast, shape, mold, heat, melt, weld, solder, hammer, work the bellows, hit with hammer, beat, plate
\exn bekerja dengan (besi), menuang, membentuk, memanas, mencair, menyambung, memateri, mengetuk, bekerja dengan belos, memukul dengan penukul, pukul
\qu (3) What raw materials does a blacksmith use?
\qun (3) Apakah bahan mentah yang digunakan tukang besi?
\ex ore, iron, steel, metal, solder, scrap metal
\exn bijih, besi, keluli, logam, pateri, kepingan besi
\qu (4) What does a blacksmith make?
\qun (4) Apakah yang dibuat oleh tukang besi?
\ex metal work, jewelry
\exn kasut kuda, paku, pisau, kapak, bajak, bar, batang logam, dawai, rantai
\qu (5) What tools does a blacksmith use?
\qun (5) Apakah jenis alat yang digunakan tukang besi?
\ex hammer, anvil, tongs, forge, furnace, bellows
\exn penukul, andas, relau, belos, bengkel
\qu (6) What words refer to a place where people work with metal?
\qun
\ex blacksmith shop, foundry, steelworks
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to a piece of metal?
\qun
\ex nugget, bar, rod, ingot, wire
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 6.6.2.3
\gd I7EE3CCB5-E6CB-4028-9AF5-62AE782967B5

\is 6.6.2.4

\exn

\qun

\exn

\exn tukang tembikar
\qu (4) What words refer to clay?
\qun

\exn
\qu (5) What things are made out of clay?
\qun (5) Apakah yang dibuat daripada tanah liat?seramik, tembikar, periuk tembikar, paip tembakau, patung tanah liat, batu bata, ubin tanah liat
\ex ceramics, pottery, clay pot, clay pipe, clay idol, brick, tile
\exn

\qun (6) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk bekerja dengan tanah liat?
\ex potter's wheel, sponge, kiln, brick form, form for tile, mold
\exn mesin tempat alin, span, ketuhar, bentuk batu bata, bentuk ubin, acuan
\qu (7) Where does a potter work?
\qun (7) Dimanakah tempat seorang itu bekerja?
\ex workshop, potter's field
\exn bengkel, ladang tukang tembikar

\ex artist, painter
\exn pelukis
\qu (5) What types of paintings are there?
\qun
\ex portrait, landscape, seascape, still life

\is 6.6.7
\sd Working with water
\sdn Bekerja dengan air
\oldis 6.6.7
\oldsd Working with water
\oldsdn Bekerja dengan air
\dd Use this domain for words related to working with water.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to digging a well?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada menggali perigi?
\ex dig (a well), drill (a well), sink (a bore hole)
\exn menggali, menggerudi, membuat lobang
\qu (2) What words are used for storing water?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada menyimpan air?
\ex reservoir, cistern, water tank, water barrel, bucket, jerry can, water tower
\exn takungan air, tangki air, baldi, tangki logam, menara air
\qu (3) What words are used of a system of water transportation?
\qun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada sistem pengangkutan air?
\ex canal, water-way, navigation channel, lock, dock
\exn terusan, jalan air, limbungan, kunci
\qu (4) What words refer to using waterpower?
\qun
\ex water-power, water mill, water-wheel
\exn
\qu (5) What words are used of generating electricity using waterpower?
\qun
\ex dam, hydroelectric power plant, electric generating plant, dynamo
\exn
\qu (6) What words are used of removing water from something?
\qun
\ex sieve, drain, press, extract, strain
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 6.6.7
\oldqu (4) What words refer to using water-power?
\oldqun (4) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada penggunaan kuasa air?
\oldex water-power, water mill, water-wheel
\oldexn kuasa air, kincir air, aliran air penggerak roda

\oldex dam, hydroelectric power plant, electric generating plant, dynamo
\oldexn takungan air, jana kuasa hydroelektrik, jana kuasa elektrik, penjana

\is 6.6.7.1

\oldis 6.6.7.1

\oldsdn Tukang paip
\dd Use this domain for words related to working with water pipes.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to a person who works on water pipes?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada orang yang bekerja dengan paip?
\ex plumber
\exn tukang paip
\qu (2) What words refer to a system of pipes?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada sistem paip air?
\ex plumbing, pipes
\exn sistem paip, paip
\qu (3) What are the parts of a system of pipes?
\qun (3) Apakah bahagian dalam sistem paip air?
\ex pipe, water pipe, valve, faucet, joint, elbow, sections of pipe, water main, water meter, drain, sink
\exn paip, paip air, injap, pili, sambungan, siku, bahagian paip, paip utama, meter air, parit, sinki
\qu (4) What words refer to a leaky pipe?
\qun (4) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada paip bocor?
\ex leak, leaky pipe, dripping faucet
\exn bocor, paip bocor, titisan dari pili
\qu (5) What words refer to working on the plumbing?
\qun (5) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada bekerja dengan sistem paip air?
\ex put in plumbing, fix a pipe, fix a leak, to thread a pipe
\exn membuat sistem paip, membaiki paip, membaiki bocor.

\is 6.6.7.2

\sdn Penghantaran air
\oldis 6.6.7.2

\oldsdn Penghantaran air

\ddn

\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada benda yang digunakan untuk menghantar air?

\exn aliran air, terusan, tali air, takungan, tangki air, paip, pam, hydroeletrik
\qu (2) What words are used for transporting clean water?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada penghantaran air bersih?
\ex aqueduct, canal, culvert
\exn akueduk, terusan, tali air, parit merentas di bawah jalan
\qu (3) What words are used for transporting dirty water?
\qun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada penghantaran air kotor?parit, longkang, pembentungan
\ex ditch, drainage ditch, sewer
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to drawing water from a well?
\qun (4) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada mengambil air dari perigi?
\ex draw water, draft
\exn mengambil air
\qu (5) What words refer to canals used to convey water?
\qun (5) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada terusan yang menghantar air?
\ex canal, aqueduct, ditch
\exn terusan, akueduk, tali air
\qu (6) What means are used to raise water?
\qun (6) Apakah cara untuk menaikkan air?
\ex windmill, pump, pump house, pumping station, lock
\exn kincir air, pam, rumah pam, stesen pam, kunci
\qu (7) What containers are used to hold water?
\qun (7) Apakah bekas yang digunakan untuk menyimpan air?
\ex cistern, bucket, pitcher
\exn tangki air, baldi, jag
\qu (8) What words refer to making water flow through a pipe?
\qun
\ex pump, siphon, suck, suction
\exn

\is 6.7
\sd Tool
\sdn Alat
\oldis 6.7
\oldsd Tool
\oldsdn Alat
\oldis
\oldsd
\oldsdn Bahasa Dan Pemikiran
\oldis
\oldsd
\oldsdn Bahasa Dan Pemikiran
\oldis
\oldsd
\oldsdn Bahasa Dan Pemikiran
\oldis
\oldsd
\oldsdn Bahasa Dan Pemikiran
\oldis 6.7
\oldsd Tool
\oldsdn Alat
\dd Use this domain for general words for tools and machines. The domains in this section should be used for general tools and machines that are used in a variety of tasks. Specialized tools and machines should be classified under the specific work or activity for which they are used.
\ddn Gunakan bidang lingkungan ini untuk kata-kata am yang merujuk kepada alat-alat. Perbezaan di antara alat dan mesin mungkin tiada di dalam sebahagian bahasa. Perbezaan di sini bererti adalah di antara alat yang sederhana dan alat yang lebih canggih serta ada banyak bahagiannya (mesin)
\qu (1) What general words refer to tools?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada alat?
\ex tool, implement, utensil, device, instrument, gadget, hardware, paraphernalia
\exn alat, alat pertukangan besi
\qu (2) What words refer to a set of tools?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada suatu kumpulan alat?
\ex kit, tool kit
\exn peti perkakas, peti alat
\qu (3) What words refer to a container for tools?
\qun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada bekas alat-alat?
\ex toolbox, tool cabinet
\exn kotak alat, almari alat
\qu (4) What tools are used for climbing?
\qun
\ex ladder, stepladder, rope ladder, rung, step
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to all the tools and other things you need to do a job?
\qun
\ex equipment, apparatus, gear, kit, things, stuff, tools
\exn

\is 6.7.8
\sd Parts of tools
\sdn Bahagian-bahagian alat
\oldis 6.7.8
\oldsd Parts of tools
\oldsdn Bahagian-bahagian alat
\dd Use this domain for words referring to parts of tools and machines. You need to think of different tools and machines, and think of each part.
\ddn Gunakan bidang lingkungan ini untuk kata-kata yang merujuk kepada bahagian-bahagian alat dan mesin, and fikirkan setiap bahagian.
\qu (1) What words refer to parts of tools?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada kepada bahagian-bahagian alat?
\ex shaft, head, gear, lever, fulcrum, switch, key, spring
\exn batang, kepala, gear, pengumpil, fulcrum, kunci, spring
\qu (2) What are the parts of a knife?
\qun (2) Apakah bahagian-bahagian pisau?
\ex handle, hilt, guard, blade, edge, tip, back, flat
\exn pemegang, mata pisau, hujung, belakang, rata
\qu (3) What are the parts of a hammer?
\qun (3) Apakah bahagian-bahagian penukul?
\ex handle, neck, head, claw
\exn pemegang, leher, kepala
\qu (4) What are the parts of a saw?
\qun (4) Apakah bahagian-bahagian gergaji?
\ex handle, blade, teeth
\exn pemegang, mata gergaji, gigi

\is 6.7.9
\sd Machine
\sdn Mesin-mesin
\oldis 6.7.9
\oldsd Machine
\oldsdn Mesin-mesin
\dd Use this domain for words referring to machines.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to machines?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada mesin-mesin?
\ex machine, mechanics, machinery, apparatus, engine, motor
\exn mesin, mekanik, alat-alat, komputer
\qu (2) What words refer to types of machines?
\qun
\ex pump, generator, grinder, mill, computer
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to machines used in homes?
\qun
\ex appliance, refrigerator, stove, oven
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to when a machine is working?
\qun (4) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada mesin yang sedang bekerja?
\ex be on, run, operate, work
\exn sedang digunakan, bekerja, berjalan, berfungsi
\qu (5) What words refer to when a machine is not working?
\qun (5) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada mesin yang tidak berfungsi?
\ex be off, break down, broken
\exn rosak, tidak berfungsi
\qu (6) What words refer to starting a machine?
\qun (6) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada memasang mesin?
\ex start, turn on, switch on, ignition
\exn mulakan, hidupkan
\qu (7) What words refer to stopping a machine?
\qun (7) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada menghentikan mesin?
\ex stop, turn off, shut down
\exn hentikan, tutup

\sd Own, possess
\sdn
\oldis 6.8.1.1
\oldsd Possess
\oldsdn Memiliki
\dd Use this domain for words related to owning something.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to owning something?
\qun
\ex own, possess, have, belong to
\exn
\xe That house <belongs to> John.
\xen

\qun
\ex owner
\exn
\xe John is the <owner> of the house.
\xen
\qu (3) What words refer to claiming something as your own?
\qun
\ex call, claim, have dibs, lay claim to, stake a claim
\exn

\is 6.8.1.2
\sd Rich
\sdn
\oldis 6.8.1.4
\oldsd Wealthy
\oldsdn Kaya
\dd Use this domain for words related to being rich.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to being rich?
\qun
\ex be wealthy, be rich, rich person, the rich, the wealth, the upper class, live comfortable, be well-off, well-to-do
\exn
\qu (2) What words describe someone who is rich?
\qun
\ex rich, wealthy, affluent, prosperous, well-off, privileged
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe someone who is very rich?
\qun
\ex fabulous wealth, filthy rich, millionaire, billionaire
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to someone who has enough but is not rich or poor?
\qun
\ex middle class, bourgeois
\exn

\is 6.8.1.3
\sd Poor
\sdn Miskin
\oldis 6.8.1.6
\oldsd Poor
\oldsdn Miskin
\dd Use this domain for words related to being poor.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to being poor?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada kemiskinan?
\ex be poor, be below the poverty line, hardship case
\exn miskin, di bawah paras kemiskinan
\qu (2) What words describe someone who is poor?
\qun
\ex poor (person, man), destitute (person), needy, bankrupt, broke, needy, underprivileged, impoverished
\exn
\qu (3) What words are used for very bad poverty?
\qun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk kemiskinan yang teruk?
\ex destitute, abject poverty, owns nothing but the clothes on his back
\exn papa, kemiskinan yang teruk, tidak memiliki apa-apa hanya baju di badan.
\qu (4) What words refer to the condition of being poor?
\qun
\ex poverty
\exn
\qu (5) What is a poor person called?
\qun (5) Apakah sebutan bagi orang miskin?
\ex poor person, tramp, bum, hobo, beggar, homeless person
\exn orang miskin, pengemis, peminta sedekah, orang yang tiada rumah, gelendangan
\qu (6) What are poor people called?
\qun (6) Apakah sebutan bagi orang miskin?
\ex the poor, the homeless, the destitute
\exn orang miskin, yang tiada rumah, yang papa

\is 6.8.2.6
\sd Collect
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words related to collecting things you find interesting. In some cultures people collect rare or valuable things that they think are attractive or interesting, such as art, stamps, coins, books, or antiques.
\ddn

\qun
\ex collect, acquire
\exn

\qun
\ex collector
\exn

\ex collection, set
\exn
\gd I044F740B-94F3-4096-AA3A-C07F5E708346

\is 6.8.2.7
\sd Earn
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words related to earning money for work that you do.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to earning money?
\qun
\ex earn, be paid, get paid, make, get, be on, gross
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to earning a certain amount of money after taxes have been taken out?
\qun
\ex take home, net, clear
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to earning enough to pay for what you need?
\qun
\ex earn a living, make a living, support yourself, earn your keep
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to earning a lot of money?
\qun
\ex make good money, be highly paid, be well paid, make a fortune, rake it in
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to the money you earn?
\qun
\ex pay, salary, wages, earnings, income, wage
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to someone who earns money?
\qun
\ex the breadwinner, wage-earner, salaried, on a salary
\exn

\is 6.8.3.1

\sdn Memberi, menderma
\oldis 6.8.3.1

\oldsdn Memberi, menderma

\ex give, give away, donate, let someone have, offer, spare
\exn memberi, menghadiahkan, hadiah, menawarkan, mengirim (sesuatu kepada seseorang), menderma
\qu (2) What words refer to officially giving something to someone?
\qun
\ex allocate, allot, award, confer, grant, present
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to giving something to poor people?
\qun
\ex give, give away, donate, go to, make a donation, subscribe to
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to giving many things to someone?
\qun
\ex be generous, lavish something on, shower
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to someone who gives?
\qun
\ex giver, benefactor, donor, philanthropist
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to something that is given?
\qun
\ex gift, present, prize, reward
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to something that is given to poor people?
\qun
\ex charity, donation, handout
\exn

\is 6.8.4.7
\sd Spend
\sdn Mengguna
\oldis 6.8.4.7
\oldsd Spend
\oldsdn Mengguna

\dd Use this domain for words related to spending money.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to spending money?
\qun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada penggunakan wang?
\ex spend, pay, give
\exn belanja, bayar, beri
\qu (2) What words refer to spending lots of money?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada membelanjakan banyak wang?
\ex spend a lot, go to great expense, spare no expense, shell out, go through, eat up
\exn banyak belanja, belanja tanpa had
\qu (3) What words refer to spending money carelessly?
\qun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada penggunaan wang dengan cara yang tidak bertanggungjawab?
\ex squander, blow, waste, scatter
\exn membazir, memboros
\qu (4) What words describe someone who spends lots of money carelessly?
\qun (4) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk menggambarkan seorang yang berbelanja banyak dengan cara yang tidak bertanggungjawap?
\ex extravagant, spendthrift, big spender
\exn pembazir, pemboros, berbelanja banyak
\qu (5) What words refer to not spending a lot of money?
\qun (5) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada tidak menggunakan wang yang banyak?
\ex economize, scrimp and save, budget, tighten your belt, live on a shoestring
\exn berekonomi, berpekin, berjimat, hidup berikat pinggang, berjimat cermat
\qu (6) What words describe someone who does not spend a lot of money?
\qun (6) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk menggambarkan orang yang tidak membelanjakan banyak wang?
\ex thrifty, economical, frugal, careful with your money
\exn berjimat, jimat cermat, berekonomi, berhati-hati dengan wang
\qu (7) What words describe how much you spend?
\qun (7) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk menggambarkan berapa banyak yang kamu belanja?
\ex expenses, expenditure, spending, outlay, overhead, costs, budget
\exn belanja, perbelanjaan, kos, belanjawan

\exn Membayar cukai, menjelaskan hutang cukai

\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 6.8.9.6
\cf Dishonest
\gd I63B18261-FAF3-4AB2-BCB4-7C3AC4D6D6BA

\is 6.8.9.1
\sd Steal
\sdn Mencuri
\oldis 6.8.9.1
\oldsd Steal
\oldsdn Mencuri
\oldis 6.8.9.4
\oldsd Embezzle
\oldsdn Menggelapkan wang
\dd Use this domain for words related to stealing something--to take something that does not belong to you.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to stealing something?
\qun
\ex steal, filch, help yourself to, lift, nick, pinch, purloin, rip off, rustle, take, walk off with
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to stealing something that is not very valuable?
\qun
\ex pilfer, snitch, swipe, petty larceny
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to stealing things from a house or store?
\qun
\ex burgle, burglarize, hold up, knock over, loot, rob (a bank), shoplift
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to stealing something from a person?
\qun
\ex rob, mug, pickpocket, pick someone's pocket, snatch someone's purse
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to stealing money from your job?
\qun
\ex embezzle, misappropriate, have your fingers in the till, embezzlement, corruption, abscond with the money, skim profits
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to stealing a vehicle?
\qun
\ex carjacking, hijack, hijacked, hijacking, piracy
\exn
\qu (7) What do robbers do in order to steal things?
\qun (7) Apakah yang dilakukan oleh perompak supaya mencuri barang?
\ex break in, break down the door, case a joint, crack a safe, pick a lock
\exn memecah, memecah pintu, merosakkan kunci, membuka peti, curi masuk
\qu (8) What words refer to the crime of stealing?
\qun
\ex stealing, burglary, larceny, robbery, shoplifting, theft
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to the act of stealing?
\qun
\ex banditry, break-in, breaking and entering, embezzlement, hold-up, jewel heist, job, misappropriation, mugging, purse snatching, pick pocketing, pilferage, pilfering, racketeering, raid, robbery, snatch, stick-up, theft
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to a person who steals?
\qun
\ex bandit, burglar, cutpurse, embezzler, gangster, highwayman, hijacker, kleptomaniac, mugger, pickpocket, pilferer, pirate, plunderer, purse-snatcher, robber, bank robber, train robber, shoplifter, stealer, thief, jewel thief
\exn
\qu (11) What words describe someone who steals?
\qun
\ex light-fingered, thieving
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to something that is stolen?
\qun
\ex loot, the goods, stolen goods, haul, hot items, tainted money
\exn
\qu (13) What words describe something that is stolen?
\qun
\ex hot, pirated, stolen
\exn
\qu (14) What do robbers do with the things they steal?
\qun (14) Apakah yang dilakukan oleh perompak-perompak dengan barang yang mereka curi?
\ex fence stolen goods, launder money, bury treasure
\exn jual, sembunyi, pagari barang yang dirompak, menguburkan harta
\qu (15) What tools are used by robbers?
\qun (15) Apakah alat-alat yang digunakan oleh perompak?
\ex gun, knife, pick, safe cracking tools, skeleton key, mask, gloves, get away car
\exn senanpang, pisau, alat untuk memecah, rangkak kunci, topeng, sarung tangan, kereta untuk melarikan diri
\qu (16) What words refer to catching a thief?
\qun (16) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada menangkap pencuri?
\ex caught red-handed
\exn tertangkap basah

\nt Old questions for \oldis 6.8.9.1
\oldqu (1) What words are used of the action of stealing?
\oldqun (1) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk merujuk kepada perbuatan mencuri?
\oldex steal, rob, snatch someone's purse, pick someone's pocket, rob a bank, hold up, pirate, highjack
\oldexn mencuri, merompak, ragut, meragut dompet, mencopet, merompak bank, lanun, rampasan
\oldqu (3) What words are used to refer to the activity or event?
\oldqun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang digunakan untuk merujuk kepada tindakan atau peristiwa itu?
\oldex stealing, robbery, banditry, gangsterism, purse snatching, pickpocketing, breaking and entering, a hold up, jewel heist
\oldexn mencuri, kegiatan penjahat, merompak, gangster, meragut dompet, mencopet, memecah masuk, merompak, merompak batu permata
\oldqu (4) What is a person called who steals?
\oldqun (4) Apakah panggilan bagi orang yang mencuri?
\oldex thief, jewel thief, robber, bank robber, train robber, bandit, gangster, purse snatcher, pickpocket, pirate, highjacker
\oldexn pencuri, perompak, perompak batu permata, perompak bank, perompak kereta api, penjahat, gengster, peragut, pencopet, lanun, perampas
\oldqu (5) What kinds of things are stolen?
\oldqun (5) Apakah jenis-jenis barang yang dicuri?
\oldex loot, the goods, stolen goods, hot items
\oldexn jarahan, barang-barang curian

\oldsd Labor
\oldsdn Kerja
\dd Use this domain for words related to working for someone.
\ddn Gunakan bidang lingkungan ini untuk kata-kata yang merujuk kepada kerja - orang yang bekerja untuk orang lain.
\qu (1) What words refer to working for someone?
\qun
\ex work for, be employed, have a job, be in the employ of
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to a person who works for someone?
\qun (2) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada orang yang bekerja untuk orang lain?
\ex employee, hired hand, worker, labor
\exn bekerja, pekerja
\qu (3) What words refer to hiring someone?
\qun (3) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada mengupah seseorang?
\ex hire, employ
\exn upah, mengupah
\qu (4) What words refer to a person who hires someone?
\qun
\ex employer, boss, management
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to getting a job?
\qun
\ex get a job, find work
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to a person's job?
\qun
\ex job, employment
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to the money a person receives for his work?
\qun
\ex wages, salary, income, benefits
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to the practice of having people work at special jobs?
\qun (8) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada orang yang melakukan tugas-tugas khas?
\ex division of labor, specialization, specialist
\exn pembahagian kerja, pakar
\qu (9) What words refer to an organization of workers?
\qun (9) Apakah kata-kata yang merujuk kepada satu organisasi pekerja?
\ex labor union, farmers cooperative, collective bargaining, labor relations
\exn persatuan pekerja, koperasi peladang, perhubungan pekerja
\qu (10) What words refer to firing an employee?
\qun
\ex fire someone, send packing, dismiss, show the door to, give the sack to, lay off, discharge, let go
\exn
\qu (11) What words refer to being fired from a job?
\qun
\ex get the sack, get the ax, lose your job, be laid off
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to going on strike?
\qun
\ex strike (v), go on strike, strike (n), striker
\exn

\is 7
\sd Physical actions
\sdn
\oldis 7
\oldsd Actions
\oldsdn Tindakan/Pergerakan
\dd Use this domain for general words for physical actions--moving yourself, moving things, and changing things.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada tindakan dan kegiatan-kegiatan fizikal/badan yang melibatkan benda.
\qu (1) What general words refer to physical actions?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada kegiatan fizikal/tubuh?
\ex act, action, active, activity, do, event, process
\exn bertindak, pergerakan, beraksi, aktif, aktiviti/kegiatan, buat/lakukan, peristiwa/acara, proses

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7
\gd ID60FAF11-CC6E-48DB-8A13-82F86D78AB00

\is 7.1
\sd Posture
\sdn Postur/gaya tubuh badan
\oldis 7.1
\oldsd Posture
\oldsdn Postur/gaya tubuh badan
\dd Use this domain for general words indicating the posture or stance of a person's body. Use the domains in this section for specific words for postures and for moving parts of the body. Many of these words have two meanings. One meaning is stative, indicating that the body is in a particular posture, but not moving. The other meaning is active, indicating that the person is moving his body into a particular posture. Some of these words can be used of animals or even things, if the things are perceived as being similar in posture to that of a human body.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan umum yang menunjukkan postur/kedudukan diri atau cara/gaya tubuh badan seseorang. Gunakan domain-domain dalam bahagian ini bagi mencari perkataan-perkataan tertentu yang merujuk kepada postur. Banyak daripada perkataan-perkataan ini mempunyai dua makna. Satu daripadanya bermaksud keadaan tubuh berada dalam postur tertentu, tetapi tidak bergerak. Manakala yang satu lagi menunjukkan orang tersebut sedang menggerakkan tubuhnya ke dalam suatu postur tertentu. Beberapa daripada perkataan-perkataan ini juga dapat digunakan bagi postur binatang ataupun benda-benda jika ia menyerupai postur tubuh manusia.
\qu (1) What general words refer to a person's posture?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada postur seseorang?
\ex posture, stance, pose, position
\exn postur, gaya, posisi, kedudukan
\qu (2) What general words refer to changing your posture?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada mengubah postur anda?
\ex change your posture/stance, pose, shift, squirm
\exn mengubah postur/kedudukan diri seseorang, bergaya, berganjak, menggeliat-geliut

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.1
\cf Move

\gd I9F3B4CAB-DC8A-430E-88F3-D3002DF64FB8

\is 7.1.1
\sd Stand
\sdn Berdiri
\oldis 7.1.1
\oldsd Stand
\oldsdn Berdiri
\dd Use this domain for words related to standing. The words in this domain may include whether the person is standing on one foot or two, whether the person's feet are together or placed apart, whether something is between the person's feet, how fast the person stands up.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan berdiri. Perkataan-perkataan dalam domain ini mungkin merangkumi sama ada orang itu berdiri di atas sebelah kaki atau kedua-duanya, sama ada kedua-dua kakinya diletakkan bersama-sama atau terpisah, apakah terdapat sesuatu di antara kedua-dua kaki orang itu, atau kepantasan orang itu berdiri
\qu (1) What words refer to being in a standing position?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada berdiri?
\ex stand, be standing, be on your feet
\exn berdiri, bangkit berdiri
\qu (2) What words refer to standing up from a sitting or lying position?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tindakan untuk berdiri daripada posisi duduk atau baring?
\ex stand, stand up, rise (to your feet), get up, get to your feet, jump to your feet, leap up, leap out of the chair, pick yourself up
\exn berdiri, bangkit, bangun, bingkas, melompat dari kerusi dan berdiri
\qu (3) How do people stand?
\qun (3) Bagaimanakah cara orang berdiri?
\ex stand on one leg, straddle, stand on tiptoes
\exn berdiri di atas satu kaki, mengangkang, berjengket (berdiri di hujung atau tumit kaki)
\qu (4) What words refer to causing someone to stand?
\qun
\ex stand someone up, raise someone to their feet, help someone up
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to standing near something?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada berdiri berhampiran dengan sesuatu?
\ex stand around, stand together
\exn berdiri mengelilingi, berdiri berhampiran, berdiri bersama-sama, berdiri di sisi
\qu (6) How do you order someone to stand?
\qun (6) Bagaimanakah anda meminta seseorang supaya berdiri?
\ex on your feet
\exn sila berdiri, sila bangun

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.1.1
\oldqu (4) What words refer to causing someone stand?
\oldqun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tindakan menyebabkan seseorang berdiri?
\oldex stand someone up, raise someone to their feet, help someone up
\oldexn membimbing seseorang untuk berdiri, memapah seseorang, membantu seseorang berdiri

\is 7.1.2
\sd Sit
\sdn Duduk
\oldis 7.1.2
\oldsd Sit
\oldsdn Duduk
\dd Use this domain for words referring to sitting and squatting.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada cara duduk dan bercangkung.
\qu (1) What words refer to being in a sitting position?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada posisi duduk?
\ex be sitting, be seated
\exn Duduk
\qu (2) What words describe how a person is sitting?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan cara seseorang sedang duduk?
\ex sit with your legs crossed, sit cross-legged, sit back, settle back, sit up, sit up straight, sit forward, be on the edge of your seat, sit astride, straddle, sit still, sit around, curl up, perch
\exn bersila, bersimpuh, duduk menunduk, duduk membungkuk, duduk tegak, duduk mengangkang, duduk diam-diam, duduk berteleku, menukar-nukar tempat duduk, duduk memeluk lutut/duduk berlingkar, bertenggek menyangkung
\qu (3) What words refer to sitting down from a standing position?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada keadaan seseorang yang duduk daripada posisi berdiri?
\ex sit, sit down, be seated, take your seat
\exn duduk, sila duduk, sila ambil tempat duduk
\qu (4) What words refer to sitting up from a lying position?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada keadaan seseorang duduk daripada posisi berbaring?
\ex sit up
\exn bangun
\qu (5) What words describe how a person sits down?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan cara bagaimana seseorang hendak duduk?
\ex sit slowly, sink (down) into, ease into your chair, lower oneself, sit abruptly, flop down, plunk down, plop down
\exn duduk dengan perlahan-lahan, melabuhkan/menjatuhkan punggung, duduk mendadak, menghenyakkan diri, jatuh terduduk,
\qu (6) What words refer to causing someone to sit?
\qun
\ex seat someone, show someone to their seat
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to squatting?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada bertinggung?
\ex squat (down), sit on your haunches, sit back on your heels
\exn duduk mencangkung, bertinggung, berjongkok, mendekam
\qu (8) What words refer to sitting on something?
\qun (8) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada duduk di atas sesuatu (benda atau lain-lain)?
\ex sit on, mount
\exn duduk di atas, menunggang
\qu (9) What words refer to the place where you sit?
\qun (9) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tempat kita duduk?
\ex seat, perch, place
\exn tempat duduk, tempat bertenggek/ tenggeran, tempat
\qu (10) What do you say to someone when you want them to sit down?
\qun (10) Apakah yang anda katakan kepada seseorang jika anda menghendaki mereka duduk?
\ex sit down, take a seat, have a seat, please be seated
\exn duduk, duduklah, sila duduk

\oldqu (6) What words refer to causing a person to sit?
\oldqun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tindakan membuat/menyebabkan seseorang duduk?
\oldex seat someone, show someone to their seat
\oldexn mendudukkan seseorang, menunjukkan seseorang ke tempat duduknya

\is 7.1.3
\sd Lie down
\sdn Baring
\oldis 7.1.3
\oldsd Lie down
\oldsdn Baring
\dd Use this domain for words referring to lying down.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada baring.

\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tindakan berbaring dari posisi berdiri?
\ex lie, lie down, lie back, recline, stretch out, sprawl, prostrate
\exn baring, berbaring, menyandar,
\qu (2) What words describe how a person lies down?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan bagaimana seseorang membaringkan diri?
\ex flop down, fall into bed
\exn Menghenyakkan diri, menjatuhkan diri ke atas katil, merebahkan badan di atas...
\qu (3) What words refer to being in a lying position?
\qun
\ex lie, be lying down, lay, be prone, recumbent, repose
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe how a person is lying?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan bagaimana seseorang berbaring?
\ex lie on your back/front/side, stretched out, spread-eagled, sprawled, flat out, reclining
\exn baring, bertiarap, terlentang, berbaring pada sisi badan, berbaring miring, limping

\exn bangun, bingkas, bangkit, duduk tegak

\ex lay someone (down/somewhere)
\exn membaringkan seseorang (di)
\qu (7) What words refer to the place where a person lies?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tempat seseorang berbaring?
\ex bed
\exn katil, tempat tidur, buaian, pembaringan
