\is 7.2.7.2
\sd Stay, remain
\sdn Tinggal, berada tetap (di sesuatu tempat)
\oldis 7.2.7.2
\oldsd Stay, remain
\oldsdn Tinggal, berada tetap (di sesuatu tempat)
\dd Use this domain for words referring to not moving.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain bagi perkataan yang merujuk kepada tidak bergerak/berpindah.
\qu (1) What words refer to someone not moving?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang tidak bergerak?
\ex stay, stay behind, stay back, remain, remain behind, stay where you are, stay put, remain in place, hold your place, hold still, freeze, stationary, standstill, stand around, stand still, linger, tarry, abide
\exn Tinggal, duduk, ketinggalan zaman, jangan pergi ke mana-mana, tetap

\ex permanent, final resting place
\exn kekal, tempat beristirehat yang terakhir

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.2.7.2

\gd I82EB3050-D382-48F6-A049-22A5F8A3B25A

\is 7.2.7.3
\sd Wait
\sdn Menunggu
\oldis 7.2.7.3
\oldsd Wait
\oldsdn Menunggu
\dd Use this domain for words referring to waiting in a place, waiting to do something, or waiting for something to happen. The basic idea of waiting is for someone to not do anything for a period of time, because he expects something to happen that will cause him to do something.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menunggu di sesuatu tempat, menunggu untuk melakukan sesuatu atau menunggu sesuatu akan terjadi. Bagi sesetengah orang, menunggu bermakna tidak melakukan apa-apa untuk beberapa jangka masa tertentu kerana orang berkenaan mengharap-harapkan sesuatu akan terjadi dan setelah apa yang diharap-harapkan itu terjadi barulah dia akan bertindak.
\qu (1) What words refer to waiting?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataa-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menunggu?
\ex wait, wait for, wait up for, wait on, await, hang on, stand by, wait around, hang around, hold off, wait your turn, sit something out, cool your heels, bide your time, sit tight, sweat it out, hesitate, hesitation, wait and see, wait behind, lie in wait, waiting room, waiting list
\exn tunggu, menunggu, menanti, menanti akan, bersedia, bersiap sedia, berjaga-jaga, tunggu dan lihat, berbaris menunggu giliran, ruang menunggu, senarai menunggu
\qu (2) How do you tell someone to wait?
\qun (2) Bagaimanakah anda meminta seseorang supaya menunggu?
\ex Wait! Wait up. Just a minute. Just a moment. I'll be right with you. Hold on. Hang on. Please hold.
\exn Tunggu! Tunggu dulu, Nanti! Nanti dulu, Sekejap. Sebentar. Kembali sebentar lagi. Sila tunggu sekejap/sebentar.
\qu (3) What words refer to waiting in a line of people?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menunggu dalam barisan?
\ex line up, queue, stand in line, cut in line
\exn berbaris, beratur, ikut giliran
\qu (4) What words describe how a person feels when he must wait?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan perasaan seseorang apabila orang berkenaan terpaksa menunggu?
\ex look forward to, expectant, (I) can't wait, patient, impatient
\exn tidak sabar-sabar, terharap-harap, menanti-nanti, menunggu-nunggu, saya tidak boleh menunggu, sabar, tidak sabar
\qu (5) What words refer to making someone wait?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada membuat seseorang menunggu?
\ex keep someone waiting, make someone wait, delay
\exn membuat seseorang menunggu/menanti, membiarkan (seseorang) menunggu/menanti, lambat, tergendala, lewat, tangguh, tunda
\qu (6) What words refer to a period of time when you have to wait?
\qun
\ex wait (n), delay (n)
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to refusing to wait patiently and going ahead of other people instead?
\qun
\ex cut in line, cut in front of someone, cut someone off, jump the queue, push in
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.2.7.3
\gd ID88D862C-01D4-4B43-9FBE-59208922E022

\is 7.2.8
\sd Send someone
\sdn Mengutus seseorang
\oldis 7.2.9
\oldsd Send someone
\oldsdn Mengutus seseorang
\dd Use this domain for words related to causing someone to go somewhere.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan menyebabkan seseorang ke pergi ke suatu tempat.
\qu (1) What words refer to sending someone somewhere?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengutus seseorang ke sesuatu tempat?
\ex send, dismiss, transfer
\exn menghantar, utus, mengutus, mengirim, memindahkan atau menukarkan seseorang ke (bandar, daerah dsbg yang lain untuk bekerja)
\qu (2) What words refer to summoning someone to come to you?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengarahkan seseorang datang kepada anda?
\ex summon
\exn mengarah, memerintah, menyuruh
\qu (3) What words refer to sending someone to do something?
\qun
\ex send
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.2.9
\gd I38AB2681-FCC7-4A75-BB0B-29C5CD2E3A8F

\is 7.3
\sd Move something
\sdn Memindahkan sesuatu
\oldis 7.3
\oldsd Move something
\oldsdn Memindahkan sesuatu
\dd Use this domain for general words referring to moving something or someone.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada memindahkan sesuatu.
\qu (1) What words refer to moving something?
\qun
\ex move, transfer, transport, shift, relocate, shunt, conduct, convey
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to moving something very quickly?
\qun
\ex jerk
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to moving something through the air?
\qun
\ex swing
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to moving something that is difficult to move?
\qun
\ex shift, free, release
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.3

\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada memindahkan sesuatu?

\oldexn memindahkan, menukarkan, menghantar

\is 7.3.1
\sd Carry
\sdn Angkat
\oldis 7.3.1
\oldsd Carry
\oldsdn Angkat
\dd Use this domain for words referring to carrying something--to pick something up and hold it while moving oneself.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengangkat sesuatu—mengambil sesuatu benda dan memegangnya sementara diri sendiri bergerak
\qu (1) What general words refer to carrying something?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada mengangkat sesuatu?
\ex carry, bear, tote
\exn angkat, menanggung, angkut
\qu (2) What words refer to carrying something in a particular manner?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengangkat sesuatu dengan cara tertentu?
\ex pack, carry in the arms, carry on the shoulders, shoulder (v), carry on a pole, cradle
\exn menggandar, menggalas, mencokeh, memikul, menjinjing, menjinjit, menyikut, menggendong, mendukung, menjunjung, membimbit
\qu (3) What words refer to carrying something very heavy?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengangkat sesuatu yang sangat berat?
\ex lug, haul, cart
\exn mengheret, menghela, menyeret, mengangkut, menjujut, menarik sekuat tenaga
\qu (4) What words refer to carrying many things?
\qun
\ex be loaded (down) with, overloaded, be laden with, be weighed down with, under the weight of
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to someone who carries things?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang mengangkat barang?
\ex porter, bearer, carrier, courier
\exn porter
\qu (6) What words refer to something that is carried?
\qun
\ex load, burden, armful
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe something that can be carried?
\qun
\ex portable
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to something used to carry things?
\qun
\ex pack, backpack, stretcher, carrying pole
\exn

\cf Carrying tool

\is 7.3.1.1
\sd Throw
\sdn
\oldis 7.3.1.1
\oldsd Drag
\oldsdn Heret
\dd Use this domain for words referring to throwing something.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menarik sesuatu di atas permukaan tanah, lantai dll.
\qu (1) What words refer to throwing something?
\qun
\ex throw, cast
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to throwing something in a careless way?
\qun
\ex chuck, sling, toss, pitch, flick
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to throwing something with force?
\qun
\ex hurl, fling, heave, fire
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to throwing a ball when playing a game?
\qun
\ex pass, pitch, bowl, peg
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to throwing something high in the air?
\qun
\ex lob, throw up in the air
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to throwing something so that it turns over and over?
\qun
\ex toss, flip
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to throwing things at someone?
\qun
\ex pelt, stone, bombard, shower
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to something throwing something?
\qun
\ex send something flying, catapult, propel, pitch, launch, sling
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to an act of throwing?
\qun
\ex throw (n)
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to something hitting the ground after being thrown?
\qun
\ex land, hit, fall
\exn
\qu (11) What words refer to something used to throw things?
\qun
\ex sling, slingshot, throwing stick
\exn

\sdn Angkat

\oldsdn Angkat

\qu (1) What words refer to moving something up?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menggerakkan atau menaikkan sesuatu ke atas?
\ex lift, lift up, raise, put up, hoist, pull up, elevate, erect, uplift, heighten, jack up, pick up, levitate
\exn angkat, menaikkan, meneruskan, angkut (sesuatu)ke atas, tarik ke atas, dongak, mengangkat (sesuatu) ke atas, menegakkan, meningkatkan (kehidupan), meninggikan, menyerlahkan, memuncakkan, menambahkan, membicu (kereta), mengutip
\qu (2) What words refer to putting something above something else?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada meletakkan sesuatu di atas sesuatu (benda dll) yang lain?
\ex put above, place over
\exn meletakkan sesuatu di atas, meninggikan lebih daripada, lebih mementingkan
\qu (3) What words refer to putting something on top of something?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada meletakkan sesuatu di atas sekali pada sesuatu (benda atau lain-lain)?
\ex put on top, superimpose
\exn letak di atas sekali, letak di tempat teratas, menindih
\qu (4) What words refer to something used to lift things?
\qun
\ex lever, fulcrum, elevator, lift, jack, hoist, crane
\exn

\exn Lepaskan, juntaikan, biarkan ia berjuntaian, biarkan sesuatu terlepas, biarkan sesuatu jatuh

\oldsdn Masukkan

\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada meletakkan sesuatu ke dalam sesuatu yang lain?
\ex put in, put inside, move in, insert, introduce, inject, implant, penetrate, pierce, inset, inlay, pack in, stuff in, load
\exn masukkan, meletakkannya di dalam, pindahkan ke dalam, sisipkan, selitkan, menyisipkan, menyelitkan, suntikkan, menyuntik, mengimplan, meresap masuk, menembus, melantas (cahaya), sisipan, menatah, tatah dalam, memenuhkan, menyumbat, mengisikan
\qu (2) What words refer to pushing something into an opening or into something soft?
\qun
\ex stick, ram, drive, plunge, thrust
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to pushing something into a small space?
\qun
\ex force, stuff, squeeze, jam, cram, pack, wedge in
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to putting something into a hole or small space?
\qun
\ex put in/into/inside, slide something into, tuck in/into/under, insert
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to putting something into liquid?
\qun
\ex immerse, submerge
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to putting something into liquid for a short time?
\qun
\ex dip, dunk
\exn

\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengeluarkan sesuatu dari sesuatu yang lain?
\ex take out, get something out, remove, extract, extricate, eliminate, bring out, clear something out, clean out, withdraw, fish out
\exn keluarkan, mengorek, memicitnya keluar, menghisap, memerah
\qu (2) What words refer to taking something out of the ground?
\qun
\ex root out, uproot, dig out, pull up, weed out, grub up, rake out
\exn

\qun

\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to turning a container so that its contents come out?
\qun
\ex pour, dump, spill
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to pulling something out of something?
\qun
\ex pull out, draw out, pluck, tear out
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to pushing something out of something?
\qun
\ex push out, eject, squeeze out, expel
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.3.2.7
\cf Remove, take apart
\gd I5A39EDAE-1ACE-4889-B636-1DFD2A1BCC3C

\is 7.3.2.8
\sd Pull
\sdn Tarik
\oldis 7.3.2.8
\oldsd Pull
\oldsdn Tarik
\dd Use this domain for words related to pulling--causing something to move toward you.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi bila seseorang atau sesuatu menyebabkan sesuatu bergerak ke arahnya.
\qu (1) What words refer to pulling something so that it moves toward you?
\qun
\ex pull, pull back, bring back, draw, tug
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to pulling something quickly or suddenly?
\qun
\ex jerk, yank, tug
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to pulling something with a lot of force so that it comes away from the thing it is connected to?
\qun
\ex pull something away/from/out/apart, wrench something open/off/away, tear something out/from/away/down
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to pulling something, but without making it come away from the thing it is connected to?
\qun
\ex pull at, pull on, give something a pull, tug at, give something a tug
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to pulling something heavy?
\qun
\ex heave, lug, haul
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to pulling something along the ground?
\qun
\ex drag
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to pulling something with a rope or chain?
\qun
\ex (no words in English)
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to pulling something in some direction?
\qun
\ex pull down, pull up, pull across, pull out
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to pulling something onto you?
\qun
\ex pull on, pull over, pull something over on top of you
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to a vehicle or animal pulling something so that it moves along behind?
\qun
\ex pull, tow, take in tow, draw, trail something behind you
\exn
\qu (11) What words refer to something being pulled along behind?
\qun
\ex in tow, trailing, trailer
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to causing something to move towards you without touching it?
\qun
\ex attract, lure, draw
\exn
\qu (13) What words refer to two or more people pulling on both ends of something?
\qun
\ex tug of war
\exn

\is 7.3.2.9
\sd Push
\sdn Tolak
\oldis 7.3.2.9
\oldsd Push
\oldsdn Tolak
\dd Use this domain for when someone or something causes something to move away from him.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi kata kerja yang merujuk kepada seseorang atau sesuatu menolak sesuatu jauh daripada orang atau benda berkenaan.
\qu (1) What words refer to pushing something so that it moves away you?
\qun
\ex push something, push away, give something a push, move something forward, advance something, thrust, nudge, give impetus, impel
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to pushing something quickly or suddenly?
\qun
\ex shove, give something a shove, jog, jolt
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to pushing someone roughly?
\qun
\ex shove, hustle, bundle, manhandle
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to pushing people in a crowd?
\qun
\ex push, shove, press, force your way, jostle, elbow, barge
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to pushing something, but without making it move?
\qun
\ex push on, press
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to pushing something heavy?
\qun
\ex put your shoulder into it
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to pushing something along the ground?
\qun
\ex push
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to pushing something with your finger or a stick?
\qun
\ex poke, give something a poke, prod, jab, dig someone in the ribs
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to pushing something so that it falls over?
\qun
\ex push over, topple
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to pushing something in some direction?
\qun
\ex push aside, push out of the way
\exn
\qu (11) What words refer to causing something to move away from you without touching it?
\qun
\ex repel
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to pushing something from all directions?
\qun
\ex squeeze, compress
\exn
\qu (13) What words refer to pushing something into an opening or into something soft?
\qun
\ex stick something into something, ram, drive, plunge, thrust
\exn
\qu (14) What words refer to pushing something into a small space?
\qun
\ex push in, squeeze in, jam in, force, stuff
\exn
\qu (15) What words refer to pushing yourself into a small space?
\qun
\ex squeeze into, squeeze through, squeeze in between
\exn
\qu (16) What words refer to how hard you push?
\qun
\ex pressure, put pressure on
\exn
\qu (17) What words refer to pushing something with wheels?
\qun
\ex wheel (v), push, roll, trundle
\exn

\is 7.3.5
\sd Turn something
\sdn Memusingkan sesuatu
\oldis 7.3.5
\oldsd Turn something
\oldsdn Memusingkan sesuatu
\dd Use this domain for turning something--to cause something to change direction, or to cause something to revolve or move in a circle.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini untuk kata kerja memusingkan sesuatu—menyebabkan sesuatu berubah arah atau menyebabkan sesuatu berputar.
\qu (1) What words refer to causing something to change direction?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menyebabkan sesuatu berubah arah?
\ex turn, turn around, bend (something's) course
\exn pusingkan, memusingkan, putarkan, memutarkan
\qu (2) What words refer to causing something to move in a circle or curve?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menyebabkan sesuatu bergerak dalam bentuk bulatan atau lengkung?
\ex swing
\exn mengayun, membuai
\qu (3) What words refer to causing something to revolve?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menyebabkan sesuatu beredar atau berputar dalam bulatan?
\ex spin, revolve
\exn memusingkan, memutarkankan,
\qu (4) What words refer to turning something so the bottom side is up?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memutarkan sesuatu supaya bahagian bawahnya naik?
\ex turn up side down, turn over, upturn, flip over
\exn menterbalikkan, menelangkupkan, memusingkan bahagian atasnya ke bawah
\qu (5) What words refer to turning something so the inside is out?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menterbalikkan sesuatu supaya bahagian dalamnya keluar?
\ex turn inside-out
\exn Terbalikkan
\qu (6) What words refer to stirring something?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengacau-ngacau sesuatu?
\ex stir
\exn mengacau-ngacau, mencampur-aduk,
\qu (7) What words refer to winding something around another thing?
\qun
\ex wind, coil, curl, loop, roll, spin, twirl, twist, whirl

\ex blockade, dam, barricade, wall, barrier, fence
\exn

\is 7.3.6.3
\sd Limit
\sdn Had
\oldis 7.3.6.3
\oldsd Limit
\oldsdn Had

\dd Use this domain for words referring to a limit beyond which something may or should not go, and for words referring to imposing a limit.

\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengehadkan pergerakan sesuatu?

\exn pengehadan, mengenakan had laju, mengetatkan had laju, membatasi, menyekat kelajuan,
\qu (2) What words refer to a limit beyond which something may not move?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada had yang tidak dapat dilintasi oleh sesuatu?
\ex limit, boundary, extent, (furthest) reach, barrier, restriction
\exn Had, batas, sekatan, sempadan, penyekat, takat
\qu (3) What words refer to going beyond the limit?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada melampaui batas?
\ex exceed, cross, trespass, overstep
\exn melampaui, melampaui batas, melebihi had, menceroboh, melanggar (dari segi undang-undang)

\ex abandoned, forgotten, forsaken, marooned
\exn

\ex Leave it. Leave it where it is. Leave it behind. Leave it here. Don't move it. Forget it.
\exn Biarkan sahaja di sana/situ. Tinggalkan sahaja di mana ia berada. Jangan pindahkannya. Lupakan sahaja.

\is 7.5
\sd Arrange
\sdn
\oldis 7.4
\oldsd Arrange, organize
\oldsdn Menyusun, mengatur
\oldis 7.4
\oldsd Arrange, organize
\oldsdn Menyusun, mengatur
\dd Use this domain for words referring to arranging things--to physically move a group of things or people and put them in a pattern.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menyusun sesuatu-meletakkan berbilang objek dalam sesuatu corak atau pola.
\qu (1) What words refer to arranging things?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menyusun sesuatu?
\ex arrange, align, array, dispose, lay out, line up, order, put in order, range, set out, concatenate
\exn menyusun, mengatur, menindih-nindihkan, melapis-lapiskan, membetulkan
\qu (2) What words refer to the pattern in which things are arranged?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada pola di mana hal atau benda disusun?
\ex arrangement, alignment, array, formation, order, ordering, pattern, row, disposition, distribution, gradation, grouping, layout, concatenation
\exn Pola, corak, susunan, aturan, penjajaran, penyebarisan
\qu (3) What words refer to arranging things a second time, or arranging things after they have been mixed up?
\qun
\ex rearrange, rearrangement, reorder, reordering, reform, reformation
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe things that have been arranged?
\qun
\ex arranged, ordered, well-ordered, be in order, regular
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to when everything is arranged?
\qun
\ex order
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4

\oldex table, matrix, chart, organizational chart, flow chart, grid, cubby hole, pidgeon hole, in basket, out basket, shelves, bookshelf
\oldexn jadual, matriks, carta, carta organisasi, carta aliran, grid, rak, rak buku

\oldex rearrange, rearrangement, reorder, reordering, reorganize, reorganization
\oldexn disusun semula, penyusunan semula, diatur semula

\is 7.5.1
\sd Gather
\sdn Mengumpul
\oldis 7.4.1
\oldsd Gather
\oldsdn Mengumpul
\dd Use this domain for words referring to gathering things into a group. The basic idea of this domain involves a situation in which two or more things are not together, and someone moves them so that they are together.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengumpulkan benda ke dalam satu kumpulan. Asas domain ini melibatkan satu situasi di mana dua atau lebih benda tidak bersama-sama dan seseorang memindahkan atau menggerakkannya supaya mereka terkumpul bersama-sama.
\qu (1) What words refer to gathering things?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengumpulkan benda-benda?
\ex gather, accumulate, amass, assemble, bring together, bunch up, collect, compile, concentrate, consolidate, cumulate, group (v), heap, heap up, herd together, layer (v), mass together, pile, rally, round-up, stack, stack up, load
\exn mengumpulkan, menghimpunkan, mengelompokkan, melonggokkan, menyusunkan, melapiskan, menimbunkan
\qu (2) What words refer to things gathering?
\qun
\ex gather, clump, cluster, collect, congregate, crowd together, flock, form, gang, horde, meet, pile up, swarm, throng
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe things that have been gathered?
\qun
\ex gathered, collected, concentrated, crowded, crowding, cumulative, massed together, massing, togetherness, heaped, loaded, piled
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to a group of things that have been gathered together?
\qun
\ex gathering, assemblage, bunch, collection, concentration, group, heap, huddle, mass, pile, stack
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.1
\oldqu (2) What words describe things which have been gathered?
\oldqun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada benda-benda atau hal-hal yang telah dikumpulkan?
\oldex gathered, collected, togetherness, crowded, crowding, massed together, massing, concentrated
\oldexn terkumpul, disatukan, bersatu hati, kebersamaan, massa beramai-ramai, dipekatkan
\oldqu (3) What words refer to a group of things which have been gathered together?
\oldqun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sekumpulan barang-barang yang telah dikumpulkan?
\oldex gathering, assemblage, collection, group, mass, bunch, concentration, stack, pile, heap
\oldexn himpunan, kumpulan, koleksi, sebatian, kelompok, set timbunan,
\cf Invite
\gd IC16334A0-BE29-4A1E-A870-4CB3F1DF984D

\is 7.5.1.1
\sd Separate, scatter
\sdn Berasing-asing, serak
\oldis 7.4.1.1
\oldsd Separate, scatter
\oldsdn Berasing-asing, serak
\dd Use this domain for words referring to separating things into groups, and scattering things. The basic idea of this domain involves a situation in which two or more things are together, and someone moves them so that they are no longer together.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengasing-asingkan hal atau benda ke dalam kumpulan-kumpulan dan menyerak-nyerakkannya. Idea asas domain in termasuklah satu situasi di mana dua atau lebih daripada dua hal atau benda adalah bersama dan seseorang memindahkannya supaya ianya tidak bersama.
\qu (1) What words refer to separating or scattering things?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengasingkan atau menyerakkan hal atau benda?
\ex separate, separation, scatter, disperse, dispersion, dispersal, spread out, spray, move apart, move away from each other, put space between, to space (things), space out, place at intervals, divide, division, blow apart, distribute, sow, strew, sift
\exn Memisah, mengasingkan, menyerakkan, memencarkan, menyebarkan, menyelerakkan, menyembur, menyelang, membahagi-bahagikan, mengagih-agihkan, menabur
\qu (2) What words are used of separating people?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk memisahkan orang?
\ex separate fighting people, disperse troops
\exn meleraikan, menyuraikan, memisahkan, bertempiaran
\qu (3) What words describe the condition of things when they are separated?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada keadaan perkara apabila ia dileraikan?
\ex separation, dispersion, dispersal, the spread of, division
\exn peleraian, penyuraian, pembahagian,
\qu (4) What words refer to a group of things that have been separated?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada benda-benda yang telah dipisahkan?
\ex a scattering (of something), Diaspora
\exn Tertabur
\qu (5) What words describe things that have been scattered?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada benda-benda yang telah diserakkan?
\ex be scattered, thrown apart, resettled, thinly spread, spread out, far flung, flung, dispersed
\exn Taburan, serakan, selerakan,
\qu (6) What words refer to taking something away and putting it aside, separate from the others?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengambil sesuatu pergi dan mengasingkannya?
\ex set aside, put aside, separate from the others, keep separate, keep special, reserve, pull out
\exn Menyisihkan, meletakkan di tempat berasingan, memisah daripada yang lain, memisahkan, mengkhaskan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.1.1
\gd I30B3FAA8-747E-465F-833A-A9957A259BE2

\is 7.5.1.2

\oldis 7.4.1.2
\oldsd Include
\oldsdn Ketermasukan

\dd Use this domain for words related to including something in a group.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to including something in a group?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada merangkumkan sesuatu ke dalam sesuatu kumpulan?
\ex include, incorporate, involve, integrate
\exn Memasukkan, merangkumkan, melibatkan, mengintegrasikan,
\qu (2) What words refer to excluding something from a group?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada ketidaktermasukan sesuatu daripada sebuah kumpulan?
\ex exclude, segregate
\exn tidak termasuk, tersisih, dipinggirkan, diketepikan

\is 7.5.1.3
\sd Special
\sdn Istimewa
\oldis 7.4.1.3
\oldsd Special
\oldsdn Istimewa

\dd Use this domain for words that describe a member of a group that is different or special.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan ahli sebuah persatuan yang berbeza atau istimewa.
\qu (1) What words describe something that is special?
\qun
\ex special, different, unique
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.1.3
\oldqu (1) What words describe something which is special?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yang istimewa?
\oldex special, different, unique
\oldexn istimewa, unik, lain daripada yang lain
\gd IB7F058AF-9CE6-4DD0-B555-00526975300E

\is 7.5.2
\sd Join, attach
\sdn
\oldis 7.4.2
\oldsd Join
\oldsdn Menghubung/Mengikat
\oldis 7.4.2.1
\oldsd Joint
\oldsdn Penyambung
\oldis 7.4.2.6
\oldsd Reunite
\oldsdn Penyatuan semula
\dd Use this domain for words related to joining two or more things together.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to joining two or more things together?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menghubungkan/menyambungkan dua hal atau lebih?
\ex join, join together, agglutinate, assemble, bolt, cement, chain, clip, combine, connect, couple, crimp, fasten, fetter, fuse, glue, grapple, handcuff, hitch, hook together, knit, latch, link, manacle, merge, paste, pin, plaster, put together, put up, rivet, secure, sew, shackle, solder, staple, stick, stick together, tape (up), unite, unify, weld
\exn menghubung, bersekutu, bersatu, menyatukan, mempersatukan, mempersekutukan, gamkan, menyimen, lekatkan, dicangkukkan bersama, menggabungkan, mencantumkan, mengimpal, memateri, melekat pada, melekatkan, menyambung,
\qu (2) What words refer to joining one thing to another?
\qun
\ex affix, anchor, annex, attach, batten, engraft, fix to, graft, moor, nail, screw, secure, stick to, tack
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to things joining together?
\qun
\ex adhere, bind, cleave, cling, cohere, combine, fuse, merge, stick together, unite
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to something joining itself to something?
\qun
\ex attach to, bind to, fasten to, stick to, take hold of
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to the act of joining things together?
\qun
\ex joining, attachment, bonding, combination, fusion, unification, union, welding
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe things that have been joined?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan benda-benda yang telah dipersatukan?
\ex joined, affixed, anchored, assembled, attached, bolted, cemented, chained, connected, fastened, fixed to, fused, glued, handcuffed, manacled, nailed, pasted, pinned, plastered, riveted, sewn, shackled, stapled, stick, stuck, taped, united, unified, welded
\exn telah dipersatukan, telah digabungkan, diijabkabulkan (perkahwinan dan membayar zakat dalam Islam), siap dipasang, telah disimen, telah dilekatkan, telah dihubungkan,
\qu (7) What words refer to something made by joining things together?
\qun
\ex union, unity, assembly, assemblage, bundle, ensemble, merger, trinity, triumvirate, partnership, compound, couple, coupling, conglomerate, combination, construct (n)
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to something that is joined to something else?
\qun
\ex attachment
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to the place where two things are joined together?
\qun
\ex join (n), joint, junction, connection, contact point, intersection, seam
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to how well things are joined together?
\qun
\ex bond, coherent, fast, secure, stay, strong (joint/bond), weak (joint/bond), stuck
\exn
\qu (11) What words refer to reuniting things that have come apart?
\qun (11) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menyatukan semula sesuatu yang telah terpisah?
\ex reunite, reassemble, rejoin, re-glue, reattach, refasten, put back together
\exn menyatukan semula, berhimpun semula, berkumpul semula, melekatkan semula, mendamaikan, merukunkan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.2
\oldqu (3) What is the union of two (or more) things called?
\oldqun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada persekutuan dua atau lebih perkara?
\oldex union, unity, assembly, assemblage, trinity, triumvirate, partnership, couple, conglomerate, combination
\oldexn persekutuan, perhimpunan, perkumpulan, kumpulan, triniti, pemerintahan bertiga, perkongsian, pasangan, konglomerat, paduan, kombinasi, gabungan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.2.1

\oldqun (1) Apakah nama bagi tempat yang di mana dua hal bersambung bersama?
\oldex joint, seam, juncture, intersection, contact point
\oldexn Penyambung, kelim, penghubung, persimpangan, persilangan

\is 7.5.2.1
\sd Link, connect
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words related to a linking or connecting things together--to put something like a road, pipe, or wire between things so that people or things can move between them.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to linking things together?
\qun
\ex link, link up, connect, join, network
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to something linking two things?
\qun
\ex link, connect
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to two things being linked?
\qun
\ex be joined (together), be connected
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to the thing that links two things?
\qun
\ex link, connection, coupling, hookup, network, passageway
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to two things (such as wires, roads, rivers) joining together?
\qun
\ex join, meet, converge, merge
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to the place where two things (such as wires, roads, rivers) join together?
\qun
\ex joint, connection, junction, intersection
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe something that links two things?
\qun
\ex connecting
\exn

\is 7.5.2.4
\sd Remove, take apart
\sdn
\oldis 7.4.2.5
\oldsd Take apart
\oldsdn Memisahkan
\oldis 7.4.2.3
\oldsd Come apart
\oldsdn Berkecai
\dd Use this domain for words related to removing part of something, taking something apart, and things coming apart.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to removing a part of something?
\qun
\ex remove, removal, take off, detach, tear off, break off, cut off, cut away
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to removing a part from inside something?
\qun
\ex take out, remove, extract, extraction, cut out, get out, excision, withdraw
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to removing a part from the surface of something?
\qun
\ex take off, remove, wipe off, peel off, scrape off, scratch off, rub off
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to removing words from a book, or music from a tape?
\qun
\ex erase, delete, cross out, rub out
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to the act of removing something?
\qun
\ex removal, extraction
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe something that can be removed?
\qun
\ex removable, temporary (ink), non-permanent
\exn
\qu (7) What words describe something that cannot be removed?
\qun
\ex permanent
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to a tool or substance used to remove something?
\qun
\ex eraser, remover, paint remover
\exn
\qu (9) What words refer to taking something apart?
\qun
\ex take apart, detach, disunite, disassemble, disjoin, uncouple, unhook, unfasten, pull apart, break up, dismantle, take something to pieces
\exn
\qu (10) What words describe something after it has been taken apart?
\qun
\ex apart, detached, disassembled, dismembered, be in pieces
\exn
\qu (11) What words describe something that can be taken apart?
\qun
\ex detachable
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to things coming apart?
\qun (12) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada benda-benda yang berkecai?
\ex come apart, come free, come loose, come off, come undone, come unglued, come unhooked, come unstuck, break up, disintegrate, fall apart, fall off, fall to pieces, peel off, pop off, separate, unravel, unroll, work free, work loose
\exn Berkecai, bersepai, hancur, luluh, berpisah, memencar, berserak, repui, terurai, buka (dari gulungan), pecah

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.2.5

\is 7.5.3
\sd Mix
\sdn Campur
\oldis 7.4.3
\oldsd Mix
\oldsdn Campur
\dd Use this domain for words related to mixing things together--to put two or more different kinds of substances, like liquids or cooking ingredients, together.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to someone mixing things together?
\qun
\ex mix, mix something with something, mix things together, add something to something, amalgamate, bring together, coalesce, combine, commingle, dilute, fuse, imbue, interlard, intermingle, intermix, join, jumble, lump, meld, merge, mingle, scramble, unification, unify, unite
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to things mixing together?
\qun
\ex amalgamate, blend, combine, commingle, fuse, intermix, meld, merge, merger, unite
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to something being a mixture of other things?
\qun
\ex be a mixture of, combine, blend
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to stirring something so that it is mixed well?
\qun
\ex stir, stir up, stir together, beat, blend, knead, whisk
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to something made by mixing things together?
\qun
\ex mix (n), mixture, admixture, amalgam, assortment, blend (n), brew (n), combination, composite, compound, conglomerate, conglomeration, fusion, hodgepodge, intermixture, jumble, mess, miscellany, mishmash, patchwork, odds and ends, solution, a cross between
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe something made by mixing things together?
\qun
\ex mixed, mixed up, amalgamated, assorted, blended, combined, composite, compounded, conglomerated, diluted, half-and-half, heterogeneous, intermixed, jumbled, mingled, miscellaneous, motley, scrambled, tangled, together, varied, variegated
\exn
\qu (7) What tools and machines are used to mix things?
\qun
\ex mixer, blender, food processor, eggbeater
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to different things that do not mix well with each other?
\qun
\ex do not mix, incompatible, do not go well together
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.3

\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mencampurkan sesuatu?

\oldexn bercampur, gaul, mencampurkan sesuatu, mencampur-adukkan, mengacau

\oldex mixture, conglomeration, compound
\oldexn campuran, adunan, kumpulan gagasan yang pelbagai, sebatian

\is 7.5.3.1
\sd Pure, unmixed
\sdn Tulin, tidak bercampur
\oldis 7.4.3.1
\oldsd Pure, unmixed
\oldsdn Tulin, tidak bercampur
\dd Use this domain for words related to being pure--words describing something (like water, food, or air) that does not have anything bad in it; or unmixed--words describing something that is only one thing and has not been mixed with something else.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe something that is pure?
\qun
\ex pure, pristine, sheer, solid, unadulterated, unblended, uncombined, uncompounded, undiluted, unmixed, unpolluted, untainted, 100%
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to something that is pure?
\qun
\ex element
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe something that is not pure?
\qun
\ex impure, adulterated, mixed, polluted, tainted, diluted
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to making something pure by removing other things from it?
\qun
\ex purify, distill, refine
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to making something impure by adding something bad to it?
\qun
\ex adulterate, contaminate, pollute
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to something bad that has been adding to something?
\qun
\ex impurity, contaminant, pollutant, pollution
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.3.1
\oldqu (1) What words describe something which has not been mixed with something else?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yg belum dicampur dengan apa-apa yang lain?
\oldex pure, unmixed, unpolluted, untainted, pristine, unadulterated, undiluted
\oldexn tulin, tidak bercampur, tidak tercemar, tidak bercacat, tidak bercela, asli, bersih, tidak lancung, sejati, tidak cair, pekat
\oldqu (2) What words refer to something which is unmixed?
\oldqun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yang tidak bercampur?
\oldex element
\oldexn elemen
\oldqu (3) What words describe something which is not pure?
\oldqun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan sesuatu yang tidak tulin?
\oldex impure, mixed, polluted, tainted, diluted
\oldexn tak tulin, tercemar, tercampur, bercampur
\gd I9B158C9E-9BA5-4BE2-A9A1-77EF888A3B06

\is 7.5.4
\sd Tie
\sdn Ikat
\oldis 7.4.4
\oldsd Tie
\oldsdn Ikat
\oldis 7.4.4.1
\oldsd Untie
\oldsdn Buka ikatan
\dd Use this domain for words related to tying things together.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to tying things together?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengikat sesuatu bersama?
\ex tie, tie together, tie up, bind, cinch, gird, hitch, lash, moor, rope together, tether, truss, wind
\exn Ikat, mengikat dengan tali, tambat, lilit, belit
\qu (2) What words refer to tying a knot?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menyimpulkan?
\ex tie a knot, knot a rope, braid
\exn menyimpul, membuat simpul, simpulkan tali
\qu (3) What words refer to tying up a person?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengikat seseorang?
\ex tie up, bind hand and foot, shackle
\exn Mengikat
\qu (4) What words refer to a knot or a particular kind of knot?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu simpulan tertentu?
\ex knot, braid, lashing, hitch, square knot, slip knot, two half hitches
\exn Simpul buku sila, lilit separuh, teras, ikatan
\qu (5) What words refer to a group of things that have been tied up?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sekumpulan benda yang telah diikat?
\ex bundle, package, packet, parcel
\exn berkas, ikatan, bungkusan, ikat (penjodoh bilangan)
\qu (6) What words describe things that have been tied?
\qun
\ex tied, bound, lashed, moored, tethered
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to tying something tightly?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengikat sesuatu seketat-ketatnya?
\ex bind tightly, cinch up, tighten, truss up
\exn ikat ketat-ketat, mengikat kuat-kuat
\qu (8) What words describe something that has been tied tightly?
\qun
\ex taut, tight, tightly, strain, stretched
\exn
\qu (9) What words describe something that has been tied loosely?
\qun
\ex loose, loosely, slack, give it some slack
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to untying something?
\qun (10) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada melepaskan ikatan sesuatu?
\ex untie, be untied, take off the rope, undo
\exn Membuka ikatan, melepaskan ikatan, buka tali, buka lilitannya
\qu (11) What words refer to something becoming untied by accident?
\qun (11) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada terlepas dari ikatan dengan tidak sengaja?
\ex come untied, come loose
\exn
\qu (12) What words refer to tying something a second time after it has come untied?
\qun (12) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengikat sesuatu pada kali keduanya selepas ia terlepas dari ikatan?
\ex retie
\exn mengikat semula, mengikat kali keduanya

\is 7.5.4.2
\sd Tangle
\sdn Kusut
\oldis 7.4.4.4
\oldsd Tangle
\oldsdn Kusut
\dd Use this domain for words related to becoming tangled--when something long and thin, such as rope, string, thread, hair, grass, or vines, becomes disorganized, twisted, or knotted, so that it is hard to separate it.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to things becoming tangled?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada benda yang menjadi kusut?
\ex tangle, entangle, become tangled, get all tangled up, snarl
\exn kusut, terbelit, menjadi kusut, berserabut, berselirat, bersimpul, terbelat-belit
\qu (2) What words described something that is tangled?
\qun
\ex tangled, matted, raveled, snarled, all mixed up
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to untangling something?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menguraikan kekusutan?
\ex untangle, unravel, comb out, straighten out
\exn menguraikan
\qu (4) What words refer to something that has become tangled?
\qun
\ex tangle (n), tangled mess, jumble, mix-up, rat's nest, snarl
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.4.4

\oldqun (2) Perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan sesuatu benda atau hal yang kusut adalah:
\oldex
\oldexn kusut, berserabut,
\oldqu (4) What kinds of things get tangled?
\oldqun (4) Apakah benda yang boleh kusut?
\oldex thread, string, rope, hair
\oldexn benang, pita, tali, rambut
\gd I5F791DAF-98A2-4787-93CC-8813AEA93C4D

\is 7.5.5
\sd Organize
\sdn
\dd Use this domain for words referring to organizing things, people, events, and ideas--to think about and decide on the pattern a group of things should be arranged in, and then doing whatever is necessary to arrange them so that they can be used for some purpose. This domain is like the domain 'Arrange' except that 'Arrange' emphasizes physically moving the things, and the domain 'Organize' emphasizes the logical system. 'Organize' does not require that the things be moved, only that the logical pattern is specified.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to organizing things?
\qun
\ex organize, dispose, structure, get together, get it together, get your act together, chart, marshal, put in a chart, put in a table, put in a matrix, sort, sort out, systematize, tabulate
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to the pattern in which things are organized?
\qun
\ex organization, ad hoc, alignment, apparatus, cycle, framework, hierarchy, mechanism, network, order, ordering, pattern, row, sequence, set-up, structure, system
\exn
\qu (3) What tools and methods are used for organizing things?
\qun
\ex table, matrix, chart, organizational chart, flow chart, grid, cubby hole, pigeon hole, in basket, out basket
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to organizing things a second time, or organizing things after they have been disorganized?
\qun
\ex reorganize, reorganization, adjust, reform, reorder, reordering
\exn
\qu (5) What words describe things that have been organized?
\qun
\ex organized, ordered, well-ordered, orderly, in order, harmonious, shipshape, structured, systematic, tidy, everything in its place
\exn
\qu (6) What words describe a person who organizes things well?
\qun
\ex organized, methodical, neat, together
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to when everything is organized?
\qun
\ex order
\exn
\gd IE6C9FE4C-199E-4934-B622-739A85B0830D

\is 7.5.5.1
\sd Disorganized
\sdn
\oldis 7.4.5
\oldsd Disorganize
\oldsdn Mencelarukan
\dd Use this domain for words related to things becoming disorganized.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe things that are disorganized?
\qun
\ex disorganized, arbitrary, chaotic, confused, in disarray, haphazard, helter-skelter, jumbled, messed up, messy, nonsystematic, random, unarranged, unsorted, unmethodical, unordered, unorganized, unsystematic
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to disorganizing things?
\qun
\ex disorganize, disarrange, shuffle, mess up, randomize
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the state of things being disorganized?
\qun
\ex disorganization, ambient state, chaos, disorder
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.4.5

\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk mencelarukan sesuatu?
\oldex disorganize, disarrange, shuffle
\oldexn
\oldqu (2) What words describe the resulting state?

\oldexn tidak keruan, bercelaru, ketidakaturan, ketidakeruan, tidak teratur

\is 7.5.6
\sd Substitute
\sdn Pengganti
\oldis 7.4.6
\oldsd Substitute
\oldsdn Pengganti

\dd Use this domain for words referring to substituting something for something else--to move something and put something else in its place.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menggantikan sesuatu bagi sesuatu yang lain—memindahkan sesuatu dan meletakkan sesuatu yang lain pada tempatnya.
\qu (1) What words refer to putting something in the place of something else?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada meletakkan sesuatu hal atau benda di tempat hal atau benda yang lain?
\ex substitute, supplant, replace
\exn Mengganti, mengambil tempat,
\qu (2) What words refer to putting each of two things in the place of the other?
\qun
\ex exchange, switch (places)
\exn

\oldex exchange, switch (places)
\oldexn Tukar, tukar tempat

\is 7.5.7
\sd Multiple things moving
\sdn Pelbagai benda atau hal bergerak
\oldis 7.4.7
\oldsd Multiple things moving
\oldsdn Pelbagai benda atau hal bergerak

\dd Use this domain for words referring to multiple things moving.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan yang merujuk kepada pergerakan pelbagai benda.
\qu (1) What words refer to more than one thing moving in the same direction?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada lebih daripada satu benda/hal yang bergerak dalam arah yang sama?
\ex move together, move parallel
\exn Bergerak bersama-sama, berjalan seiring
\qu (2) What words refer to more than one thing moving away from each other?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada lebih daripada satu benda atau hal yang bergerak berlainan arah daripada satu sama lain?
\ex disperse, thin out, melt away, break up, spread out, diverge, permeate
\exn berpencar, berselerak, berserak, mencapah, menyimpang
\qu (3) What words refer to more than one thing moving toward each other?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada lebih daripada satu hal atau benda bergerak ke arah satu sama lain?
\ex gather, collect, form, mass, congregate, converge, close (v), close in on, concentrate, crowd in
\exn Bertumpu
\qu (4) What words refer to more than one thing meeting?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada lebih daripada satu hal atau benda bersemuka?
\ex meet, come together, unite, crash, collide
\exn Berjumpa, bersemuka, bersatu, bersepadu, bersekutu, berlanggar, bertembung
\qu (5) What words refer to the place where things come together?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tempat di mana hal-hal atau benda bertemu bersama?
\ex meeting point, focal point, focus, confluence
\exn Tempat bertemu, poin tumpuan, fokus,
\qu (6) What words refer to more than one thing moving around in a place?
\qun
\ex crowd, fill, mill around, swarm
\exn

\exn

\exn

\exn

\is 7.6
\sd Hide
\sdn Sembunyi
\oldis 7.5
\oldsd Hide
\oldsdn Sembunyi
\dd Use this domain for words related to hiding things so that they cannot be seen or found, and for hiding oneself.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang berkaitan dengan menyembunyikan hal atau benda supaya tidak kelihatan atau tidak dapat dicari dan menyembunyikan diri sendiri.

\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menyembunyikan sesuatu?
\ex hide, conceal, concealment, bury, secrecy
\exn sembunyi, menyorok, memendam
\qu (2) What words describe something that is hidden?
\qun
\ex hidden, secret
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the place where something is hidden?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tempat di mana sesuatu disembunyikan?
\ex hiding place, hideout, refuge
\exn Tempat persembunyian, tempat menyorok/sorokan, tempat rahsia
\qu (4) What words refer to hiding yourself?
\qun
\ex hide, take refuge, go into hiding, disappear
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to coming out from hiding?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada keluar dari bersembunyi?
\ex come out (from hiding), surface
\exn Keluar dari tempat persembunyian, timbul, muncul

\exn

\qun

\exn hilang, salahletak

\is 7.7
\sd Physical impact
\sdn Hentaman fizikal
\oldis 7.6
\oldsd Physical impact
\oldsdn Hentaman fizikal
\dd Use this domain for general words referring to making a physical impact on something, including the words for the action itself and the result of the action.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan umum yang merujuk kepada membuat hentaman fizikal ke atas sesuatu, termasuklah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada perbuatan itu sendiri dan kesan daripada perbuatan itu.
\qu (1) What general words refer to making an impact on something?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada membuat hentaman ke atas sesuatu?
\ex impact (v), affect, change (v), impinge
\exn menghentam, mengakibatkan kesan, menukar, kena pada
\qu (2) What words refer to the effect on the object?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada kesan pada objek?
\ex impact (n), effect, change (n), impression
\exn Impak, dampak, kesan, pertukaran,

\is 7.7.1
\sd Hit
\sdn Terpukul, terlanggar
\oldis 7.6.1
\oldsd Hit
\oldsdn Terpukul, terlanggar
\oldis 7.6.2
\oldsd Bounce
\oldsdn Lantunan
\dd Use this domain for words related to hitting something.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu mengena pada sesuatu kemudian melantun.
\qu (1) What words refer to one thing hitting another?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada satu benda memukul atau melanggar yang lain?
\ex hit, strike, bang into, smack, bump (into), crash into
\exn memukul, menghempap, melanggar, menyerang, menghentam
\qu (2) What words refer to a person hitting something?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang memukul sesuatu?
\ex hit, strike
\exn Memukul, menampar, menumbuk
\qu (3) What words refer to hitting another person?
\qun
\ex box, beat up, punch, hit out at, strike out at
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to hitting something with your fist or hand?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memukul sesuatu dengan menggunakan buku lima atau tangan anda?
\ex hit, slap, smack
\exn pukul, tinju, tumbuk, tampar, tempeleng
\qu (5) What words refer to hitting something with a tool?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memukul sesuatu dengan menggunakan alat?
\ex hammer, pound, club, whip
\exn Menukul, memukul dengan belantan
\qu (6) What words refer to hitting two things together?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memukul dua benda sekaligus?
\ex (no words in English)
\exn (tiada perkataan di dalam Bahasa Malaysia)
\qu (7) What words refer to striking someone in order to cause injury?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memukul seseorang untuk menyebabkan cedera?
\ex (no words in English)
\exn (tiada perkataan di dalam Bahasa Malaysia)
\qu (8) What words refer to striking something repeatedly?
\qun (8) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memukul sesuatu bertubi-tubi?
\ex hit over and over, beat
\exn Pukul bertubi-tubi
\qu (9) What words refer to each time something is hit?
\qun (9) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada setiap kali sesuatu dipukul?
\ex stroke, blow, beat, punch
\exn Sebatan, tumbukan pukulan
\qu (10) What words refer to the speed or force with which something is hit?
\qun (10) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada kelajuan atau daya kekuatan di mana sesuatu benda dipukul?
\ex force, impact
\exn Daya kekuatan, impak
\qu (11) What words describe hitting something with not much force?
\qun (11) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan memukul sesuatu dengan daya kekuatan yang sedikit?
\ex light hit, tap, knock
\exn Pukulan ringan, tepuk, ketuk
\qu (12) What words describe hitting something with a lot of force?
\qun (12) Apakah perkataan-perkataan menghuraikan memukul sesuatu dengan daya kekuatan yang banyak atau berat?
\ex hit hard, whack, smash into, wallop, cream
\exn Pukul sekuatnya, menyebat, menghentam, membelasah, membantai,
\qu (13) What words refer to two things moving so that they hit each other?
\qun (13) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada dua benda bergerak supaya ia berlanggar satu dengan yang lain?
\ex collide, hit each other, run into each other
\exn Berlanggar, bertembung
\qu (14) What words refer to something hitting and then bouncing?
\qun
\ex bounce, rebound, glance off, ricochet, recoil
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.6.1

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.6.2
\oldqu (1) What words refer to something bouncing?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu yang melantun?
\oldex bounce, recoil, rebound
\oldexn melantun, mengambul, memantul, menganjal, melambung kembali
\cf Touching, contact
\gd ID25F7907-091E-4CF7-BD8C-BDB97278B616

\is 7.7.2
\sd Aim at a target
\sdn Membidik sasaran
\oldis 7.6.3
\oldsd Aim at a target
\oldsdn Membidik sasaran
\dd Use this domain for words referring to aiming at a target, and for hitting or missing the target.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada membidik sasaran, dan untuk mengenakan ataupun tidak mengenakan sasaran.
\qu (1) What words refer to aiming at a target?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada membidik sesuatu sasaran?
\ex aim, point, direct, line up on, set your sights on, sight along, focus on
\exn Membidik, mengarahkan
\qu (2) What words refer to hitting a target?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada kena pada sasaran?
\ex hit, on target
\exn kena, pada sasaran
\qu (3) What words refer to missing a target?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada sasaran yang tidak mengena?
\ex miss, fall short, overshoot, off center, wild shot
\exn Tidak mengena, tembakan liar
\qu (4) What words refer to the target?
\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sasaran?
\ex target, goal
\exn Sasaran, tujuan, matlamat
\qu (5) What words refer to the center of a target?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada tengah-tengah sasaran?
\ex bull's-eye, dead center
\exn Titik tengah, titik sasaran, titik bidikan, titik acuan
\qu (6) What words refer to a person who is good at hitting a target?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada seseorang yang baik dalam mengenakan sasaran?
\ex sharpshooter, marksman, good aim, good eye
\exn Penembak tepat, jaguh tembak, pembidik yang baik

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.6.3
\gd I5718FCC8-1EBA-4B8D-9B6B-0C8349F53F80

\is 7.7.3
\sd Kick
\sdn Tendang
\oldis 7.6.4
\oldsd Kick
\oldsdn Tendang
\dd Use this domain for words referring to kicking--to hit something with your foot. The words in this domain may be distinguished by the way in which the foot moves, either in a swinging motion, or by first bending the leg and then quickly straightening it. They may also be distinguished by whether the foot moves horizontally or vertically, whether the effect is to move something or damage it, or how hard the person kicks.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menendang—menggunakan kaki untuk memukul sesuatu. Perkataan-perkataan dalam domain ini mungkin akan dibezakan oleh cara kaki itu bergerak sama ada dalam bentuk ayunan ataupun dengan membengkokkan dahulu kaki kemudian meluruskannya dengan pantas. Ia juga mungkin dibezakan oleh pergerakan mendatar atau menegak kaki tersebut, sama ada kesannya adalah memindahkan sesuatu atau merosakkannya atau berapa kuatnya orang itu menendang.
\qu (1) What words refer to kicking something?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menendang sesuatu?
\ex kick, give something a kick, kick in (a door), boot, punt, stamp, stomp on, stub your toe on something
\exn tendang, terajang

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.6.4
\gd IBE4A63E7-F4BA-4DE2-BE69-D26219D99CB6

\is 7.7.4
\sd Press
\sdn Tekan
\oldis 7.6.5
\oldsd Press
\oldsdn Tekan
\dd Use this domain for words referring to pressing something.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menekan sesuatu.
\qu (1) What words refer to pressing something?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan yang merujuk kepada menekan sesuatu?
\ex press, push on, apply pressure
\exn tekan

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.6.5
\gd I0A85EE64-E466-4295-8E2C-5B06C8E3054F

\is 7.7.5

\oldsd Rub
\oldsdn Gilap
\dd Use this domain for words referring to rubbing--to move something smooth against something else, in order to make it smooth or clean.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menggilap—menggerakan sesuatu yang halus pada sesuatu yang lain supaya ia menjadi halus ataupun bersih.
\qu (1) What words refer to rubbing something?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada menggilap sesuatu?
\ex rub, chafe, rasp
\exn sapu, gilap, lap, gosok
\qu (2) What words refer to rubbing something to make it clean?
\qun
\ex wipe
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to rubbing something to make it smooth?
\qun
\ex polish
\exn
\qu (4) What tools and materials are used to rub something?
\qun
\ex polish
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.6.6
\gd I709D43DD-CE94-4DF1-91B1-EDB0B12FDAEA

\is 7.7.6
\sd Grind
\sdn Kisar
\oldis 7.6.7
\oldsd Grind
\oldsdn Kisar
\dd Use this domain for words referring to grinding--to rub something rough against something else, while applying force, in order to break it or remove its surface.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengisar—menggosok sesuatu yang kasar pada sesuatu yang lain sementara mengenakan daya kekuatan untuk memecahkan atau menanggalkan permukaannya.
\qu (1) What words refer to grinding something?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada mengisar sesuatu?
\ex grind, grate, scrape, scratch
\exn mengisar, memarut, menyagat, menggeser, mengikis

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.6.7
\gd IA3BA23D2-618E-4618-AF18-9BEFAE2F888B

\is 7.8
\sd Divide into pieces
\sdn Dibahagikan ke dalam kepingan
\oldis 7.7
\oldsd Divide into pieces
\oldsdn Dibahagikan ke dalam kepingan
\dd Use this domain for words referring to dividing something into parts or pieces, perhaps with the added idea of using care, or into a certain number of parts.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada membahagikan sesuatu ke dalam bahagian-bahagian atau kepingan, kemungkinan juga dengan idea tambahan bahawa ia perlu perhatian, ataupun dibahagikan ke dalam bilangan bahagian-bahagian yang tertentu.
\qu (1) What words are used of dividing something into parts?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang digunakan untuk membahagikan sesuatu ke dalam bahagian-bahagian?
\ex divide (up), divide into pieces, division, split (up), halve, quarter (v), apportion, take apart
\exn Membahagi, bahagikan kepada keping-kepingan, memisahkan, membahagi separuh, membahagi ke dalam satu perempat, mengagih-agihkan, mengumpukkan

\is 7.8.1
\sd Break
\sdn Pecahkan
\oldis 7.7.1
\oldsd Break
\oldsdn Pecahkan
\dd Use this domain for words referring breaking something into pieces, perhaps with the added idea of doing it accidentally or without being careful.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memecahkan sesuatu ke dalam kepingan-kepingan kecil kemungkinan tanpa disengaja atau tanpa berhati-hati melalukannya.
\qu (1) What words refer to something breaking?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu pecah?
\ex break
\exn pecah
\qu (2) What words refer to breaking something?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memecahkan sesuatu?
\ex break, bust, fracture
\exn memecahkan, mematahkan
\qu (3) What words refer to breaking something into many small pieces?
\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memecahkan sesuatu ke dalam kepingan-kepingan yang kecil?
\ex break into pieces, smash, crush, pulverize, atomize
\exn Jatuh berkecai, menghempas, merenyuk, meronyok, mengisar hingga lumat, menumbuk hingga lumat, membelasah dengan teruk
\qu (4) What words describe something that has been broken?
\qun
\ex broken, smashed, crushed, pulverized, (be) in pieces, busted
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to breaking through a barrier?
\qun (5) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memecahkan melalui perintang atau sekatan?
\ex break through, breakout
\exn Tembus
\qu (6) What words refer to a container like a bag, bottle, or bubble breaking because there was too much inside?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada benda yang terlalu banyak berisi seperti beg plastik, botol atau buih pecah?
\ex burst, break open
\exn Pecah, meletup
\qu (7) What sounds do things make when they break?
\qun (7) Apakah bunyinya apabila ia pecah?
\ex snap, crack, pop, boom, crash
\exn Pop, bum
\qu (8) What words describe something that is easily broken?
\qun (8) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan sesuatu yang mudah pecah?
\ex breakable, brittle, delicate, fragile, flimsy
\exn Mudah pecah, mudah luluh, mudah lumat
\qu (9) What words describe something that is not easily broken?
\qun (9) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan sesuatu yang tidak mudah pecah?
\ex strong, tough, hard, unbreakable, durable
\exn Kuat, keras, tidak mudah pecah

\nt Old questions for \oldis 7.7.1

\oldqun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang menghuraikan sesuatu yang telah pecah?
\oldex broken, smashed, crushed, pulverized, (be) in pieces, busted
\oldexn Sudah pecah, sudah hancur, remuk, berkecai, sudah lumat, menjadi lumat

\oldsdn Potong

\ddn

\exn Potong

\exn Hiris, potong, potong dalam satu pergerakan

\qun (3) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memotong sesuatu dengan banyak hirisan?
\ex hack, cut repeatedly
\exn Cincang, potong bertubi-tubi

\qun (4) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memotong sesuatu ke dalam banyak kepingan?

\exn Potong menjadi berkeping-keping

\ex chop
\exn penggal, tetak, mengapak

\qun (6) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada memotong sesuatu dengan alat tertentu?
\ex knife, ax
\exn Memarang, mengapak, merimbas
\qu (7) What words refer to a cut?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada sesuatu potongan?
\ex cut, incision
\exn Potongan,

\is 7.8.6

\sdn Korek
\oldis 7.7.6

\oldsdn Korek

\exn Mengorek lubang, melombong, membuat terowong, menggali, mengorek bahagian bawah

\exn

\ex deep, shallow, narrow, wide
\exn Dalam, cetek, sempit, lebar

\ex bury
\exn Kubur, timbus

\is 7.9
\sd Break, wear out
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words related to something breaking or wearing out, especially for things that people make and use.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to something breaking?
\qun
\ex break, bust, give out
\exn
\qu (2) What words describe something that has broken?
\qun
\ex broken, broken down, busted
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to something wearing out?
\qun
\ex wear, wear out, deteriorate
\exn
\qu (4) What words describe something that is worn?
\qun
\ex used, well used, worn, well worn, is past its prime, second hand
\exn
\qu (5) What words describe something that has been used so much that it is no longer useful?
\qun
\ex worn out, has had it, is past it
\exn

\is 7.9.1
\sd Damage
\sdn Rosak
\oldis 7.7.7
\oldsd Damage
\oldsdn Rosak

\dd Use this domain for words referring to damaging something--to do something bad to something, but not completely ruin it so that it can't be used any more.
\ddn Sila gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada merosakkan sesuatu—membuat sesuatu yang tidak baik tetapi tidak memusnahkannya sepenuhnya sehingga ia tidak dapat digunakan lagi.
\qu (1) What words refer to damaging something?
\qun (1) Apakah perkataan-perkataan yang merujuk kepada merosakkan sesuatu?
\ex damage, do damage, cause damage, break, bust, chip, corrode, corrupt, deface, dent, erode, harm, do harm, hurt, impair, injure, maltreat, mar, mess up, nick, sabotage, score, scratch, spoil, vandalize
\exn Merosakkan, mencederakan
\qu (2) What words refer to deliberately damaging something?
\qun
\ex vandalize, vandal, smash up, sabotage, tamper with, deface, desecrate
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to something being damaged over a long period of time?
\qun
\ex wear away, corrode, erode
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to using something for a long time until it is damaged?
\qun
\ex wear away, wear out
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to the act of damaging something?
\qun
\ex corrosion, detriment, erosion, maltreatment, mischief, vandalism
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to the damage done to something?
\qun
\ex damage (n), scar, wear (n), wear and tear
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to a person who damages things?
\qun
\ex vandal, saboteur, bull in a china shop
\exn
\qu (8) What words refer to something that damages things?
\qun
\ex blight
\exn
\qu (9) What words describe something that damages things?
\qun
\ex harmful, toxic, toxicity, unwholesome, dangerous
\exn
\qu (10) What words refer to something that has been damaged?
\qun
\ex breakages, damaged goods
\exn
\qu (11) What words describe something that has been damaged?
\qun
\ex spoiled, broken, busted, messed up, damaged, crumbling, moth-eaten
\exn
\qu (12) What words describe something that can be damaged easily?
\qun
\ex vulnerable
\exn

\is 8.1
\sd Quantity
\sdn Jumlah
\oldis 8.1
\oldsd Quantity
\oldsdn Jumlah
\dd Use this domain for general words referring to the amount or quantity of something.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to the amount of something?
\qun
\ex amount, quantity, level, volume, percentage, proportion, sum, how much, ($100) worth
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to the amount of something that can be counted?
\qun
\ex number, how many, numbers, ratio
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to the amount of food that someone is given?
\qun
\ex portion, helping, serving, intake, ration, measure
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to a measured amount of something?
\qun
\ex quota, load
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to the amount of something, such as fuel, that is available to be used?
\qun
\ex pool, stock, reserves
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to the amount of medicine that a sick person needs?
\qun
\ex dose, dosage
\exn
\qu (7) What words refer to the amount of a problem such as crime or damage?
\qun
\ex extent, incidence, level, rate
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 8.1
\oldqu (1) What general words refer to the quantity of something?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan umum merujuk kepada jumlah sesuatu?
\oldex Quantity, number, amount
\oldexn Jumlah, angka, banyaknya
\gd IC6C772AF-7B6B-4393-B0DA-5B4A329D3426

\is 8.1.1
\sd Number
\sdn Angka
\oldis 8.1.2
\oldsd Number
\oldsdn Angka
\dd Use this domain for words related to numbers. Every language has a word for 'one', and a word for 'two'. These two numbers often have special words. So we have included a separate domain for 'one' and 'two'. In addition the numbers form a series (one, two, three...). Most languages have more than one series of numbers (first, second, third...). So we have also included a domain for each series of numbers that most languages have. Your language may have other series of numbers. Put them in the domain 'Number series'.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to a written number?
\qun
\ex number, figure, digit, numeral
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to a number of people or things?
\qun
\ex toll, statistics
\exn
\qu (3) What words describe different kinds of numbers?
\qun
\ex even, odd, positive, negative, infinite, cardinal, ordinal, whole, fraction, decimal
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to writing numbers on a series of things?
\qun
\ex number (v), numbered
\exn
\qu (5) What words indicate that there are a particular number of something?
\qun
\ex number (v)
\exn
\xe The group <numbered> fifty.
\xen

\nt Old questions for \oldis 8.1.2
\oldqu (1) What general words refer to the numbers?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan umum merujuk kepada angka?
\oldex Number, numeral, integer
\oldexn Angka, nombor,
\gd IFB84538A-17A8-4ADC-8D50-E2B66F8E4099

\is 8.1.1.1
\sd Cardinal numbers
\sdn Angka kardinal
\oldis 8.1.2.1
\oldsd Cardinal numbers
\oldsdn Angka kardinal

\dd Use this domain for words related to the cardinal numbers (one, two, three)--the numbers used to count.
\ddn (Angka-angka yang kamu gunakan untuk mengira) kosong, satu, dua, tiga, empat, lima, enam, tujuh, lapan, sembilan sepuluh, sebelas, duableas,
\qu (1) What are the cardinal numbers? (the numbers you use when you count)
\qun (1) Apakah angka-angka kardinal?
\ex zero, one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, eleven, twelve, thirteen...
\exn
\qu (2) multiples of ten
\qun (2) gandaan sepuluh
\ex ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, sixty, seventy, eighty, ninety
\exn sepuluh, dua puluh, tiga puluh, empat puluh, lima puluh, enam puluh tujuh puluh, lapan puluh, sembilan puluh
\qu (3) multiples of one hundred
\qun (3) gandaan seratus
\ex one hundred, two hundred
\exn seratus, dua ratus
\qu (4) multiples of one thousand
\qun (4) gandaan satu ribu
\ex one thousand, two thousand
\exn satu ribu, dua ribu
\qu (5) numbers larger than one thousand
\qun
\ex million, billion, trillion, quadrillion
\exn
\qu (6) What words are used to refer to the numbers of a certain decimal place?
\qun (6) Apakah perkataan digunakan bagi merujuk kepada angka suatu angka perpuluhan?
\ex the digits, the tens, hundreds, thousands, millions, billions, trillions
\exn Digit, angka, ratusan, ribuan, jutaan
\qu (7) What words are used to refer to groups of a certain decimal place?
\qun (7) Apakah perkataan digunakan bagi merujuk kepada sekumpulan angka perpuluhan?
\ex tens, hundreds, thousands, tens of thousands, millions, billions, trillions
\exn Puluhan,
\qu (8) What words refer to a very large number?
\qun (8) Apa kah perkataan digunakan bagi angka yang sangat besar?
\ex huge number, myriad, zillion, jillion, umpteen, googolplex
\exn Angka besar, berjuta-juta, banyak,
\qu (9) What words refer to an unlimited number?
\qun
\ex infinity, infinite, boundless, endless, limitless
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 8.1.2.1
\oldqu (5) Numbers larger than one thousand
\oldqun (5) Angka-angka lebih besar daripada satu ribu
\oldex million, billion, trillion, quadrillion
\oldexn juta, bilion, sejuta juta,
\gd IB6686C7C-39DE-40B5-ADEE-67FC7DC54374

\is 8.1.1.1.1
\sd One
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words related to the number one. It appears that every language has a word for 'one' and 'two', but not every language has a word for the numbers higher than two. Many languages have several words that mean 'one'.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to one?
\qun
\ex one, first, individual, single, only, the one, one apiece, one each
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to being by yourself?
\qun
\ex alone, by yourself, sole
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to doing something by yourself?
\qun
\ex alone, on your own, solo, solely
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to people doing something one by one?
\qun
\ex one by one, singly, individually
\exn
\qu (5) What words indicate that something happens or is done one time?
\qun
\ex once, one time, single time, one-off
\exn
\cf Once; Only; Alone

\gd I2C04FA05-EEBF-4331-B392-23F795C32382

\is 8.1.1.1.2
\sd Two
\sdn

\dd Use this domain for words related to the number two.
\ddn
\qu (1) What words refer to two?
\qun
\ex two, second, two times, two-fold, double (v), twins, brace, dichotomy, deuce, dual, dyad, twain, yoke, in pairs, in twos, two by two, by twos, two at a time, two apiece, two each, both, either, neither
\exn
\qu (2) What words refer to two people who do things together?
\qun
\ex couple, pair, duo, twosome, duet
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to two things that are used together?
\qun
\ex pair, twin
\exn
\qu (4) What words refer to something used by two people?
\qun
\ex for two, double, two-man
\exn
\qu (5) What words refer to something with two parts?
\qun
\ex double (adj), couplet, duplex
\exn
\qu (6) What words refer to something used for two things?
\qun
\ex dual, twofold
\exn
\qu (7) What words indicate that something is two times the amount of something else?
\qun
\ex twice, double, twice as much (as), two times as much (as), two times what, double what
\exn
\qu (8) What words indicate that something happens or is done two times?
\qun
\ex twice, twice over, two-time
\exn
\gd ID086C2AD-2D11-4250-A25A-DC6538439DB6

\is 8.1.1.2
\sd Ordinal numbers
\sdn Nombor ordinal
\oldis 8.1.2.2
\oldsd Ordinal numbers
\oldsdn Nombor ordinal

\dd Use this domain for words related to the ordinal numbers (first, second, third)--the numbers used to indicate the order of something in a series, such as "the first child".
\ddn
\qu (1) What are the ordinal numbers?
\qun (1) Apakah nombor-nombor ordinal?
\ex first, second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth, seven, eighth, ninth, tenth, eleventh, twelfth, thirteenth, hundredth, thousandth
\exn (Menunjukkan urutan mana sesuatu berlaku seperti "anak pertama") pertama, kedua, ketiga, keempat, kelima
\xe This book is the <third> in the series.
\xen

\nt Old questions for \oldis 8.1.2.2
\cf First; Arrange

\gd I816490A4-2CAC-472A-BBB0-EAFBB9BBE4A8

\is 8.1.1.3
\sd Number of times
\sdn Nombor waktu
\oldis 8.1.2.3
\oldsd Number of times
\oldsdn Nombor waktu

\dd Use this domain for numbers that refer to the number of times something happens or is done. These numbers may be adverbs as in English (twice) or in some languages they may be verbs (to do something two times).
\ddn Gunakan domain ini bagi perkataan mana merujuk kepada nombor-nombor waktu sesuatu yang terjadi atau telah berlaku. Nombor-nombor ini mungkin kata kerja di dalam bahasa Inggeris (dua kali) atau di dalam beberap bahasa ia mungkin adalah kata nama (melakukan sesuatu dua kali)
\qu (1) What words indicate the number of times something has happened? ("He fell down three times.")
\qun
\ex once, one time, single time, twice, two times, three times, thrice, four times, many times
\exn
\xe I have lent John money <twice>.
\xen
\qu (2) What words describe something that has happened a particular number of times?
\qun
\ex two-time, three-time
\exn
\qu (3) What words refer to doing something a particular number of times (to do something once/twice/etc.)?
\qun
\ex (none in English)
\exn

\nt Old questions for \oldis 8.1.2.3
\oldqu (1) What words describe the number of times something has happened?
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan mengambarkan suatu angka ketika sesuatu telah terjadi?
\oldex ("He fell down three times.") Once, twice, three times (thrice), four times
\oldexn ("Dia terjatuh tiga kali.") Sekali, dua kali, tiga kali
\cf Once; Often

\gd ID85D0838-A9E4-4787-8FCE-7D0466BC24B9

\is 8.1.1.4
\sd Multiples
\sdn Berganda
\oldis 8.1.2.4
\oldsd Multiples
\oldsdn Berganda

\dd Use this domain for words related to multiples of something (single, double, triple).
\ddn
\qu (1) What words describe something that is two or three times the amount of something else?
\qun
\ex single (portion/scoop), double (adj), triple, quadruple, quintuple, two-fold, three-fold, four-fold
\exn
\xe The oldest son inherited a <double> portion.
\xen
\qu (2) What words indicate that something is two or three times the amount of something else?
\qun (2) Apakah perkataan digunakan bagi merujuk kepada berapa banyakkah sesuatu itu diperolehi?
\ex twice as much (as), two times as much (as), two times what, double what
\exn dua kali ganda banyak
\xe He gave you <three times as much as> he gave me.
\xen Dia memberikan kamu <tiga kali ganda banyak> yang diberikanya kepada saya.
\qu (3) What words refer to something becoming two or three times as much?
\qun
\ex double (vi), triple, quadruple
\exn
\xe The size of our herd <doubled> in three years.
\xen
\qu (4) What words refer to making something become two or three times as much?
\qun (4)
\ex double (vt), triple, treble, quadruple
\exn Mengandakan (jumlah,)
\xe My boss <doubled> my salary.
\xen Majikan saya mengandakan gaji saya.

\nt Old questions for \oldis 8.1.2.4
\oldqu (1) What words describe something that is two or three times the amount of something else??
\oldqun (1) Apakah perkataan digunakan bagi mengambarkan berapa banyakkah sesuatu itu?
\oldex single (portion/scoop), double (adj), triple, quadruple, quintuple, two-fold, three-fold, four-fold
\oldexn tunggal (bahagian, senduk), dedua (bahagian), ganda tiga, dua kali ganda, tiga kali ganda, empat kali ganda
\oldxe ("I gave him a double portion.")
\oldxen ("Saya memberikannya dua kali ganda.")
\oldqu (3) What words are used of multiples of something?
\oldqun (3) Apakah perkataan digunakan bagi mengandakan sesuatu?
\oldex Two fold, three fold, four fold
\oldexn Dua kali ganda, tiga kali ganda, empat kali ganda
